translation: 国防情报局官员的终端
现场报告 - 杨 抓获/扭送
绝密！仅上尉被允许浏览

original: Thank you.  Have a pleasant day
Thank you.  Have a pleasant day

translation: 登录名：劳拉·斯图尔特博士
一次监督审查？已经来了？

original: Marsh Hunting Tips Vol IV: Mirelurks
translation: 沼泽狩猎秘传书IV：泥沼蟹
奥巴代亚写给玛塞拉的信

original:
Marcella - 

I'm not imagining it; they're getting closer with each passing night.  The dogs are gone - or taken for sacrifice, more like.  I don't like to rely on superstition to keep them at bay, but there's no way I can fight them off if they take a mind to attack my home.

I don't know who else to turn to, Marcella.  I'm skeptical, but I think we may be able to trust this outsider to help.

Obadiah
translation:
玛塞拉 - 

我不是在幻想；每过一个夜晚，它们就会靠近一些。那些狗不见了-- 更像是被拿去献祭了。我不喜欢靠迷信来驱赶它们，但如果它们想袭击我的家，我也没办法。

我不知道还能找谁，玛塞拉。我很怀疑，但我想我们也许可以相信这个外来者能帮上忙。

奥巴代亚

original:
Bysshe Energy Partners has authorized Natural Gas Survey project MD-16-001 to perform field research. Private Contractor Caroline Saunders shall be present as Principal Geological Chemist on behalf of Bysshe Natural Gas Co. Local authorization for this expedition is granted in agreement with the Isla Negra Real Estate company, with representatives located locally.

Principal Chemist Saunders is to take multiple soil samples and report on concentration of natural gas resources. Her spoken authorization signature will be needed on at least three Survey Sites to conduct further research in this area. Should these authorizations be granted, use this terminal to access expeditionary supplies to continue data gathering while Bysshe Co. extraction crews are assembled.

Intern Research Assistants:
Lovett, K
Roach, M
Rourke, L
Antwon, P
translation:
彼希能源伙伴公司已授权天然气勘查项目MD-16-001进行实地研究。私人承包商卡洛琳·桑德斯将作为首席地质化学家，并代表彼希天然气公司。经与黑岛地产公司（该公司在当地设有代表）协商，本次考察获得当地授权。

首席化学家桑德斯将采集多个土壤样本，并报告天然气资源的浓度。她至少需要在三个勘测点签署口头授权，以便在该地区开展进一步研究。如果这些授权获得批准，则在彼希公司的开采人员集结完毕后，使用该终端获取远征补给，以继续收集数据。

实习研究助理：
洛维特，K
罗奇，M
罗克，L
安特温，P
1207号储物箱 - 间谍语音密码
美国国防情报局现场报告

original: Local community informants provided intelligence leading to the capture and arrest of a priority person of interest, Wan Yang, aka Five Claw Dragon.  Yang is on file with DIA as a Chinese Intelligence field agent, operating within America and Canada over the past decade. Yang has been transferred to Turtledove Detention Camp for interrogation. Our office has so far declined comments to press and diplomats. Please have DoD relations advise regarding a public statement.
translation: 当地社区线人提供的情报帮助抓获并逮捕了一名重点关注人员，即杨婉，又名“五爪龙”。杨作为一名在国防情报局在案的中国情报外勤特工，过去十年来一直在美国和加拿大境内活动。杨已被转移到斑鸠拘留营接受审讯。到目前为止，我们的办公室拒绝向媒体和外交官发表评论。请国防部关系处就公开声明提出建议。

original: Bulletin: Attention Citizens of Pt. Lookout!\nWan Yang, suspected communist and Chinese sympathizer, has been reported in the vicinity of Point Lookout. Agent Yang may be operating under an alias and/or using a disguise. You are required to report any suspicious persons or behavior to Lt. Krumfolz (DIA) at the US Recruitment Station located at 1811 St. Mary’s Branch.\nKnown Aliases: Jamie Patrick, Maria Lopez, Stanley Derrick, Five-Claw Dragon
translation: 公告：望海崖市民请注意！\n据报告，杨婉，疑似的共产主义者和中国同情者，已经在望海崖周边现身。杨特工可能采用化名和/或伪装。您必须向位于1811号圣玛丽岔口的美国征兵站的克鲁姆福尔茨中尉（国防情报局）报告任何可疑人员或行为。\n已知化名：杰米·帕特里克、玛丽亚·洛佩兹、斯坦利·德里克、五爪龙

original:
My darling little Nade,

I know life wasn't always the best at home, and we've had a few rough winters. I don't blame you for running off to find something better. At your age, you think you're wasting away at home while the world's just waiting for you to come get it.

When I was about your age, I ran off from my mom, too. And even though there were some terrible things along the way, it ended with me having you, so I can't complain. I just wish you could have seen your grandmother. I wish I had a chance to see her again, myself.

If you're reading this, I just want you to know you're always welcome back home. Please, learn from my mistake, and don't stay away forever.

Missing you,
XOXOXO
Mom
translation:
我亲爱的小娜，

我知道在家里的日子并不那么愉快，而且我们捱过了好几个艰难的冬天。我并不是责备你为了寻找更好的生活而离开这个家。以你现在的年纪，你自然会认为呆在家纯粹是虚度光阴，而外面的世界则充满诱惑地等待着你征服。

当我像你这么大的时候还，我也曾经背着妈妈离家出走。即使这一路走来充满艰辛，但最后我却有了你，所以我想我没有什么可抱怨的。希望你去看过你的祖母了，我是多么希望我能再见我的祖母一面啊。

如果在读这封信，我只想你知道，家的大门永远对你敞开。亲爱的孩子，不要再犯我当年的错误，请记得回家。

想你，
吻你
妈妈

original:
>>TRANSMIT BEGIN>>
Agent JIANG receive automated correspondence of Chinese Intelligence Ministry.

Remote Positive of Mission Parameters Satisfactory. 

Orbital intelligence verifies SSN-37-1A termination

Please note following from intelligence officer AGENT_ID_UNAVAIL.
/////////////////
"Agent, if you're receiving this message, then our satellites have registered the destruction of your objective. Well done. Please report to my personal bunker, hidden among the grounds of Calvert Mansion. Coordinates have been provided with this transmission. 

The bunker entrance is hidden, of course.  Your pair of Cryptochromatic Spectacles have been hidden in the water tank of the toilet in your safehouse. Retrieve them if you haven't already. Here is the sequence code to unlock the bunker:

1 3 2 3 4 4 2

Once inside, the Passphrase is : Seraphim Descending". I look forward to congratulating you personally, agent.
<<<TRANSMIT END<<
translation:
>>传送开始>>
江特工收到了来自中国情报部的自动通信。

远程确认到任务参数满足。

轨道情报核实SSN-37-1A终止。

请注意以下来自情报官员AGENT_ID_UNAVAIL的信息。
/////////////////
“特工，如果你收到了这条信息，那么我们的卫星已经记录到你的目标被摧毁。干得好，请到我隐藏在卡尔弗特公馆地下的私人堡垒报到。坐标已随此传输发送。

当然，地堡的入口是隐藏的。你的那副加密光谱眼镜被藏在安全屋厕所的水箱里。如果还没拿到，就去取出来。下面是解锁地堡的顺序密码：

1 3 2 3 4 4 2

进入后，口令是：撒拉弗降临”。我期待亲自向你表示祝贺，特工。
<<<传送结束<<

original:
Greetings from Point Lookout!

Straight from the land of warm beaches and luscious wetlands comes the Duchess Gambit, the finest vessel on the east coast, piloted by Tobar the Ferryman.

And to the hungry masses of the Capital Wasteland, he brings the hearty punga fruit! A delicious and nutritious addition to your daily meal, its tangy taste is the most refreshing meal in the world.

Find the punga fruit at your local merchant now, or buy straight from the source at the Duchess Gambit, now docked south of the Citadel.

SPECIAL BONUS!
Hey, adventurers! Itching to find Point Lookout's treasures for yourself? Talk with Tobar to book passage back to this land of mystery!
translation:
来自望海崖的问候！

温暖的沙滩，美丽的湿地风光，带给你的是这艘前往东海岸的最豪华的客轮，狡诈女公爵号。她的船主是托巴尔先生。

为来自首都废土饥肠辘辘的游客们，我们准备了美味的膨葛果！它绝对是一种美味又营养的佳肴，搭配您每日的饮食，可以算是这个世界上最鲜美的水果了。

现在你就可以在当地的零售商那里买到膨葛果，或者来船上买，这都是来自原产地的货色，目前就囤积在要塞南部。

特别额外注意！
你们好，探险家们！迫不及待想要发现眺望角的宝藏了吧？来和托巴尔好好聊聊吧，如此就可以预先获得去神秘乐园的机会哦！

original: Self-Destruct Protocol Initiated.  Engineer must activate failsafe switch in aft engine to confirm sequence.  \n\nPersonnel will have less than one minute to evacuate.
translation: 启动自毁协议。工程师必须启动船尾发动机的故障保险开关，以确认次序。\n\n人员将有不到一分钟的时间撤离。

original:
...loaded...
Audio Saved to User Device...
Begin transcription...
///////////
I apologize that I cannot receive you in person, agent Jiang. Our Norfolk contact confirms your arrival. How eager the Americans are to believe that a great mind of the People would defect! Our countrymen will herald you as a hero when your work is done. To that end, let us turn to the details of your mission. This room will be your safehouse in Point Lookout. Focus initially on playing the American lapdog.Do not arouse suspicion. When it is safe, use the key you were given in Norfolk to open one of the public rental lockers on the boardwalk near the Motel. You will be provided with the password you'll need to access your mission dossier. Zhù ni háoyùn, agent Jiang.
///////////
End auto-transcription...
Compare to audio for accuracy...
translation:
...已加载...
音频已保存到用户设备...
开始转录...
///////////
江特工，很抱歉我不能亲自接待你。我们在诺福克的联络人已经确认了你的到来。美国人是多么渴望相信人民的伟大思想会叛变啊！当你完成使命后，我们的同胞会把你当作英雄来歌颂。为此，让我们来谈谈你的任务细节吧。这个房间将是你在望海崖的安全屋。一开始要集中精力扮演好美帝的哈巴狗，不要引起怀疑。安全之后，使用在诺福克时给你的钥匙，去打开汽车旅馆附近的木栈道上的一个公共出租储物柜。你将获得访问任务简报所需要的密码。Zhù ni háo yùn，江特工。
///////////
结束自动转录...
与音频对比以确保准确性...

original: In compliance with our our parent company, Isla Negra Holdings, we are installing a new security system for our safety-deposit customers.  In addition to conventional tumbler locks, the new system will offer a keyless voice-recognition lock alternative.\n\nTellers are asked to encourage both existing and new safety-deposit customers to sign up for this new service.
translation: 应我们的母公司黑岛控股要求，我们正在为我们的保险箱客户安装一套新的安全系统。除了传统的滚轮锁外，新系统还将提供无钥匙语音识别锁。\n\n请出纳员们鼓励新老保险箱客户注册这项新服务。

original: All tellers are reminded to be on the lookout for any customers attempting to exchange foreign currency. Civil Defense has asked us to be especially vigilant of customers possessing Chinese Yuan notes.  Should you encounter such a customer, trigger the silent alarm and attempt to delay the customer without arousing their suspicion.
translation: 所有出纳都要注意，当顾客要求兑换外币的时候要特别留心。民防部门要求我们特别警惕持有人民币纸币的客户。如果你遇到这样的客户，请触发无声警报，并尝试在不引起客户怀疑的情况下拖延时间。

original:
Shift Closing  Notes 10/18/77
________________________
Several Large-sum wire transfers today.  We need to notify the feds in the AM.

You'll need to replenish large bills. Payday is coming up.

Another complaint about the voice-activated locks in the safety-deposit room. Dorothy came in to fetch Bern's will and we couldn't get the box open because his voice was the only one configured for authorization. I figure it's a long shot, but I told Dorothy to go home and see if she has any holotapes or such of Bern talking. We might get lucky and fool the lock into opening if we play it back in there.
translation:
交班记录 10/18/77
________________________
今天有好几笔大额电汇。我们需要赶在上午完成工作。

你需要补充大量现金。快要到发薪日了。

又有人投诉保险箱室的声控锁了。多萝西来取伯尔尼的遗嘱，但是我们没有声音的认证无法打开门。我估计这不是立马就能解决的，但我还是叫她回家找找，看能否发现录着他声音的磁带。把它拿到这里来播放，如果走运的话，或许我们能骗过声控系统，把门弄开。
序列记录——鸟舍间谍地堡

original:
The New Plague and YOU
Copyright and Distributed by Presidential Fitness Program 2059

Know the Signs!
Safeguard yourself and your community by knowing how to identify a person suffering from the New Plague. Common symptoms include:
* Profuse Sweating
* Unexplained Contusions/Swelling
* Massive External Hemorrhaging
* New Ideals, such as socialism

When you believe you’ve come into contact with a person exhibiting one or more or these tell-tale signs, remember to C I R:

C - Confirm Symptoms.  
     Approach the person suffering from symptoms if no Civil or Medical professional is available to do so. Verify that the subject is exhibiting symptoms of New Plague.

I - Isolate!
     Once it’s been established that a case of New Plague may be present, separate yourself and the person exhibiting symptoms from the general population, as the New Plague is notoriously contagious.

R - Report! 
     Report directly to the nearest Federal Fitness Registry of Medical Center and let the professionals handle it from there!

Protect Yourself!
The New Plague is what’s commonly known as a “social disease”. This means that the New Plauge is especially contagious and can be commonly caught in the course of social interactions such as:
* Ice Cream Socials
* Cruising Main Street
* Promiscuous Activity/Sodomy
* Attending Fairs or Festivals

So; what’s the best protection against social diseases?  Why not stay home and enjoy a novel or home-cooked meal? Limiting your exposure to other individuals is the best and more surefire way to avoid contracting the New Plague.

Get Registered!
Did you know that your government can protect you from the New Plague and other biological dangers?  It’s true, and all you need to do is visit your local Federal Fitness Registry. Friendly Federal Professionals will be on hand to take a few minor samples and enter you in the national registry.

Your compliance with the Federal Registry Program not only keeps medical professionals up-to-date on your medical history and status, but contributes to valuable research programs - and makes you eligible for special prizes, such as fuel rations or vacations to exotic domestic locales!
translation:
你与新瘟疫
版权与发布权属于2059总统健康计划

了解征兆！
了解如何识别新瘟疫患者，从而保护自己和社区。常见症状包括：
* 大量出汗
* 不明原因的挫伤/肿胀
* 大量外伤出血
* 新理想，如社会主义

一旦你认为你遇见了一个或更多具有以上症状的人，请记住C I R：

C - 确认症状。
 如果没有民事或医疗专业人员，则接近出现症状的人。确认患者是否表现出新瘟疫症状。

I - 隔离！
 一旦确定可能存在新瘟疫病例，请将自己和出现症状的人与普通人群隔离，因为新瘟疫是出了名的传染性疾病。

R - 报告！
 直接向最近的联邦医疗中心健康登记处报告，让专业人员处理！

保护自己！
新瘟疫通常被称为“社会病”。这意味着新瘟疫的传染性特别强，在社交活动中很容易感染，例如
* 冰淇淋社交活动
* 逛街
* 乱交/鸡奸
* 参加集市或节庆活动

那么，怎样才能最好地预防社交疾病呢？为什么不呆在家里享受小说或家常菜呢？限制与其他人的接触是避免感染新瘟疫的最佳和最可靠的方法。

来登记吧！
你知道政府可以保护你免于遭受瘟疫或是其他生物疾病的威胁么？这是真的，你所需要做的就是去你当地的联邦健康登记处。热情的联邦专家们将会为你提取一些样本，并帮你成功登入国家信息系统。

您对于联邦注册计划的支持不仅可以让医疗专家时刻们对你的情况了如指掌，而且还可以为有价值研究项目起到巨大的贡献——你还可以获得特殊奖励，比如燃料补助，或是到别样风情的景区旅游哦！

original: Evaluate Medical and Social needs of local populace.  Raise awareness of health risks and provide aid on a local need basis.  Assist with Federal Fitness Registry Compliance program.\n\nVolunteers must always uphold the standards of The “Collective Benevolence” program in public and private.
translation: 评估当地居民的医疗和社会需求。提高对健康风险的认识，并根据当地需求提供援助。协助实施联邦健康注册合规项目。\n\n志愿者们在公开和私人场合均要维护“集体福利”的标准。

original: Arrived with first carload of volunteers today; Federal presence is nil. I guess the registry program came and went here at some point. There’s some leftover equipment from them I’ve been authorized to remove from storage and use. We’ve got some basic antibiotics and hygiene supplies, and a couple boxes of New Plague awareness pamphlets. Not much to work with yet, but we were at least able to get settled into the motel. For now I’ll focus on setting up our outreach center with Victoria while the rest of our volunteers get out into the community and get a feel for their situation here.
translation: 今天随第一批志愿者到达；没有联邦代表出席。我猜测登记程序已经开始有一段时间了。他们剩下了一些设备在仓库里，我已获准可以拿去用了。我们获得了一些基本抗生素和卫生物品补给，以及几箱子新的防疫小册子。目前没多少可以做了，但是我们至少在汽车旅馆住下了。现在我和维多利亚要集中精力建设我们的外部信息中心。其他志愿者外出去社区，感受一下他们这里的气氛吧。

original: The location we were given as our outreach center was a joke. The place is half-built and what’s been put together so far looks like it’s going to fall in on itself anytime. The real estate company wasn’t much help. I sent a request for some field supplies so we can set up an outdoor center until this situation can be improved upon. My volunteers are telling me that a lot of the area lacks basic infrastructure, so we’ll probably want to get started with some basic vaccines and sanitation supplies. I included some of this on today’s purchase request, but I don’t feel like we’ve got enough of a grasp on the local situation to request much more than that just yet.
translation: 留给我们建设外部信息中心的地方简直像个笑话。这里根本就没建好，简直是随便拼凑的而且看上去随时都会倒塌。房地产公司也帮不上什么忙。我发送了一份请求，想要块儿地，这样的话我们可以在这里情况好转之前先建设好我们的户外信息中心。我的志愿者们告诉我，这里很多地方都缺少基础设施。所以，我们可能的从基本的疫苗和医疗设施做起。我把其中的一些列在了今天的采购单中，但我觉得以这里的条件，想弄到这些来开始我们的工作似乎不太容易。

original: We staged our first outreach event today, which didn’t go well. The majority of the population in the central area of Point Lookout are transplants from nearby urban centers - lots of contracted construction workers, support staff for local businesses, a handful of business people involved in the construction projects.  We’re here to help the rural population who don’t have a pot to piss in, but those people don’t seem to come into town.  We need to re-evaluate our efforts.  The local populace seems recluse.  We’ll have to get creative with our outreach.
translation: 我们今天举行了第一次外展活动，但并不顺利。望海崖中心区的大部分居民都是从附近的城市中心迁移过来的--有很多合同制的建筑工人、当地企业的后勤人员、少数参与建筑项目的商人。我们是来帮助那些无处撒尿的农村人口的，但这些人似乎并不愿意进城。我们需要重新评估我们的努力。当地人似乎很孤僻。我们必须创造性地开展外联活动。

original: Victoria was badly wounded today. She took a truck of supplies out to the Ark & Dove Cathedral beyond the river. Most of the locals we want to help are living in primitive dwellings in the wetlands.  The Cathedral offered the closest public building to that area. She wasn’t in much state to give details, but it sounds like nobody was around when she arrived. She ventured into the swamps to try and make contact with locals at one of the shacks out there. The paramedics are treating a wound on the back of her head.  She’ll be okay, but it sounds like her skull was fractured. Victoria doesn’t remember anything beyond blacking out. There was nothing stolen from her person or the medical supplies, but I’m still going to err on the side of caution and forbid volunteers from wandering out there alone.  We’ll do the best we can from here.
translation: 今天维多利亚受了重伤。她当时正开卡车往河对岸的方舟与和平鸽大教堂送一批补给。我们的援助对象大多还住在湿地中那些很原始的房子里。是教堂是那一片周围最近的公共住房。目前的状况来看是没法从她那里知道更多细节了，但是听说当她到那里的时候，那里空无一人。她想要进入沼泽中和其中一座棚屋里的当地居民联系。而现在留给医护人员只有位于她后脑的一处伤口。她会好起来的，但听说她的头骨骨折了。昏过去之前的事情她都记不得了。她随身的物品以及补给都没有被偷，但是我出于小心起见，将会禁止志愿者们单独前往那里，我们这里还会尽最大努力处理一切的。

original:
Safeguard yourself and your community by knowing how to identify a person suffering from the New Plague. Common symptoms include:

* Profuse Sweating
* Unexplained Contusions/Swelling
* Massive External Hemorrhaging
* New Ideals, such as socialism
translation:
学会如何辨别一个感染了新瘟疫的人，保卫你和你的社区，新瘟疫的常见的症状有：
* 过度流汗
* 无法解释的挫伤或是肿胀
* 大量的外部出血
* 出现新的意识形态，比如社会主义

original:
When you believe you’ve come into contact with a person exhibiting one or more or these tell-tale signs, remember to C I R:

C - Confirm Symptoms.  
     Approach the person suffering from symptoms if no Civil or Medical professional is available to do so. Verify that the subject is exhibiting symptoms of New Plague.

I - Isolate!
     Once it’s been established that a case of New Plague may be present, separate yourself and the person exhibiting symptoms from the general population, as the New Plague is notoriously contagious.

R - Report! 
     Report directly to the nearest Federal Fitness Registry of Medical Center and let the professionals handle it from there!
translation:
一旦你确定你遇见了一个或更多具有以上症状的人，请记得“CIR”三个字母：

C - 确认症状。 
     如果没有医疗专家的情况下，亲自接近这该人，确定其表现出新瘟疫的症状。

I - 隔离！
     一旦确定可能出现新瘟疫，介于新瘟疫的高度传染性，将你自己和疑似瘟疫患者与公众隔离开。

R - 报告！ 
     直接向最近的联邦医疗中心健康登记处报告，并且让专家们去处理这一切。

original:
The New Plague is what’s commonly known as a “social disease”. This means that the New Plague is especially contagious and can be commonly caught in the course of social interactions such as:
* Ice Cream Socials
* Cruising Main Street
* Promiscuous Activity/Sodomy
* Attending Fairs or Festivals

So; what’s the best protection against social diseases?  Why not stay home and enjoy a novel or home-cooked meal? Limiting your exposure to other individuals is the best and more surefire way to avoid contracting the New Plague.
translation:
新瘟疫通常被称为“社会病”。这意味着新瘟疫的传染性特别强，在社交活动中很容易感染，例如
* 冰淇淋社交活动
* 逛街
* 乱交/鸡奸
* 参加集市或节庆活动

那么，怎样才能最好地预防社交疾病呢？为什么不呆在家里享受小说或家常菜呢？限制与其他人的接触是避免感染新瘟疫的最佳和最可靠的方法。

original: Did you know that your government can protect you from the New Plague and other biological dangers?  It’s true, and all you need to do is visit your local Federal Fitness Registry. Friendly Federal Professionals will be on hand to take a few minor samples and enter you in the national registry.\n\nYour compliance with the Federal Registry Program not only keeps medical professionals up-to-date on your medical history and status, but contributes to valuable research programs - and makes you eligible for special prizes, such as fuel rations or vacations to exotic domestic locales!
translation: 你知道政府可以保护你免于遭受瘟疫或是其他生物疾病的威胁么？这是真的，你所需要做的就是去你当地的联邦健康登记处。热情的联邦专家们将会为你提取一些样本，并帮你成功登入国家信息系统。\n\n您对于联邦注册计划的支持不仅可以让医疗专家时刻们对你的情况了如指掌，而且还可以为有价值研究项目起到巨大的贡献——你还可以获得特殊奖励，比如燃料补助，或是到别样风情的景区旅游哦！

original:
Task Details - Point Lookout Survey Expedition
Roach, Martin J.
<For Your Eyes Only>
Dr. Roach - 

On behalf of The Bysshe Company, thank you for accepting this contract.  You will be posing as a research intern, reporting to Principal Geologist Caroline Saunders.  Her experience with wetlands excavation makes her the only real suitable candidate.  However; Saunders is a known liberal with academic ties.

We have only recently acquired excavation rights in the area.  We believe that the mass burials of the American Civil War in this region have made the soil ripe for our purposes.  This is the very same reason we are apprehensive about Saunders' liberal leanings

Your primary mission is to prevent Saunders from discovering the link between Point Lookout's bloody past and its probable richness in natural bio-gas resources. Code Blue protocols are authorized per your discretion.  Saunders must be prevented from hampering this resource at every cost.
translation:
任务详情 - 望海崖勘测考察
罗奇，马丁 J。
<仅供你一人查看>
罗奇博士 

谨代表彼希公司感谢您接受这份合同。你将以实习研究员的身份，向首席地质学家卡罗琳·桑德斯汇报工作。她在湿地挖掘方面的经验使她成为唯一真正合适的人选。然而，桑德斯是一名众所周知的自由主义者，与学术界关系密切。

我们最近才获得该地区的挖掘权。我们相信，美国内战时期在这一地区的大规模埋葬已经使土壤成熟，适合我们的目的。这也是我们对桑德斯的自由主义倾向感到担忧的原因。

你的首要任务就是要防止桑德斯博士发现望海崖那血腥的过去，与可能丰富的天然生物气体资源之间的联系。你已被允许在你认为必要的时候启用蓝色代码协议。要不惜一切代价阻止桑德斯破坏这一资源。

original:
CODE BLUE PRO#%COL
FOR IMMEDIATE IM>>EMENTATION
[|///]
[We b@(ieve Saunders has made contact <corruption> academic contact.  Wire communication records ^^^^^^ that Saunders is attempting to #$(*KLL lye concentrations associated with decomposed <corruption>.  Enact Code Blue Protocol, leave no evidence.]
[]
[REPEAT: Enact Code &#}} Protocol]

MEMLEAK HD00AX
translation:
蓝色代码xie#%yi
立即生>>效
[|///]
[我们xi@ng信桑德斯已经和 学术机构。无线电通讯记录Bi@o明，桑德斯准备 #$(* 除掉她使用高浓度分解。执行蓝色代码协议，不要留下证据。]
[]
[重复：执行蓝 &#}} 代码协议]

存储泄露 HD00AX

original:
Michaelson,

I know that this facility was built to withstand the unique pressures of suboceanic earthen construction, but recently I have had a few concerns about the integrity of the initial work. My staff have noticed more than a few leaks without logical source and it has a number of them very nervous and I have to say, I share their apprehension. 

Grohlman at the facilities office assures me that the pumps and pressure regulators will keep this facility dry and clean for hundreds of years on their internal batteries, but given his history with this sort of thing, I'm not exactly comforted by his claims. I am hoping that you can find an inspector with the proper clearances to give us an independent evaluation of the lab. An outside certification will make us all feel better.

Thanks,

Dr. Stewart
translation:
麦克尔森,

我知道，这设备的建立是为了抵挡海底土制建筑的压力，但是最近我开始关心起了初期工程的完整性。我的工作人员发现了不止一处泄漏，而且找不到原因，这让他们很担心。而且我得说，我和他们一样。

设备办公室的格罗尔曼向我保证，那些泵和压力调节器以它们目前的电量，足以确保这设备几百年的干燥清洁；但是考虑到他的出事记录，我对这样的说法并不太相信。我希望你可以找到一个有足够权威的调查者，对我们的实验室进行一次独立的评估。相信一位外来的专家会令我们感觉好点。

谢谢，

斯图尔特博士

original:
To All Level Seven Assistants,

It has been brought to my attention that a number of you have been conversing with test subjects during your off hours. This is a reminder that any attempts at social engagement with clinical participants is a violation of facility rule 47. Social interaction interferes with the cerebral infusion, and can cause a number of potential problems once the procedure reaches completion. 

So, once again. Do not speak to participants and be sure to limit any internal monologue to the list found in section 2.3 of your procedure guides when in their presence. I have little patience for shenaniganery.

Dr. Stewart
translation:
致所有的第七级助手们，

我已经注意到你们中的一些人总是在休息时间偷偷跟实验对象聊天。我必须提醒大家，任何与临床试验对象进行的社交活动，都违反了本设施的规章第47条。人际交流会干涉大脑内的注入物，可能会在进程即将结束时引发潜在问题。

所以，我再次申明，不要和实验对象说话，还有在有实验对象在场的情况下，尽量不要提及工序手册上2、3部分所说的内容。我对你们的欺骗已经没有任何耐心了。

斯图尔特博士

original:
Memo To All Staff:

As a reminder, only authorized archive technicians are permitted access to the microfiche library. Several records have gone missing, and I would like them to be returned to the archives immediately. No questions will be asked, assuming their safe return within 48 hours.

Really, people. Find better ways to amuse yourselves. We have work to do down here.

Dr. Stewart
translation:
给所有员工的备忘录：

给大家提个醒，只有经过许可的档案技术员可以进入微缩单片图书馆。许多记录都丢失了，我想要他们立刻回到档案中。只要它们48小时之内回到原位，我就当这事儿没发生过。

真的，朋友们，上其他地方找乐子吧，我们这儿有正经事情要做。

斯图尔特博士

original:
To: Laura Stewart, Head Researcher
From: Adam Tomco, Archivist

Dr. Stewart,

I hate to be a bother, but it happened again. Records 48, 51, and 55 are missing. I know it was Danielson and Peruto. I know it! Those two are always messing with me, and no matter how many reports I file with the main office, they are never disciplined! Ever! You and I both know that it's because Danielson's uncle is married to Senator Calvert's daughter! Can't you stop it? Do something? I can't take this any more! This nepotism makes me sick!

-Adam
translation:
至：劳拉.斯图尔特 ，研究带头人
来自：亚当.托姆科，档案保管员

斯图尔特博士，

我真不想打打扰您，但是又出事儿。第48、51和55号记录不见了。我知道这是丹尼尔森和佩鲁托干的，我知道！他们两个总是给我找麻烦，不管我怎么向总局反映情况，他们从来都不知道约束自己！我们都知道，这就是因为丹尼尔森的叔叔和议员卡尔弗特的女儿结婚了！你就不能管管这事儿么？试试看呢？我对此已经不能忍受了！这样任人唯亲下去，我感到很恶心！

-亚当

original:
To :Adam Tomco
From: Unknown Sender

Hey Rat,

What? You don't like people having a little fun? Huh? Well, we'll see how fun it is for you when you're out on the street looking for work. You tattled on the wrong guy!
translation:
至：亚当.托姆科
来自：未知发件人

你这个告密的小人，

怎么？你不希望别人有自己的一点乐趣么？这样，我们倒是要看看如果你丢了饭碗，到大街上去找工作的时候是不是也会很有趣呢！你找错人了！

original:
By using the data that we collected from the researchers at General Atomics at the close of the Robobrain Project, we've been able to fully mimic the brain suspension and isolation technique that makes the Robobrains function. 

What's better: we've make some interesting advances. It turns out that by manipulating the composition of the biomed gel, we are able to produce a number of effects that were previously thought to be impossible. 

It seems that Dr. Stewart was right. Under the right conditions, a subject not only retains full mental capacity, but can project limited images and even thoughts to other minds when the correct conditions are introduced in the biomed suspension. (Details on this composition can be found in Research Archive 51, Section B) This has profound implications for applications from battlefield technology to civilian criminal interrogation. 

Although, one must wonder if years of isolation in a biogel suspension would eventually introduce psychological abnormalities. This merits further study once the full breadth of the current research is explored.
translation:
我们在脑控机器人工程的末期，从来自美国通用原子公司的研究员那里收集了一些数据。通过这些数据，我们能够充分地模仿大脑避震和离析技术，这也正是脑控机器人的工作原理。

更好的是：我们取得了一些有趣的进展。通过操纵生物医学凝胶的成分，我们能制造出一些原先不敢想象的效果。 

看来斯图尔特博士是对的。在适当的条件下，实验对象不仅能保持完整的心理能力，而且在医用缓冲液状态合适的情况下，它还能向其他思想传输有限的图像甚至是思想。（关于这一组成的细节情况可以在研究档案51的B部分找到）这对战争科技乃至罪犯审讯技术都会产生深远的影响。

然而，依然有问题的是，长期隔绝在医用缓冲液内，可能会使得一个人产生心理上的异常。当研究达到了这样的程度时，这个课题值得继续探究。

original:
Despite the early stage of our research, Dr. Stewart has informed us that Senator Calvert is demanding a full report on our work immediately. It seems that he is sending his brother, a noted researcher in the field of cognitive robotic, to this very lab in order to participate in our study and assist us with the report.

I have to say, I hesitate to show our work to anyone outside the lab. It's still very early and very unstable. It will be decades before we can be sure that the cognitive broadcast technology is stable, let alone ready for implementation.

Perhaps Dr. Stewart can hold off the arrival of Professor Calvert for a few more months. At least that would give us some time to come to better conclusions.
translation:
尽管我们之前的研究已经取得了一定的阶段性成果，斯图尔特博士通知我们，卡尔弗特议员需要一份关于我们目前工作的完整的报告书。看起来他准备派他的兄弟来，他是一位在机器人认知学方面声名卓著的研究者。而且他会带着这份报告来到我们这里参与并指导工作的。

我不得不说我有点犹豫是不是要把我们的进展向这个实验室以外的人透露，现在它还只是初现雏形，而且很不稳定。我们需要数十年的时候才能确定认知广播技术是否稳定，更不要说完成这项工程了。

或许斯图尔特博士可以使得卡尔弗特迟来几个月。至少那可以让我们得出更稳妥的结论。

original:
Ozwaldo,

The footlocker is buried on the island with a single tree in the Dove Delta.  Be careful, I peppered the area with a bunch of fake mounds just incase the Hughes gang finds this location.

Regards
Benny
translation:
奥兹瓦尔多，

军用提箱埋在岛上和平鸽三角洲，它的旁边只有一棵树。你要小心，为了防止休斯的匪徒们发现这里，我事先在这里做了一些伪装的土堆。

致敬
本尼
玛塞拉的日志 - 奥巴迪亚

original: Met local by name of Obadiah Blackhall. He lives in an old manor by himself. Class A manipulator. He solicited me to recover a book, which he claimed to be a family heirloom. The man gives me a bad feeling. I want to investigate this book and his connection to the swampfolk of the region, but he was reluctant when pressed for more information.\n\nUPDATE: Confirmed Blackhall connection with regional beliefs. Appears that a recent ancestor to Obadiah, named Constance Blackhall, acquired obscure text known as Krivbeknih. Not good - have heard mention of the book before. Must destroy.
translation: 我遇见来了当地一个叫奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔的人，他独自一人住在一座旧庄园，当然他应该是个好管家。他请求我为他复原一本书，他说那是他的传家宝。他给我一种很不好的感觉，我想要仔细研究这本书，找出他和这个地区的沼泽住民之间的关系，但是当我问到他更多信息的时候，他总是支支吾吾。\n\n更新：我确定了他和本地的神秘宗教之间的关系。看上去奥巴迪亚的一名近世先祖康斯坦茨·布莱克霍尔，获得了一本隐秘的书，名叫《黯日圣经》。我听说过这本书，据说它是不祥的，必须被毁掉。
玛塞拉的日志 - 托巴尔

original: Ferryman quite a character. Dubious on the Faith, but tolerant at least to hear my ministrations. Seems there's quite a bit more to the man, and he certainly isn't without the smell of sin about him. Will visit periodically while in Point Lookout to preach if he'll have me.
translation: 渡船夫很有个性。对宗教持怀疑态度，但至少对我的教诲持宽容态度。看来这个人还有很多秘密，他身上肯定不乏罪恶的气息。如果他愿意的话，我会定期去望海崖传教。
玛塞拉的日志 - 部落土著

original: Tribal culture occupies major sanctuary to the Faith in region - Cathedral of the Ark & Dove. Would love to mine location for artifacts or any intact texts, but residents openly ostracize outsiders. Have offered to induct me into their tribe. Tempting to undertake their oaths as a ruse to gain access, but moral reservations too great.
translation: 部落土著占据着本地区宗教的圣地—方舟与和平鸽大教堂。我原先想找寻一些这里文物或是尚完好的手稿，但当地居民表现得很排斥外来人。他们想要将我吸收进他们的部落。曾试图按照他们说的宣誓，以此为策略达到目的，但是道德上的违心对我来说实在是难以接受。

original: You have done well to get this far, Agent Jiang. Your payment has been transacted to your next of kin under the pre-text of a ration lottery.\n\nWith deepest regret, however, your life must now be terminated for the good of the People's Republic. Go with dignity, honorable soldier!
translation: 到目前为止你非常的出色，江特工。你的报酬已经被夹在配给票下面送到你家属手里了。\n\n虽然我们表示遗憾，但是为了国家的利益，你现在必须牺牲了。带着尊严离去吧，光荣的战士！
美国国防情报局现场报告

original:
Hunter spent another session in interrogation room B with the surviving crew member from the Chinese spy sub Navy is attempting recovery on.  This guy's demonstrating extraordinary fortitude for a relatively low-ranking grunt. Can't say the Chinese don't make good soldiers out of their boys. I'm sure this one would have gone the same way as his skipper if the cyanide capsule in his molar hadn't been a dud.
 

Hunter requested method B interrogation clearance, so I'm putting through to Quantico for that in the morning.
translation:
亨特又在B审讯室跟那个幸存的中国间谍艇员谈了一阵子，海军正试图打捞潜艇。对于一个相对低级的士兵来说，他所表现得异乎寻常的不屈不挠。不得不说中国训练出的军人都是好样的。我相信如果他臼齿里的氰化物胶囊没有失效的话，他现在早就跟他的艇长一个下场了。


亨特申请了B级审讯许可，所以我早晨得去趟匡蒂科把这事儿搞定。
美国国防情报局现场报告

original:
Federal Agencies have added a new person of interest to our watch list.  

Doctor Jiang is a Chinese National defector.  Naturalization agents in Norfolk processed his defection after jumping over from a merchant ship he was stowed away on.  Jiang was apparently in communication with a US Naval Intelligence contact for some months prior.  He's reportedly brokered an immunity deal in exchange for his help recovering intelligence from the downed submarine off our coast.
 
Jiang is staying in room 1D at the Homestead Motel off the boardwalk.  We're explicitly forbidden from issuing a search warrant against this location, but are authorized to monitor his activities in public.
translation:
联邦机构在我们的监视名单上添加了一个新嫌疑人。

江博士是一名中国籍叛逃者。他是从一艘商船上偷渡过来的，诺福克的归化局为其办理了手续。显然，江在几个月前就与美国海军情报局的一名联络人进行了联系。据报道，他促成了一项豁免权交易，作为交换，他将帮助从我国海岸附近被击落的潜艇上获取情报。
 
江住在木栈道边的如家汽车旅馆1D房间。我们被明令禁止对该住处签发搜查令，但我们有权在公共场合监视他的活动。
美国国防情报局现场报告

original: Wan, Yang. Suspected Chinese Operative.  Previous incarceration, 2062 in Canada suspected in connection with Niagara sabotage.  Yang escaped custody during transport to Albany, NY.  Intelligence reports of Chinese activity in Maryland prompted local search efforts, which yielded an anonymous tip leading to Yang's capture and transfer to Turtledove Detention Camp.  Demonstrates remarkable resistance to interrogation, but yielded **CLASSIFIED**, connecting the Chinese Intelligence community to **CLASSIFIED**.  \n<Admin Notice: File altered by Intelligence Officer SN#182-129>
translation: 杨婉。疑似中国特工。曾因涉嫌尼亚加拉破坏活动，于2062年在加拿大被监禁。杨在被押往纽约州奥尔巴尼的途中逃脱。关于中国人在马里兰州活动的情报报告促使当地展开搜查，并得到匿名举报，杨被抓获并被转移到斑鸠拘留营。杨面对审讯表现出，但提供了**机密**，将中国情报界与**机密**联系起来。 \n<管理员通知：文件被情报官员SN#182-129修改>。
美国国防情报局现场报告

original: Brenner observed suspicious activity after lights out yesterday.  Prisoners apparently snuck into morgue overnight. He had the good sense not to apprehend them before reporting the event. We've known for some time about a septic runoff access point in the basement which would be a good candidate for escapees. The runoff flows southwest of the camp about a quarter of a mile or so.  \n\nWe'll keep a low profile about this and post guards in the area.  They could make their break any night. Meanwhile I'll try and find an excuse to send somebody down there and check it out without arousing suspicion. I'd rather catch them in the act.
translation: 布伦纳昨天熄灯之后观察到了可疑的行为。囚犯们深夜偷偷爬进了太平间。他明智地选择了没有在报告之前逮捕他们。我们对于地下室中那条被腐蚀出来的径流已经了解了一段时间，而这很可能会成为逃犯们的首选。这条径流通往营地西南方向，距离大概是四分之一英里。\n\n我们会对此保持低调并派往这一区域加派安保。他们可能说不定哪天晚上就会逃走的。同时我会试着找个借口派人下去调查一下，而又不引起他们的怀疑。我想，最好是能将他们当场抓获。
美国国防情报局现场报告

original: Yang succumbed under method D interrogation during the afternoon.  Medical examiner called in and verified cause of death as natural for the records. She's filed away in the morgue downstairs for now, locker TD-0181. We're running out of space down there and may need to do a disposal early this quarter.
translation: 今天下午杨没能捱过审讯方案D，已经叫法医开了自然死亡的证明。她现在躺在楼下的停尸间里，柜号TD-0181。下面已经快没有空间了，可能这个季度要进行一次清理。

original: Protocol Codes: CONFIRMED\n\n**Engineer must engage Failsafe Switch to confirm Self-Destruct
translation: 自曝密码：已确认\n\n**工程师必须启动故障保险开关以确定自爆。

original:
CLASSIFIED DIRECTIVES
CHINESE NAVAL COMMAND
Mission Parameters: 
Routine Patrol/Observation

Vessel SSN-37-1A is ordered to patrol hostile waters between:
+38° 3' 36.00",   -76° 18' 36.00"
+37° 49' 41.61", -76° 0' 37.02"
+37° 5' 60.00",   -76° 1' 12.00"


Variations from patrol are tolerated as required by evasive circumstances. Crew is under strict instruction not to engage enemy if detected. Self-destruct protocol must be initiated in event of imminent capture. Status updates are required at six hour intervals by one-way burst comm on orbital frequency #K17.18.v121.
translation:
机密指令
中国海军司令部
任务参数： 
例行巡逻/观察

舰艇SSN-37-1A被要求巡逻敌方水域范围：
+38° 3' 36.00", -76° 18' 36.00"
+37° 49' 41.61", -76° 0' 37.02"
+37° 5' 60.00", -76° 1' 12.00"


根据规避情况的需要，可允许与巡逻时间有出入。机组人员严格遵守指示，一旦发现敌情，不得与之交战。如果即将被俘，必须启动自毁程序。每隔六小时需要通过轨道频率#K17.18.v121单向突发通信更新状态。
玛塞拉的日志 - 离开联邦？

original: I've done what good I can here. Need to get out before it catches up with me. Was able to barter passage on a boat headed south. Don't know where I'll end up, but that's the nature of His work.
translation: 我在这里已经尽力了。我得在它追上我之前离开这里。我用以物易物的方式搭上了一艘向南航行的船。不知道我最终会去哪里，但这就是他的工作性质。
玛塞拉的日志 - 匹兹堡？

original: Took shelter with a merchant caravan during a windstorm. More worrying tales from The Pitt. I wonder if my purpose will take me there one day? For now I must continue eastward to the Commonwealth.
translation: 在暴风雨中与商队一起避难。匹兹堡的事更令人担忧了。不知道有一天，我的目的会不会把我带到那里？现在，我必须继续向东前往联邦。
玛塞拉的日志 - 首都废土

original: Tobar tied the Duchess up in the Capital Wasteland. I spent the afternoon trading at a place called Rivet City. Broke bread with a Father Clifford. Inspirational to see another believer of the Faith. Must make my way back here soon.
translation: 托巴尔把狡诈女公爵号停泊在首都废土。我下午在一个叫铆钉城的地方做买卖，跟克利福德神父吃了顿饭。非常高兴能再见到又一个笃信教义的人。我必须尽快回到这里。

original: Blue -\nCouldn’t raise you on the phone this morning, so I’m having Jenny bring you this note. Your delivery for the store got turned around on those new roads and had an accident. He’s run off the road by the Cathedral. They’ll need some time to sort things out, but Pagano probably won’t want to wait that long to replace the lighthouse’s beacon bulbs. You might want to get over to the wreck yourself and hand-deliver the bulbs.
translation: 布鲁 -\n今天早上电话联系不上你，所以我让珍妮把这份记录带给你。你那给店里送货的人在新修的路上转弯，出了车祸。他冲出了大教堂边的路面。他们需要一些时间来处理，但帕加诺可能不想等那么久，来更换灯塔的灯泡。你最好亲自去趟车祸现场，亲自把灯泡送过去。
玛塞拉的日志 - 玩家

original: Was able to intercept an outsider Obadiah had sent after Krivbeknih. I only hope my appeal to goodness was enough - I can't pay what he's offering.\n\nI'll pray for the outsider's survival... and that the Krivbeknih finds its way to me, not Blackhall.
translation: 我截住了一个被奥巴迪亚派去寻找《黯日圣经》的外乡人。我希望我对上帝的祈祷足够虔诚，他所要求的我实在是难以实现。\n\n我会祈祷那个外乡人能够活下来……还有我能先找到《黯日圣经》，而不是布莱克霍尔。

original:
Hey,

Those tribals cut your head up good, didn't they? Happened to us all, and you're lucky you've still got most of your marbles.

Anyway, if you ever want to get rid of that scar, just ask me up at the Ark & Dove Cathedral. I've got a few tricks I picked up, and it's easier than trying to work on it yourself.

- Nadine
translation:
你好，

那些部落土著把你开了瓢，是吧？我们都经历过，你应该庆幸你现在还能用脑子想事儿。

无所谓了，你如果想要弄掉这块疤，就找我帮忙好了，我在方舟与和平鸽大教堂。我学了点手艺，这样一来可比你自己弄容易多了。

- 娜丁

original: I think I have to be going.
I'll go see the Transcendent Master, now.
translation: 我现在就去见至高无上的主人。

original: Can you share your secret to getting them to grow?
translation: 你能分享一下让它们生长的秘诀吗？

original: If you're headed back there anyway, how about I ride along for just 250 caps?
translation: 要是你非要回那去，让我用250个瓶盖搭个便车如何？

original: Do you mean those people living in the old Cathedral?
translation: 你是指那些住在老教堂里的家伙吗？

original: Why did they take your book?
translation: 他们为什么要拿走你的书？

original: You really seem to hate the swampfolk.
translation: 看来你真的很讨厌那些沼泽民。

original: What's wrong?  What did the letter say?
translation: 有什么不对？信上说什么？

original: Obadiah Blackhall sent me. I have a letter.
translation: 奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔派我来的，我这有封信。

original: Obadiah Blackhall sent me. I have a letter.
translation: 奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔派我来的，我这有封信。

original: The house looked abandoned, I just wandered in.
translation: 这屋子看来已经荒废了，我进去看看。

original: What do you expect me to do?
I'm sorry, I think you have to do this on your own.
translation: 很抱歉，我觉得你应该自己去做这件事。

original: I'll do it, Obadiah.  There's no reason for you to die.
translation: 我来吧，奥巴迪亚。你没有理由去死。

original: That can't be the only way to destroy it.
translation: 这不可能是摧毁它的唯一办法。

original: There must be something we can do.  We have the book.
translation: 我们一定能做点什么。书在我们手上啊！

original: I'm sorry, Obadiah, but it's true. The book is here, with me.
translation: 很抱歉，奥巴迪亚，但这书真的在这里，就在我这。

original: The Krvibi had it, I took it, and now she's dead.
translation: 这本来是卡维碧的，现在在我手上，她已经死了。

original: She asked me to steal the Krivbeknih. When I returned, she was dead.
translation: 她此前拜托我去把黯日圣经偷过来。当我回来时，她已经死了。

original: They killed her, Obadiah.  I'm sorry.
translation: 她已经死了，奥巴迪亚。我很抱歉。

original: Marcella said something about the Krivbeknih. I'm supposed to go look for it.
translation: 玛塞拉说了一些关于黯日圣经的事，我该去找找这书。

original: Tell me about the mine, Kenny.
translation: 告诉我关于矿井的事，肯尼。

original: Tell me about this mine, Kenny.
translation: 告诉我关于矿井的事，肯尼。

original: Does this tonic really cure anything at all?
translation: 这种活力水真的能治好什么病么？

original: Why exactly should I help you, again?
translation: 我到底为什么还要再帮你？

original: Okay, what do we need first?
translation: 好吧，我们首先需要什么东西？

original: Yeah, I can fix it. No charge.
translation: 是的，我可以修好它，不要钱。

original: I'll get it working like new, but I want 200 caps.
translation: 我可以让它工作得像新的一样，但我想要200个瓶盖。

original: I can fix it up. Let's call it 100 caps of work?
translation: 我可以修好它，代价是100个瓶盖。

original: Your still could stand to be fixed up.
Why did you fake being sick?
Did you build that still yourself?
What do you think of Point Lookout?
I want to know more about you.
translation: 我想知道更多关于你的事情。
我们来谈谈恢复药剂的事吧。

original: You're faking. We both know it. So let's just cut to the chase.
translation: 你在装，我们心里都有数。来吧，让我们开门见山地说吧。

original: I'm sorry, I guess I just haven't heard of that illness. Maybe I can help.
translation: 很遗憾听到这些，我想我从来没听说过这种病。或许我能帮你。

original: I've treated enough illnesses to know there's no such thing as Orange Fever.
translation: 我治过的病太多了，知道根本没有什么橙热病。

original: Yeah? I've got the mauve plague. So let's just try not to cough on each other.
translation: 是么？我也得病了，是紫瘟。所以我们尽量都不要对着彼此咳嗽吧。

original: Orange Fever? That sounds bad. Can I help?
translation: 橙热病？听起来很糟糕。我能帮忙吗？

original: Twenty wild Punga Fruit, just for you.
Here, take ten of these refined Punga Fruit.
Why don't you two just talk it over?
translation: 你们俩为什么不谈谈呢？

original: I'm so sick of you. Both of you.
translation: 你们两个真是，太恶心了！

original: No way I'm paying that. I'll stay here.
translation: 我不会付这个钱的。我就留在这里。

original: I'm kind of busy. Find her on your own.
translation: 我有点忙，你自己找她吧。

original: I can't promise anything, but I'll look for her.
translation: 我不能承诺什么，但我会去试着找找。

original: Dad taught me never to accept rides from strangers.
translation: 我爸爸告诉我，永远不要任由陌生人摆布。

original: I might be. What's so special about Point Lookout?
translation: 我或许有。望海崖有什么特别之处么？

original: Nice boat. You must have seen a lot of places with it.
translation: 真是条不错的船，你一定开着它去过了好多地方吧。

original: Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
translation: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

original: A girl named Nadine caught a ride on your ship. Any idea where she is?
translation: 一个叫娜丁的女孩搭过你的船。知道她现在在哪吗？

original: What can you tell me about your daughter?
translation: 关于你的女儿你能告诉我些什么？

original: I talked to your daughter, but she says she can't come back yet.
translation: 我跟你女儿谈过了，但她说她现在还不打算回来。

original: Got Nadine back, safe and sound.
Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
translation: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

original: No really, tell me about yourself.
Tell me more about Point Lookout.
translation: 告诉我更多关于望海崖的事。

original: Do you know anything about Point Lookout?
translation: 你知道什么关于望海崖的事吗？

original: Where did the Punga Fruit come from?
How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你们怎么搞到那么多膨葛果种在这里的？

original: Why do you grow so much Punga here?
translation: 你为什么要种那么多的膨葛？

original: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你们怎么搞到那么多膨葛果种在这里的？

original: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你们怎么搞到那么多膨葛果种在这里的？

original: So? It's smoke. Things burn down all the time. Especially around me.
translation: 那么？这不过是烟而已。每时每刻都有东西烧着，尤其在我周围。

original: Should I be worried? What's over there?
translation: 我应该担心吗？那儿有什么？

original: How do you survive in here all alone?
translation: 你是怎么一个人在这种地方活下来的？

original: Why are you hiding down here?
Tell me about Old Man Herzog.
translation: 告诉我关于老赫尔佐格的事情。

original: What's it like living in Point Lookout?
translation: 生活在望海崖是什么感觉？

original: Settle down. I'm not going to hurt you.
translation: 冷静点，我不会伤害你的。

original: What do you mean, you weren't "born right"?
translation: 你这是什么意思？你说你 “生下来就是个错误”？

original: Why did you run away from home, Kenny?
translation: 你为什么要离家出走，肯尼?
告诉我关于你的事，肯尼。

original: Cut the crap, kid. That light show isn't scaring anybody.
translation: 废话少说，小子。这光线不会伤害任何人。

original: Ghost? Where? We'd better get out of here!
translation: 僵尸？在哪？我们最好离开这儿。

original: So the traps and noises, that was all you?
translation: 那么，这些陷阱和声音都是你弄出来的？

original: I had something I wanted to ask you...
Why did you attack the mansion?
translation: 你们为什么要袭击那座宅邸？

original: Why would they want to attack the mansion?
translation: 他们为什么想要攻击这公馆？

original: Did you tell the Tribals to attack the mansion?
translation: 是你让部落的人攻击公馆的吗？

original: What do you know about the Tribals?
translation: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

original: What do you know about the Tribals?
translation: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

original: What does this tribe believe in?
What does this tribe believe in?
What do you do in this tribe?
translation: 你在这个部落里做什么？
告诉我关于你的部落的事。

original: Any chance of getting more training?
translation: 有什么得到更多训练的机会么？

original: Do you know why the Tribals were attacking?
translation: 你知道那部落为什么要发动攻击么？

original: How does Professor Calvert control the Tribals?
translation: 卡尔弗特教授是怎么控制部落的？

original: What does the Cogwave Jammer do?
What do you need me to do again?
translation: 你接下来还想要我干嘛？

original: That big wheel down by the docks, right?
translation: 码头边上的那个大轮子，对吧？

original: So, how do we shut him down?
Oh, I can't wait to hear this.
translation: 哦，我都已经等不及要听听了。

original: What do you want me to do?
There'd better be something good at the end of this.
Right, right. You're mean, we get it.
translation: 是的，没错。我们都看出来了，你很小气。

original: Maybe you should watch your tone, old man.
So, now you want me to do something else, right?
translation: 那么，现在你想让我做别的事，是么？

original: You know this guy? What's going on here?
translation: 你认识这家伙？这是怎么回事？

original: So, who is this brain thing, anyway?
translation: 那么，这个“元首”到底是谁？

original: Nice curtains. Could you try not to bleed on them when I kill you?
translation: 真是漂亮的窗帘啊。我可不想你的血弄脏了这些窗帘，能配合下吗？

original: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
translation: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。

original: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
translation: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。
我找到你的泰迪熊了。<撒谎>

original: Okay. I'll go get it for you.
translation: 好吧，我会帮你把它搞到手的。

original: I'm still looking for your teddy bear.
translation: 我还在找你的泰迪熊呢。

original: Tell me more about this Book that's so important.
translation: 告诉我更多关于那本书的事，这很重要。

original: What should I be doing again?
Can we discuss the Blackhall situation?
translation: 我们能谈谈布莱克霍尔的情况么？

original: Did it work? Is the ritual complete?
translation: 这管用么？仪式完成了么？

original: You again? Why couldn't I hallucinate someone who's not a moron?
translation: 又是你？我的幻觉里面为什么就不能出现一个智力正常的家伙呢！

original: What happened to me? Why does my head hurt so much?
translation: 我怎么了？我的头怎么那么疼？

original: Sure. Do some crazy ritual. Whatever.
translation: 当然，做一些神经兮兮的仪式，等等。

original: You really think they'll just let me in like that?
translation: 你真的认为他们会就这样让我进去？

original: What sort of reward are you offering?
Okay, but how can I infiltrate them?
translation: 好吧，但我怎么混进他们中间去呢？

original: What do you want me to do about the Tribals?
translation: 关于那部落，你想让我做什么？

original: The Tribals want me to do some ritual before they'll let me in.
translation: 那部落要我举行某种仪式才可以进去。

original: Oh, okay. Verily, I shall taketh your test. And I shall, um, succeedeth!
translation: 哦，好吧。事实上，我会接受你的测试，而且，我会，嗯…成功的！

original: I'm not so sure about this. Tell me more.
translation: 我对这个不是很确定。多告诉我一些吧。

original: I have no fear. I will take your test, and I will be victorious!
translation: 我没有恐惧。我会接受你的测验，而且我一定会获胜！

original: Seriously? "The threshold of transcendence"? Just let me in, already.
translation: 当真？“无我之境”？让我进去就好。

original: I seek the wisdom of your people. May I join your tribe?
translation: 我在寻找了你的子民的智慧。我可以加入你的部落么？

original: Nadine, your mother asked me to find you.
translation: 娜丁， 你妈妈让我来找你。

original: Any chance you're going home now?
They may have killed her twice. It was pretty messy.
translation: 或许她死了两次。这真她妈混乱。

original: I'm pretty sure I just saved your life, you know.
translation: 我十分确定我刚刚救了你的命，你知道的。

original: You round up Ghouls for slaughter? Isn't that... unethical of you?
translation: 你把那些尸鬼集中起来全杀了？你这样不是……太不道德了吗？

original: What if we get overwhelmed? How do I get out?
translation: 如果我们输了怎么办？我怎么逃出去？

original: Do you have weapons for me to use?
translation: 你有什么武器可以给我用的么？

original: Tell me more about the Safari.
translation: 告诉我更多关于狩猎的事情。

original: Let's go over the Safari again.
I'm a bit short on caps at the moment.
translation: 我现在手头没那么多瓶盖。

original: Here's 1,000 caps. Let's get this show on the road.
translation: 给你1000个瓶盖，我们开始吧。

original: Neat! I want some of it.
What's so great about his stuff?
translation: 他的东西有什么了不起的？

original: Calm down, there. You'll make a mess.
translation: 冷静点，你会把事情搞糟的！

original: No. You were right not to trust me. Die.
translation: 不，你不相信我是对的。死吧！

original: It happens to us all. Let's go.
translation: 碰巧就落到我们头上了。走吧！

original: Because I wanted to. Just like I want to kill you now.
translation: 因为我乐意。就像我现在乐意干掉你一样。

original: I figured it was the best way to get him to drop his guard.
translation: 我认为这是让他放松警惕的最好办法。

original: Because I'm done taking orders from you. After this, we're through.
translation: 因为我受够了听从你的指挥了。从现在开始，我们没关系了。

original: Very nice. Now can you say "please don't kill me?"
translation: 很好，你现在能说“请别杀我”么？

original: And I'm supposed to help you for free?
translation: 那么说我应该免费帮你么？

original: And now you'll pay for it with your life.
translation: 现在是你拿命来偿还的时候了。

original: I don't take orders from anyone.
I just wanted to see you up close when I told you I was going to kill you.
translation: 我只是希望当我告诉你我要干掉你的时候，你乖乖地靠过来。

original: I've been looking for you. I'm not going to side with this crazy brain thing.
translation: 我一直在找你。我不会支持这个疯狂的“元首”的。

original: I'm tired of you pushing me around, Desmond.
translation: 我受够你的摆布了，德斯蒙德。

original: Wait, what? You're going to kill yourself?
It doesn't sound like you're having much fun here.
translation: 听起来你在这里过得不是很高兴。

original: I need to know where he's at.

translation: 我该到哪儿去找杰克逊？

original: How do you lead the tribe?
translation: 你是怎么领导这个部落的?

original: I might be able to help you. But first I want to know more.
translation: 我想我可以帮助你，但我需要先多了解一些事情。

original: I can't promise anything, but tell me more.
translation: 我现在不能承诺你任何事，但你可以先多告诉我一些事情。

original: What have you got against the Ghoul?
Useful? What are you using the tribe for?
translation: 有用？你打算用这个部落做什么？

original: How did you come to lead this tribe?
translation: 你是怎么成为这个部落的首领的？

original: Why was Jackson talking to you?
translation: 杰克逊为什么要跟你谈话？

original: May I meet the Transcendent Master?
translation: 我可以见见至高无上的主人吗？

original: You mean, you're not really the one in charge of the tribe?
translation: 你的意思是，你不是这个部落真正管事的？

original: I just wanted to meet the Tribal leader.
translation: 我只想跟部落的首领见一面。

original: I was drawn to your eternal wisdom.
translation: 我被你永恒的智慧所吸引了。

original: I've got the yeast with me.
This enough Punga Fruit for you?
This enough Punga Fruit for you?
This enough Punga Fruit for you?

translation: 我们来谈谈补药的事吧。

original: What's the status on the tonic?
Can we make another batch of tonic?
translation: 我们能再做一批补药么？

original: Can we make another batch of tonic?
translation: 我们能再做一批补药么？

original: I'm ready. Let me know what you need for your tonic.
translation: 我准备好了。告诉我你的补药需要什么。

original: Okay, I'll bite. What do we need?
translation: 好吧，我要了。 我们需要些什么东西？

original: I haven't decided. I'll let you know.
translation: 我还没决定。我会告诉你的。

original: Why would I do that? We're buddies, you and me!
translation: 我怎么会那么做？你跟我可是好伙伴啊！

original: I might be. Motivate me not to.
translation: 或许吧。拿点诚意打动我。

original: That brain contacted me. He wants me to destroy the Jammer.
translation: “元首”联系了我，他让我摧毁干扰器。

original: I have some questions about what I'm supposed to be doing.
translation: 关于我要去做的事，我有些问题要问。

original: I'd like to buy a ticket.
Then let's go in there and do this.
I need some time to get ready.
It's great to see you alive! I was worried.
translation: 看到你活着真是太棒了！我一直在担心你。

original: I'm really tired of being a pawn in this game, Desmond.
translation: 我真的不想再当棋子了，德斯蒙德。

original: What kind of failsafe are you talking about?
translation: 你说的是哪种失效保护？

original: I'll let you know when I decide what to do.
translation: 我决定怎么做的时候再来找你。

original: I'll do it. Desmond will die.
translation: 我接受。德斯蒙德的生命到此为止了。

original: How about I kill you instead?
Killing you is going to be more fun than killing Desmond.
translation: 我觉得干掉你比干掉德斯蒙德更有意思。

original: Before you kill me, I have questions.
translation: 你动手之前，我有几个问题要问。

original: I guess I should have seen this coming.
All in a day's work. Now share your wisdom with me!
translation: 天天如此。现在，跟我分享一下你的智慧吧。

original: I wanted to show Desmond that no one pushes me around.
translation: 我要让德斯蒙德知道，没人能摆布我。

original: That's right. So, what do I get for it?
translation: 有道理。那我能有什么好处呢？

original: So, are you going to stab me in the neck?
translation: 那么，你要在我的脖子上刺个洞？

original: I'll go crazy soon enough if you keep talking like that.
translation: 你再这么说，我很快就会疯掉的。

original: Heads cut open? What are you talking about?
translation: 脑袋被切开了？你在说什么啊？

original: Nice to meet someone else who isn't crazy.
translation: 能碰见另一个神志清楚的家伙还真是幸运啊。

original: Any place you recommend in Point Lookout?
translation: 望海崖有什么值得一去的地方么？

original: What do you know about Desmond?
translation: 你对德斯蒙德知道多少?

original: Those idiots let me in with open arms. I have the location of their leader.
translation: 这些白痴就这么毫不设防地让我进来了，我已经找到他们的首领在哪了。

original: I'm in. I found out where their leader is hiding.
translation: 我进去了。我发现他们的首领躲藏的地方了。

original: Why should I work with you, again?
translation: 为什么我要跟你再一次共事呢？

original: Shouldn't be here. Roger that, I'm out of here.
translation: 不该在这里。收到，我走了。

original: I thought this occult nonsense was below you.
translation: 我还以为你不懂荒谬鬼事呢。

original: I usually hide my bodies in the river, but this is nice, too.
translation: 我一般把尸体藏在河里，但这里也不错。
玛塞拉死了，你这冷酷无情的混蛋。

original: Marcella's dead, actually. I figured you had something to do with that.
translation: 实际上，玛塞拉死了。我想你和这件事有关。

original: What do you make of all the bones and dolls on sticks around here?
translation: 你怎么看待附近那些插在棍子上的骨头跟人偶？

original: Shouldn't you be at the Cathedral with the Tribals?
translation: 你不是应该在大教堂跟部落的人在一起么？

original: The Faith? Let me guess - another doomsday cult?
translation: 信仰？让我来猜猜 — 又一个末日教派？
见到你很高兴， 玛塞拉。

original: You both give me a headache. I need to think about it.
translation: 你们两个真让我头疼。我需要考虑一下。

original: Nah. I think I'll kill you.
Fine. I'll do it. Desmond will die.
translation: 好的，我会去干掉德斯蒙德。

original: What is with you two anyway?
translation: 你们两个身上到底有什么？

original: What sort of reward are we talking about here?
translation: 现在方便讨论一下报酬吗？

original: My dad always said, "Never trust a disembodied brain."
translation: 我爸爸总是说，“永远别相信没有肉体的脑袋”。
我们不能把话说清楚吗？

original: Oh, you've got to be kidding me.
translation: 哦，你一定是在跟我开玩笑吧。

original: That's right. And what do I get for it?
translation: 这就对了。那么，我能得到什么好处？

original: Now Desmond knows that no one pushes me around.
translation: 现在德斯蒙德应该清楚，没人可以摆布我了。

original: All in a day's work. Now, share your wisdom with me!
translation: 一天的功夫。现在，跟我分享一下你的智慧吧。

original: I wanted to talk about you, Haley.
translation: 我想谈谈你的事情， 哈利。

original: Where do you get your stock from?
So, how long have you had this store?
translation: 你这家店开了多长时间了？
你一般做什么人的生意？

original: Can you repair some things for me?
Show me what you have for sale.
translation: 让我看看你有什么货卖？

original: Actually, I already took care of it.
I'm short on caps at the moment...
translation: 我现在手头没那么多瓶盖。

original: That was fun! Can we do it again?
translation: 真有趣，我们能再来一次么？

original: I'd like to do the Safari again.
I don't like the sound of this. I'm out of here.
translation: 我不喜欢这种声音，我要走了。

original: Remind me not to mess with you.
translation: 记得提醒我离你远一点。

original: So, now what are you going to do?
How do I know you're telling the truth?
Can you get rid of my scar?
translation: 你能把我的疤给去了么？

original: Guess you and plants think alike, huh?
translation: 或许你跟这些植物想到一起去了，是吧？

original: Do you have some secret farming trick?
I love digging in the dirt, but I never can get anything to grow right.
translation: 我喜欢在地上挖洞，但我从来都看不到有什么正经东西从里面长出来。

original: Can you share your secret to getting them to grow?
translation: 你能分享一下让它们生长的秘诀吗？

original: Nah, I don't want to hang out with a little kid. Thanks anyway.
translation: 不，我不想跟一个小屁孩混在一起，谢谢。

original: Good instincts. You can't trust me.
translation: 出色的直觉。你的确不能相信我。

original: Sorry kid, I'm not in the teddy bear retrieval business.
translation: 对不起，小子，我可不是专门管泰迪熊的。

original: There must be some way to prove I'm on your side. Besides, aren't you lonely?
translation: 一定会有某些办法证明我是站在你这边的。对了，你不寂寞么？

original: I'm not going to hurt you. I just need a hideout from time to time.
translation: 我不会伤害你的，我只是有时需要个藏身的地方而已。
我们再玩一次吧，好不好？

original: Oh come on! Don't be a dork face. It'll be fun!
translation: 哦，拜托！别一脸傻样，这会很有趣的！

original: This seems like a good hideout. I could use a place to crash and stash my gear.
translation: 这看起来是个不错的藏身之处。我可以在这里存放我的装备。

original: So Kenny, what do you want to be when you grow up?
translation: 那么，肯尼，你长大以后想做什么呢？

original: Where'd you learn how to make traps like that?
translation: 你从哪儿学会像这样制作陷阱的？

original: You're starting to annoy me, kid.
translation: 你开始令我不爽了，小子。

original: Your toys might work on the locals, kid. But not me.
translation: 你这些玩具或许唬得住本地人，小子，可唬不到我。

original: Not really, I usually bludgeon first and ask questions never.
translation: 算不上吧，我一般用拳头解决问题，很少说话。

original: What do I get in the bargain?
He has, as a matter of fact.
translation: 事实上，他已经这样做了。

original: Maybe. So what if he has?
Krivbeknih? What are you on about?
translation: 黯日圣经？你到底在说些什么？
奥巴迪亚可是会付给我钱的，你呢？

original: Why do you want it so badly?
If I recover the book, I'll consider bringing it to you.
translation: 如果我找到书了，我会考虑带来给你的。

original: I don't know what you're talking about, woman. Step aside.
translation: 我不知道你在说什么，女人。闪开。

original: A woman named Marcella told me to bring her the book.
translation: 一个叫玛塞拉的女人让我把书带来。

original: You have the caps, you get the book.
I haven't decided what I'm going to do with it yet.
translation: 我还没决定该怎么处理它呢。

original: Okay, that's enough tag for now.
translation: 好了，捉迷藏已经玩得差不多了。

original: On second thought, maybe I'll pass.
translation: 我又想了一下，或许我应该放弃。

original: On second thought, maybe I'll pass for now.
translation: 我又想了一下，或许我现在应该放弃。

original: I'm not scared of anything. Let's do it!
translation: 我什么都不怕，我们来吧！

original: Any idea where Nadine might be?
translation: 你大概知道娜丁可能会在哪儿么？
跟我说说布莱克霍尔庄园吧。

original: So, you wanted help getting your book back?
translation: 所以，你想有人帮你拿回你的书？

original: Your family is named after this place?
translation: 你的家族名字源自这里？

original: What do you think of Point Lookout?
What do you think of the locals?
translation: 你对这些本地人怎么看？

original: You said you're not from around here?
Did you set this campsite up?
translation: 是你建立这个营地的么？

original: I want to know about your beliefs.
translation: 我想知道关于你信仰的事情。

original: How did you become a missionary?
translation: 你是怎么成为传教士的？

original: I'd like to hear a passage.
Sounds like just another cult to me.
translation: 我听起来像是另一种崇拜。

original: My mother had a favorite passage from the Bible. Revelation 21:6 - recognize it?
translation: 我母亲最喜欢《圣经》中的一段。启示录21:6 - 认得吗？

original: How about I save us both the effort and say she's probably dead?
translation: 不如这样吧，我们彼此都省点力气，告诉自己她多半已经挂了。

original: How will I get back afterwards?
What will you do now that he's dead?
translation: 现在他死了，你准备怎么办？

original: What are you doing down here?
You're a dead man, you son of a bitch.
So it's true? Why did you do it?
translation: 这是真的么？你为什么要这么做？

original: Enter data aboard the survey vessel.

translation: 布莱克霍尔的黑暗心灵

original: Retrieve the Blackhall Family's Book from the ritual site.
translation: 从举行仪式的场所找回布莱克霍尔家族之书。

original: Return the Krivbeknih to Obadiah OR Marcella.
translation: 把黯日圣经还给奥巴迪亚或是玛塞拉。

original: Take the Krivbeknih to Obadiah OR Take it to the Dunwich Building in the Capital Wasteland.
translation: 把黯日圣经交给奥巴迪亚或将其带回首都废土的敦威治大楼。

original: Retrieve the Krivbeknih from the ritual site.
translation: 从举行仪式的场所找回黯日圣经。
调查玛塞拉的死亡现场。

original: Return the Blackhall Family's Book to Obadiah.
translation: 把布莱克霍尔家族的书交给奥巴迪亚。
把黯日圣经还给玛塞拉。

original: Take the Krivbeknih to the Dunwich Building in the Capital Wasteland.
translation: 把黯日圣经带回首都废土的敦威治大楼。

original: Bring Marguerite ten Refined Punga Fruit, or twenty Wild Punga Fruit.
translation: 带给玛格丽特十个优质膨葛果或者二十个野生膨葛果。

original: Bring Marguerite three bags of Yeast.
translation: 带给玛格丽特三袋酵母。

original: Bring Marguerite 24 bottles of Purified Water.
translation: 带给玛格丽特二十四瓶纯水。
带给玛格丽特六个裂变电池。

original: Collect Moonshine from Marguerite when the batch is done brewing.
translation: 当酿制完成的时候记得去玛格丽特那里取私酿酒。

original: Recover the dead Chinese spy's mission debriefing from the locker in Point Lookout.
translation: 从望海崖的储物柜中找回已故中国间谍的任务简报。

original: Use the password holotape to access safety deposit box 1207 at the Point Lookout Bank.
translation: 使用密码全息磁带访问望海崖银行的1207号保险箱。

original: Search for clues about the fate of Agent Yang.
translation: 搜寻有关杨特工命运的线索。

original: Investigate Agent Yang's fate at the Turtledove Detention Camp.
translation: 调查杨特工在斑鸠拘留营的最终下场。

original: Activate the Chinese submarine self-destruct protocol.
translation: 启动中国潜艇的自爆程序。

original: Return to the Motel Safehouse Terminal for further instruction.
translation: 回到汽车旅馆安全屋的终端处以获取进一步指示。

original: Use the Cryptochromatic Spectacles and Sequence Note to access the Spy Bunker.
translation: 使用加密光谱眼镜与记录的密码进入间谍地堡。

original: Investigate the spy at Motel Room 1D.
translation: 调查汽车旅馆1D号房间的间谍。

original: Recover the dead Chinese spy's locker key from motel room 1D.
translation: 从汽车旅馆1D号房间取回已死中国间谍的储物柜钥匙。

original: Listen to the Espionage Debriefing Holotape.
translation: 听取间谍活动简报全息磁带。

original: Recover the Cryptochromatic Spectacles from the Toilet Tank in Motel room 1D.
translation: 从汽车旅馆1D号房间的厕所水箱中找到加密光谱眼镜。

original: Seek the Spy's extraction details and payment in the spy bunker.
translation: 在间谍地堡内搜寻间谍的脱身详情和报酬。

original: Confirm Submarine Self-Destruct by activating the Failsafe Lever.
translation: 使用安全解除控制杆启动潜艇自爆程序。

original: Get clear of the Submarine before it self-destructs!

translation: 肃清通往望海崖的路线。

original: Rest during the trip to Point Lookout.
translation: 在前往望海崖的旅途中休息一下。

original: Help the mansion's owner repel the invaders.
translation: 帮助公馆的主人击退入侵者。

original: Block off the breach upstairs in the West wing.
translation: 封锁西侧楼上的突破口。

original: Block off the breach in the East wing.
Fend off the last of the invaders.
Investigate the Tribals at the Cathedral.
Collect seeds from the giant Punga plant.
translation: 从巨型膨葛植株上收集种子。

original: Talk with Desmond about his offer.
translation: 跟德斯蒙德谈谈他的提议。

original: Find the location of the Tribal leader.
Find more information from the tribe's leader.
translation: 从部落首领那里了解更多信息。
了解更多关于“元首”的事情。

original: Return to Desmond with the information.
translation: 把得到的信息告诉德斯蒙德。

original: Install the Cogwave Jammer on the Ferris Wheel.
translation: 把脑波干扰器安装到摩天轮上。

original: Install the Cogwave Jammer on the Ferris Wheel OR use the Trash Compactor to destroy it.
translation: 把脑波干扰器安装到摩天轮上或者使用垃圾压缩机摧毁它。

original: Use the Trash Compactor to destroy the Cogwave Jammer.
translation: 使用垃圾压缩机摧毁脑波干扰器。

original: Return to Desmond when you're ready.
translation: 当你准备完毕后，回去找德斯蒙德。

original: Travel with Desmond to the Professor.
translation: 跟德斯蒙德一起去见教授。

original: Kill Desmond OR kill the Professor.
Talk to the Professor OR kill the Professor.
translation: 和“元首”谈谈，或者杀了他。
找到德斯蒙德并阻止他。

original: Kill Desmond OR kill the Professor.
Enter the arena and signal Plik to begin the Safari.
translation: 进入角斗场，并向普利克发出信号开始狩猎。
在普利克的狩猎活动中存活下来。

original: Pay Plik 1,000 caps to participate in his Safari.
translation: 付给普利克一千个瓶盖以参加他的狩猎活动。

original: Let Plik know you survived the Safari.
translation: 告诉普利克你从角斗场中活下来了。
对蒸馏器不进行任何操作。
对开关不采取任何操作。

original: I'm not ready to leave yet.

translation: 开始前往望海崖的旅行

original: I'm not ready to leave yet.
Throw the Cogwave Jammer into the compactor.
translation: 把脑波干扰器扔进压缩机。
对压缩机不进行任何操作。
对蒸馏器不进行任何操作。
对电路不进行任何操作。
对通风口不进行任何操作。
[修理: 30] 使得通风口停止工作

original: Press the Krivbeknih to the Obelisk's surface.
translation: 将《黯日圣经》按在方尖碑表面。
对方尖碑不进行任何操作。

original: This is to make add the feral ghoul reaver visual effects.
translation: 这是为了增加狂尸鬼劫掠者视觉效果。

original: Bysshe Energy Partners\nNatural Gas Survey Vessel\nUSS Ozymandias
translation: 彼希能源伙伴\n天然气勘测船\n美国海军 奥西曼提斯号

original: USN Field Ops MD-PL-01a (dom.)\nLt Krumfolz, DIA officer/Liason
translation: 美国海军战地行动MD-PL-01a (dom.)\n克鲁姆霍尔茨中尉，国防情报局官员/里亚森

translation: 译码 k.v1910-mkIV\n许可证等级 GAMMA\n... 安全传送

zhi pà you xin rén

zhi pà you xin rén

translation: 圣奥宾医疗设备\n资料部

original: St. Aubin Medical Facility\nSecurity Terminal Options
translation: 圣奥宾医疗设备\n安保终端选项

translation: 望海崖人民银行\n黑岛持股子公司

translation: 圣奥宾医疗设备\n安保终端选项

translation: 审讯报告\n* 各人员必须通过指挥人员将所有情报上报指挥系统

original: Call this when the mansion siege is completed, to trigger the next step of DLC04MQ01
translation: Call this when the mansion siege is completed, to trigger the next step of DLC04MQ01

original: Marguerite has asked me to collect ingredients for her tonic whiskey.
translation: Marguerite has asked me to collect ingredients for her tonic whiskey.

original: Marguerite is brewing some whiskey.  I should check back when it's done.
translation: Marguerite is brewing some whiskey.  I should check back when it's done.

original: Player is told about Punga and Riverboat
translation: Player is told about Punga and Riverboat

original: Player has agreed to search for Nadine
translation: Player has agreed to search for Nadine

original: Player talks with Tobar about going to Point Lookout
translation: Player talks with Tobar about going to Point Lookout

original: Player agrees to go to Point Lookout with Tobar
translation: Player agrees to go to Point Lookout with Tobar

original: Player uses the bed in the boat - move boat to new world
translation: Player uses the bed in the boat - move boat to new world

original: Tobar welcomes you to Point Lookout
translation: Tobar welcomes you to Point Lookout

original: Player arrives at the Mansion, gates close
translation: Player arrives at the Mansion, gates close

original: Player has come to the Mansion, and heard he has to go inside
translation: Player has come to the Mansion, and heard he has to go inside

original: Post Onslaught, Desmond goes to talk to player
translation: Post Onslaught, Desmond goes to talk to player

original: Player agrees to the plan and receives info from Desmond
translation: Player agrees to the plan and receives info from Desmond

original: Player reports to the Cathedral, is told about ritual
translation: Player reports to the Cathedral, is told about ritual

original: Player has acquired seeds from the Mother Pod
translation: Player has acquired seeds from the Mother Pod

original: Player passes out and wakes up outside the bog, post-hallucinations
translation: Player passes out and wakes up outside the bog, post-hallucinations

original: Player returns to Cathedral, is welcomed as member
translation: Player returns to Cathedral, is welcomed as member

original: Player is welcomed into the tribals
translation: Player is welcomed into the tribals

original: Player learns Jackson is not there, and where to find him
translation: Player learns Jackson is not there, and where to find him

original: Player has reported back to Desmond, and is told to track down Jackson
translation: Player has reported back to Desmond, and is told to track down Jackson

original: Player triggers Jackson/Brain scene in the sea cave
translation: Player triggers Jackson/Brain scene in the sea cave

original: Jackson leaves the scene uninterrupted, or player has talked with him and dismissed him - the brain notices the player and talks to him (or waits to talk to him, until the player approaches close enough).
translation: Jackson leaves the scene uninterrupted, or player has talked with him and dismissed him - the brain notices the player and talks to him (or waits to talk to him, until the player approaches close enough).

original: HIDE & SEEK -- Kenny hiding, player seeking
translation: HIDE & SEEK -- Kenny hiding, player seeking

original: HIDE & SEEK -- player hiding, Kenny seeking
translation: HIDE & SEEK -- player hiding, Kenny seeking

original: Thousands of Confederate prisoners of war died near Point Lookout in the later years of the American Civil War.
translation: 美国内战后期，数以千计的南军战俘死在望海崖附近。

original: Point Lookout's swamps are rich in natural gases, which sometimes manifest on the surface as explosive methane bubbles.
translation: 望海崖的沼泽富含天然气，常常以易爆的沼气泡的形式浮出其表面。

original: The Turtledove Detention camp was built near Point Lookout because of its isolated location.
translation: 斑鸠拘留营就建在望海崖附近，得益于那里与世隔绝的地形.

original: The Ark & Dove Cathedral is named for two English settler ships which landed near Point Lookout in 1634, leading to Maryland's founding.
translation: 方舟与鸽子大教堂因1634年两艘英国移民船在望海崖附近登陆而得名，这两艘船促成了马里兰州的建立。

original: Point Lookout is said to be one of the most haunted locations in Maryland.
translation: 望海崖据传是马里兰州最常闹鬼的地点之一。

original: Blackhall Manor was the ancestral home of a wealthy family before the Great War.
translation: 布莱克霍尔庄园是一个富裕家族的祖业，其历史可以上溯到大战之前。

original: The Calvert Family had a long history in Point Lookout, but Calvert Mansion is all that remains of their legacy.
translation: 卡尔弗特家族在望海崖的历史相当悠久, 但现在只剩下卡尔弗特公馆这一处产业了。

original: Point Lookout remained very rural and isolated until the Isla Negra real estate company purchased land and began developing new homes and attractions.
translation: 在黑岛实业公司购买土地并开始开发新住宅和旅游景点之前，望海崖仍然是一个非常偏僻的乡村。

original: Smugglers roam Point Lookout, hoping to find their fortune scavenging this relatively undisturbed desolation.
translation: 私掠者在望海崖终日游荡，在这片荒芜之地上拾荒，渴望发一笔横财。

original: Swampfolk have no organized society or creed, but seem to mark their territory with totems of wood and bone.
translation: 沼泽居民没有社会组织也没有信仰，但看起来他们会使用木头与骨头搭建的图腾来标示自己的领土。

original: Point Lookout's rural location shielded it from direct impact during the Great War, but the resulting fallout has irradiated the area in the intervening years.
translation: 望海崖处于偏远的地理位置使得它幸免于大战的直接摧残，但核子尘却在其后的岁月中污染着这片土地。

original: The Swampfolk denizens of Point Lookout are the product of exposure to heavy radiation and generations of poor breeding.
translation: 望海崖的沼泽居民是长期暴露在重度辐射下以及世代低下的繁殖力的产物。

original: The unchecked forces of erosion have carved sinkholes and grottoes throughout Point Lookout.
translation: 泛滥的腐蚀之力在望海崖的地下蚀刻出了众多的坑道与山洞。

original: Mirelurks thrive in the humidity of Point Lookout's coastal shores and viciously defend their territory.
translation: 泥沼蟹族群在望海崖潮湿的海滩环境下繁衍壮大，并凶悍地捍卫它们的领地。

original: Coastal shipwrecks and buoys are good places to seek sunken riches.
translation: 沿海的沉船与浮标是探索财富的好地方。

original: With the Superior Defender Perk, the player gains +5 to their damage and +10 to their armor rating while standing still.
translation: 有了“超级防御者”额外能力，玩家在站立不动时将获得5点伤害加成与10点护甲加成。

original: With Swing For The Fences you'll do an additional 10 points of damage while any one or two handed melee weapon is equipped.
translation: 掌握孤注一掷能力时，玩家在装备任意单手或双手近战武器时，将得到10点伤害加成。

original: Protect what's important.  With the Gray Matters perk you'll receive 25% less damage when hit in the head.
translation: 保护重要的部位。有了“灰质影响”额外能力，当你头部被击中时，受到的伤害会降低25%。

original: You have learned to exploit the specific weaknesses of ghouls, and gain a +5 damage bonus when attacking one.
translation: 你掌握了尸鬼的特殊弱点，并将在与它们的战斗中获得5点伤害加成。

original: After hours of studying, you've finally learned to exploit a mirelurk's weaknesses and gain a +5 damage bonus while attacking one.
translation: 经历了数小时的学习之后，你终于发现了泥沼蟹的弱点，并在与它们战斗时获得五5点伤害加成。

original: Behold the power of the Punga! The restorative effects of Punga fruit now have a greater effect on you.
translation: 瞧瞧膨葛神力的妙处吧！膨葛果的回复效果大幅提高。

original: Behold the power of the Punga! When harvesting Punga plants, you will receive more fruit.
translation: 瞧瞧膨葛神力的妙处吧！你可以在膨葛树上采集到更多的膨葛果。

original: The large tome set into this lectern must be the Krivbeknih.  It is damp with what appears to be fresh blood.
translation: 诵经台上的这本经书一定是《黯日圣经》。书本潮湿的封面上像是沾满了鲜血。

original: Replacing the Krivbeknih may put you out of harm's way, but Obadiah Blackhall's life will likely be forfeit.
translation: 把这本书放回原处可能可以使你免除灾祸，但是奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔则会完蛋。

original: Marcella's dead body lies here.  A message has been written in her blood: \n\n"Return the Book and You Live."
translation: 玛塞拉的尸体在这里。还有一条用她的血写的信息：\n\n“把书还回去，放你一条生路。”

original: The old moonshine still has several loose fittings and some corrosion, but could be repaired with sufficient skill.
translation: 老旧的私酿酒蒸馏器有几个配件松动，有些腐蚀，但只要有足够的技术就可以修复。
那么，情况将会怎么样呢？

original: There appears to be a functional self-destruct switch, but the mechanism does nothing without proper authorization.
translation: 似乎有一个具有自爆功能的开关，但如果没有适当的授权，该装置将不起任何作用。

original: The Duchess Gambit is ready to begin its trip to the Capital Wasteland.
translation: 狡诈女公爵号已经准备好向首都废土进发了。

original: The Duchess Gambit is ready to begin its trip to Point Lookout.
translation: 狡诈女公爵号已经准备好向望海崖进发了。

original: A riverboat has docked at the mouth of the Potomac, carrying trade from the distant peninsula of Point Lookout. \n\nThe captain offers passage to Point Lookout for any mercenary, treasure hunter, or adventurer looking to explore the new land.
translation: 一艘江轮停靠在波托马克河口，载着来自遥远的望海崖半岛的贸易。\n\n船长为任何想要探索新大陆的雇佣兵、寻宝者或冒险家提供前往望海崖的船票。

original: You must purchase a boat ticket to ride on the Duchess Gambit.
translation: 你必须购买船票才能乘坐狡诈女公爵号。

original: The door to the Ewers' House is locked.
translation: 尤尔斯家的房门是锁着的。

original: This compactor will destroy anything you throw in it.
translation: 这台压缩机将会摧毁你放进去的一切东西。
压缩机没电了，无法工作。

original: The compactor has done its work and is now idling.
translation: 压缩机完成任务，现在处于闲置状态。

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "Isn't it funny how everything you get close to ends up leaving?"
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“你所拥有的一切最终都离你而去，这是不是很滑稽呢？”

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "Blech. If my kid looked like that, I'd abandon it too."
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“哇靠，如果我孩子长成那样，我也会扔了他。”

original: Installing the Cogwave Jammer will scramble Professor Calvert's messages to his followers and enable Desmond to locate him.
translation: 安装好脑波干扰器之后，卡尔弗特教授发给手下的信息就会被干扰，同时使德斯蒙德能找到他。

original: The Cogwave Jammer has been installed.
The Ferris wheel has no power.
translation: 转轮没有电力，无法工作。

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "This doesn't look right, not right at all."
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“这看起来不对，根本不对。”

original: You cannot find any more seeds.
translation: 你无法找到更多的种子了。

original:
Bulletin: Attention Citizens of Point Lookout!

Wan Yang, suspected communist and Chinese sympathizer, has been reported in the vicinity of Point Lookout. Agent Yang may be operating under an alias and/or using a disguise. 

You are required to report any suspicious persons or behavior to Lt. Krumfolz (DIA) at the US Naval Office located at 1811 St. Mary's Branch.
translation:
公告：望海崖居民请注意！

据报告，杨婉，疑似的共产主义者和中国同情者，已经在望海崖周边现身。杨特工可能采用化名和/或伪装。

您必须向位于1811号圣玛丽岔口的美国征兵站的克鲁姆福尔茨中尉（国防情报局）报告任何可疑人员或行为。

original: You've found what's left of Agent Yang. Inspecting the remains closely, you discover a false molar tooth.  There is a microfilm within that must contain the Self-Destruct Codes for the Chinese submarine.
translation: 你找到了杨特工的残骸。仔细检查遗骸后，你发现一颗假臼齿。里面藏有一份微缩胶卷，一定包含了中国潜艇的自毁代码。

original: For some reason, you feel a terrible sense of loss as you look at the familiar lump of gray matter.
translation: 由于某种原因，当你看见那团熟悉的灰色物质时，你感到一种怅然若失的感觉。

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "Tsk. Tsk. Walked right into another trap. Exactly how stupid are you?"
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“不，不，你这是径直走进了又一个陷阱。你怎么可以这么傻呢？”
奥巴迪亚·布莱克霍尔死了。

original: Just being near this Obelisk makes you uneasy.
translation: 光靠近这座方尖碑，就让你感到不安。

original: You lack the skill to perform the repair.
The moonshine still is old, but in the best possible condition for its age.
translation: 私酿酒蒸馏器还是冷的，但是以它的年岁来看，这可能是最佳的状况了。

original: You must have a shovel to dig here.
translation: 要挖掘这里，你必须有一把铁铲。

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "Dead mother, life in a post-nuclear Wasteland and not a friend in it. Yeah, you aren’t exactly blessed."
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“死亡之母，在废土的孤独日子，没有一个朋友。是的，你完全没有得到神灵的眷顾。”

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "This is one situation you're not going to be able to fight your way out of."
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“如今的情况，你只手空拳是无法突出重围的了。”

original: You've found a Schmault-Tec Limited Edition Bubblehead!\n\nThe inscription on the base reads "Keep it up, you're almost there... wherever 'there' may be... probably nowhere."
translation: 你找到了一只避难难所科技的限量版摇头娃娃！\n\n底座上的铭文写着“坚持下去，你已经快到那儿了……‘那儿’是哪儿呢……也可能哪儿也不是。”

original: The "Superior Defender" perk has been added. \n\nYou now do more damage and have better defense when standing still.
translation: “超级防御者”额外能力已添加！\n\n当你静止不动的时候将拥有更好的进攻和防御状态。

original: The "Punga Power!" perk has been added. \n\nYou now receive better effects from eating Punga Fruit.
translation: “膨葛神力”额外能力已添加！\n\n现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将会收到更佳的效果！

original: The "Mirelurk Ecology" perk has been added. \n\nYou now do additional damage against Mirelurks.
translation: “泥沼蟹生态学”额外能力已添加。\n\n现在你可以对泥沼蟹造成额外伤害了！

original: The "Ghoul Ecology" perk has been added. \n\nYou now do additional damage against Ghouls.
translation: “尸鬼生态学”额外能力已添加！\n\n现在你可以对尸鬼造成额外伤害了。

original: You lack the skill to override the circuitry.
translation: 你尚缺少强制控制电路的技能。

original: This circuitry is wired directly into the door. While quite complicated, a skilled technician could override the door controls from here.
translation: 该电路直接连到门上。虽然相当复杂，但熟练的技术人员可以从这里超控门控制装置。

original: You lack the skill to disable the vent.
translation: 你缺少使通风口停止工作的技能。

original: Radiation is being vented into the room through this vent.  With a little skill, it could be disabled, stemming the flow of radiation.
translation: 辐射正在从通风口被排进这个房间。你需要一些技能使得辐射的蔓延停止下来。

original: This Obelisk shares its origins with the Krivbeknih. Just being near it makes you uneasy.
translation: 这座方尖碑和那本《黯日圣经》同源。光靠近它，就使你心绪不宁。

original: Here marks the landing of Captain John Smith's shallop upon his discovery of Point Lookout in 1612.
translation: 这里标记的是约翰·史密斯船长的战船的靠岸处，以及1612年他发现望海崖的记录。

original: The "Punga Power!" perk has been added. \n\nEating Punga Fruit now gives you temporary Action Points.
translation: “膨葛神力”额外能力已添加！ \n\n现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将使你获得暂时的行动值！

original: The "Punga Power!" perk has been added. \n\nEating Punga Fruit now gives you temporary Action Points.
translation: “膨葛神力”额外能力已添加！ \n\n现在你食用膨葛果实的时候将使你获得暂时的行动值！

original: This journal contains a number of observations and insights specific to hunting and fighting Ghouls.
translation: 这份日志中详尽介绍了有关捕猎和与尸鬼战斗的一些观察数据。

original: You have learned to exploit the specific weaknesses of Ghouls, and gain a +5 damage bonus when attacking one.
translation: 你已经学会了利用尸鬼的弱点，增加5点对尸鬼的伤害。

original: At last! The world is rid of that sniveling, disgusting, arrogant, brain!
translation: 终于！世界终于摆脱了那个懦弱、恶心、傲慢的脑袋！

original: Think of it! Everything he learned! Everything he had! It's all here and it's all MINE! MINE!
translation: 想想吧！他所学到的一切！他所拥有的一切！都在这儿，都是我的！我的！

original: I'm busy. What do you want?
Good. More questions. I guess we're best fuckin' friends now.
translation: 很好。还有问题。我想咱他妈现在是最好的朋友了。

original: I wasn't aware that we had anything else to say to each other.
translation: 我不知道咱们还有什么可说的。

original: I knew it! I knew that little bastard was behind all this! After all these years, he's stuck his head out, and this is my chance to cut it off!
translation: 我就知道！我就知道是那个小杂种搞的鬼！过了这么多年，他还是把头伸出来了，这是我斩草除根的好机会！

original: Is there something on your mind?
You're not getting' any ideas, are you?
translation: 你不会有什么想法了吧？

original: Be careful. Professor Calvert's a tricky git.
translation: 小心。卡尔弗特教授是一个狡猾的蠢货。

original: It's me little helper. Don't you have a job to do?
translation: 这就是我的小帮手。你不是有工作要做？

original: Why are you in here starin' at me? Didn't I give you something to do?
translation: 你为什么还站在这里盯着我？难道我没有告诉你你该去做什么吗？

original: You again? Shouldn't you be climbing that wheel?
translation: 又是你？难道你不应该爬进那汽车里？

original: And long last! Desmond is dead! And you... I have YOU to thank for it!
translation: 终于！德斯蒙德死了！而你…我要因此感谢你！

original: How dare you violate my inner sanctum!
I demand that you exterminate Desmond at once!
translation: 我要求你立即终结德斯蒙德！

original: Keep up! He can't be far!
Come on! He can't be far!
Are you ready to go, princess? I've got a rival to kill!
translation: 你准备好了吗，公主？有个竞争者需要我除掉！

original: Are you ready? Who knows what he could be setting up in there!
translation: 你准备好了吗？谁知道他会在那里设置什么？

original: What the hell? Are you ready to go yet?
