translation: 到底怎么了？你还没准备好？

original: That bastard! That... BASTARD! He killed my pups! Nearly killed ME! For WHAT?
translation: 那个混蛋！那……混蛋！他杀了我的小狗！差点杀了我！为什么？

original: He doesn't have the body to fuckin' do it himself, so he tried to blow me up? ME? Well, this ends today. Desmond Lockheart will finally win out.
translation: 他没有身体来他妈的亲自动手，所以他想炸死我？我？好，今天就做个了结。德斯蒙德·洛克哈特终将胜出。

original: I know where he is. He overplayed his hand this time. You and me are going to walk in there and end this.
translation: 我知道他在哪儿。他这次玩过头了。你和我走进去结束这一切。

original: You! You... BASTARD! Betray me? You fuck! You think you can betray.. ME?
translation: 你！你这个…杂种！背叛我？你去死！你以为你能背叛…我？

original: You have one chance. Exactly one chance to fucking redeem yourself in my eyes.
translation: 你有一次机会。确切的说，只有他妈的一次机会，来改变你在我眼中的形象。

original: We are going to go in there, and we are going to end this once and for fucking all. And you will help, or you will be my enemy.
translation: 我们要进那儿去，我们要把这帐一次算清。你要么帮我，要么就是我的敌人。

original: And you do NOT want to be my enemy.
translation: 你不会想要做我的敌人的。

original: Let's go! Before he has time to prepare!
translation: 走吧！趁他还没时间准备！

original: I can smell him! He's just through here!
translation: 我能嗅到她！他就在这儿！

original: At last! The world is rid of that sniveling, disgusting, arrogant brain!
translation: 终于！世界终于摆脱了那个懦弱、恶心、傲慢的脑袋！

original: Think of it! Everything he learned! Everything he had! It's all here and it's all MINE! MINE!
translation: 想想吧！他所学到的一切！他所拥有的一切！都在这儿，都是我的！我的！

original: What are you waiting for? DESTROY HIM!
At long last! Desmond is dead! And you, my friend... I have you to finally thank for it!
translation: 终于！德斯蒙德死了！而你，我的朋友…我要因此感谢你！

original: You shouldn't be here. Get out of my home.
translation: 你不该出现在这里，滚出我的房间。

original: You were paid for your errand. Leave my home. Now.
translation: 你会为你的任务付出代价的。从我家出去。现在。

original: Keep your distance.  What are you doing in my house?
translation: 保持距离，你在我家干什么？

original: Good, good. People should be able to sit and have a conversation, especially in times like these.
translation: 很好，很好。人们应该能够坐下来好好谈谈，尤其是在这种时候。

original: Civil discourse; the greatest of our lost arts. Wouldn't you agree?
translation: 公民论述；我们失传的最伟大的艺术。你同意吗？

original: The book. You've found it. Quickly, give it to me.
translation: 你找到了这本书。快，给我。

original: We had a bargain, roughneck. Hand the book over and collect your fee.
translation: 我们有协定的，无赖。把书拿过来，然后拿走你的报酬。

original: Shouldn't you be halfway to the ritual site by now?
translation: 你是不是现在应该在中途仪式的地方？

original: Well, what can I do for you now?
translation: 嗯，我现在能为你做些什么？

original: Wait a moment. I need to know; has Obadiah sent you in search of a book?
translation: 等一会儿，我需要知道奥巴迪亚给你一本研究中的书？

original: Please; there's nothing for us to discuss until you retrieve that book from the ritual site. You must hurry.
translation: 请便，在你检索这本书中的仪式前，我们没什么好谈论的。你最好快点。

original: Greetings, child. I'm Marcella, missionary and student of the Faith. How are you?
translation: 你好，孩子。我是玛塞拉宗教的传教士和学者。你好吗？

original: ...thing on? Oh, I don't know why I even bother with it.
translation: 事实上？我不知道为什么因他困扰。

original: Hurry and seal that hole from the attic!  If you don't have any grenades then see if there's something nearby you can shoot that will explode!
translation: 赶紧封住阁楼上的那个洞！如果你没有手榴弹，那就看看附近有没有什么东西能让你射爆的！

original: Good things, sweetie. Tonic's brewed and bottled.  Here's your pay and cut of the batch. Enjoy it!
translation: 好东西，亲爱的。补药已经酿造装瓶了。这是你的报酬和你的那份！请享用！

original: Y'ain't have the look of a local, son.  Think you could help a sick woman get on the mend?
translation: 你看着不像本地人，孩子。你能帮助一个生病的女人好起来吗？

original: Y'ain't have the look of a local, young lady. Think you could help a sick woman get on the mend?
translation: 你看着不像本地人，小姐。你能帮助一个生病的女人好起来吗？

original: You said you'd mend the still, sweetie. When did you plan on getting' to that, exactly?
translation: 你说过你要修，亲爱的。到底什么时候计划开始呢?

original: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. For this fee, the tonic had better taste like honey, though.
translation: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。因为这些费用，药剂尝起来更像蜂蜜了。

original: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. You're a peach.
translation: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。你是个美人。

original: Thanks for mending the still, Sweetie. Here's your pay.
translation: 亲爱的，谢谢你的修理。这是你的报酬。

original: Well, if it ain't my favorite out of towner.
translation: 嗯，这不是我最喜欢的外乡人吗？

original: Welcome to Banckom Secure Teller. Vocal authorization requested.
translation: 欢迎来到银行安全出纳，需要语音认证。

original: Safety deposit access granted. Have a pleasant day.
translation: 安全的存款保障。愿你今天愉快。

original: This is a hazardous area. For your own safety, please vacate the premises.
translation: 这是危险的区域。为了你的安全，请先撤离。

original: This is a hazardous area. For your own safety, please vacate the premises.
translation: 这是危险的区域。为了你的安全，请先撤离。

original: So, my hero, huh? Think you came in and rescued me right in the nick of time?
translation: 那么，我的英雄，是吧？你以为你在关键时刻救了我吗？

original: Not hardly. Had it all well in hand, and I didn't even need to use the failsafe.
translation: 几乎没有。一切尽在掌握之中，我甚至都不需要使用失效保护。

original: But that would've done a real number on some of the paintings, so just as well you were here. Anyway, name's Desmond.
translation: 但那会毁了一些画，所以你来了就好了。总之，我叫德斯蒙德。

original: Help me take out these bastards while I figure out a plan.
translation: 帮我击退那些混蛋在我考虑计划的时候。

original: Do you mind? There's a tiny matter of a home invasion that I'm trying to repel.
translation: 你介意吗？我正试图击退一桩小小的入室抢劫案

original: Welcome, my friend! I am Tobar the Ferryman, and this fine vessel is the Duchess Gambit.
translation: 欢迎你，我的朋友！我是船长托巴尔，这艘战舰是狡诈女公爵号。

original: We're just back from Point Lookout, but it won't be long before we set off again. Interested?
translation: 我们刚从望海崖回来，但不久后又要起航，一起么？

original: Welcome to Point Lookout, my friend!
translation: 欢迎来到望海崖，我的朋友！

original: The trip was fine, the weather's nice and damp, and everything out there looks pleasant as ever!
translation: 旅行很不错，天气很宜人，那里的一切看起来都更棒！

original: Looks like nothing's changed since my last visit... except all that smoke I saw on the way in.
translation: 看起来和我上次来没什么变化…除了这路上的烟雾。

original: You! Are you going to Point Lookout? I need your help!
translation: 你！你要去望海崖？我需要你的帮助！

original: My daughter stowed away on the Duchess Gambit a few weeks ago, and I've been worried sick ever since.
translation: 几周前，我女儿乘坐狡诈女公爵号偷渡出去，从那时起我就一直很担心。

original: I haven't heard anything from her, but if you're going there, could you look for her? Please, I'll do anything to help!
translation: 我一直没有她的消息，如果你要去那里，能帮我找找她吗？求你了，我愿意做任何事来帮助你！
在我们出发前有什么问题吗？

original: No, no. Don't try to get up yet. You'll only hurt yourself.
translation: 不，不。不要试图那么做。你这样指挥伤害到自己。

original: You are welcome to our tribe.
Who lingers at the threshold of transcendence?
Return with the wisdom of the Mother Punga, or not at all!

translation: 你有考虑过我的建议吗？
你想从我这里得到什么？

original: Truly, the Mother Punga has bestowed her wisdom upon you, and your mind has been expanded!
translation: 确实，膨葛母亲将她的智慧赐予了你，你的心智得到了拓展！

original: Shh... My meditation requires utmost concentration.
translation: 嘘…我需要非常集中的冥想。

original: Hello? You are... a fellow seeker of the higher planes, perhaps? What brings you here?
translation: 你好？你是……更高层次的求道者，也许吧？是什么指引你来到这的？

original: You certainly make quite an entrance. It's a shame about what's-his-name, but frankly, he would have gotten himself killed, eventually.
translation: 你的确找到了入口。提起他的名字就是一种耻辱，但是坦白的说，他最终是自寻死路。

original: I would have done it myself, if I only had arms to throttle him. Now, let's hope you're more useful than that one, yes?
translation: 我想我可以自己完成它，如果我有力量运转他的话。现在，我只有希望你比那个更有用，不是吗？

original: So, you're the mouse that was scurrying around here? Not much to look at, but at least you're not drooling all over yourself. I can work with that.
translation: 那么，你就是那只到处乱窜的耗子？相貌平平，但至少你没把口水流得满身都是。我可以接受。

original: Now then, perhaps you can be more useful than that simpering spiritualist and his tribe of idiots.
translation: 那现在，也许你能比那个傻笑的巫师和他的白痴部落更有用。

original: Looks like another newbie in the tribe! And still able to string together whole sentences - ain't you the lucky one!
translation: 看来部落里又多了一位新成员！还能把整句话连贯起来——你真是个幸运儿！
你渗透进那些部落了吗？
那么，你还想继续玩下去？

original: Gosh. How'd you find me so fast?
translation: 哎呀。你怎么这么快就找到我了？

original: It's your turn to hide now.
Man, I was sure that was the last place you'd look.
translation: 小子，我确定那是你最后一次看到的地方。

original: He he he. Okay, now it's your turn to hide!
translation: 嘿嘿嘿。好了，现在该你躲起来了！

original: You made it past my traps? Er, I mean: Get out of here, mister! Aren't you afraid the ghost will get you?
translation: 我的陷阱你过的去吗?呃，我的意思是:离开这里，先生！你就不怕鬼抓到你么?

original: You made it past my traps? Er, I mean: Get out of here, lady! Aren't you afraid the ghost will get you?
translation: 我的陷阱你过的去吗?呃，我的意思是：滚开，女士！你就不怕鬼找你么？

original: Welcome! Welcome to my extraordinary Safari. Shall we get you registered?
translation: 欢迎！欢迎来到奇妙之旅。我来给你登记下。

original: You'll find a button inside. Give it a push and we'll get started.
translation: 你会找到一个里面的按钮，按一下我们就能开始了。

original: Tremendous showing! I do hope the experience was worth every cap.
translation: 重大发现！我希望这次经历能够物超所值。

original: Let's commemorate your first safari with a token of our friendship, shall we?
translation: 让我们以此来纪念你第一次狩猎时我们的友谊。

original: This axe was, er, 'misplaced' by one of my other patrons. She won't be needing it anymore, and it's a weapon of gruesome distinction. Enjoy it.
translation: 这斧头是，呃，是我的一个顾客误放在这里的。她不再需要它了，这武器相当卓越。享受它吧！

original: Welcome back. Do we fancy a bit of bloodshed?
translation: 欢迎回来。我们要不来点血腥的？

original: Mr. Plik's really outdone himself this time.
translation: 水疱先生这次真正的克服了自己。
精彩的表演！非常棒的格斗！

original: So you're number three? Well, let's get this thing goin.
translation: 你就是三号？很好，我们来谈个事。

original: You're welcome, by the way. You know, for saving your ass?
translation: 不客气，顺便说一下，拯救你的屁股吗？你知道的。

original: Well, if it isn't my favorite traveler! And oh, what a trip you were on!
translation: 嗯，这不是我最喜欢的旅行者嘛！哦，你的幻觉真精彩啊！

original: Why, when you were under, you should have heard some of the things that came out of your mouth!
translation: 诶呀，当你昏迷的时候，你真该听听你嘴里说的话！

original: But I suppose you're more interested in what came out of your head, aren't you?
translation: 但我想你更感兴趣的，是你脑子里出来的东西，不是吗？

original: This projection device is insufficient for my desires. It disgusts me.
translation: 对我来说，这投影装置远远不够。真恶心。

original: Silence! I have no time for your meaty prattle!
translation: 安静！我没时间和你这肌肉男闲聊！

original: There is too much to contemplate without your pathetic mewling interrupting my important calculation!
translation: 太多需要考虑了如果不是你可怜的喵喵声打断了我重要的计算。

original: Leave me! I have much to plot and plan!
translation: 离我远点！我有太多的策划和计划！

original: Please wait until my meditations are complete.
Pardon me while I commune with the higher planes.
translation: 请原谅我更深层次的交谈。

original: You are new! And you are welcome!
I am Croatoa. I am not so new.
translation: 叫我克罗托亚。我不是新来的。

original: Here to give me a piece of your mind?

translation: 嗯，你这个讨厌的小杂种？

original: Well, hello there! Welcome to... uh... welcome to Haley's Hardware! Where we have... hard... ware...
translation: 哦，大家好！欢迎来到…喔…欢迎来到哈利的五金店！我们这里有…五金…

original: Good to see y'all alive, friend.
translation: 很高兴看到大伙还活着，朋友。
欢迎回到哈利的五金店！

original: Y'all here to buy something? Step right in!
translation: 你来这里是买什么东西的吧？正确的选择！

original: Hey, just in time! Found out who went rooting around in our skulls, and you'll never guess who it was!
translation: 嘿，来得正好！发现谁在我们的头骨里扎根了，你绝对猜不到是谁！

original: As a totally unrelated hint, I'm in charge of his boat, now!
translation: 给一个完全无关的提示，现在他的船归我管了！

original: Guess we never got a formal introduction, huh? Name's Nadine!
translation: 看来我们还没正式介绍呢，哼？我叫娜丁！

original: I know you're not from around here, so what brought you out here? You looking for your fortune or running from your troubles?
translation: 我知道你不是本地人，什么风把你吹来了？你是在寻找财富还是在逃避麻烦？

original: Well, hello there young traveler. The fates had told me that I would receive a visitor today.
translation: 好啊，年轻的旅行者。命运之神告诉我，我今天会接待一位访客。

original: But I'm being rude! I am Madam Panada, and this is Madam Panada's House of Wares! For all things a traveler needs, I am here to provide!
translation: 但我太无礼了！我是帕娜达女士，这里是帕娜达女士的杂货铺！旅客需要什么，我就提供什么。

original: Bullets! Stimpaks! Armor! Weapons! Junk! If you need it, Madame Panada has already anticipated your need and procured it months ago!
translation: 弹药！治疗针！装甲！武器！垃圾！尽情挑选，帕娜达女士已经在月前就预先采购好了你所需要的！

original: Oh, it is good to see you well, young traveler! And what brings you to Madam Panada's?
translation: 哦，真高兴见到你，年轻的旅行者！什么风把你吹到帕娜达女士这了？

original: Oh, I knew you would return. How may Madam Panada assist you?
translation: 噢，我就知道你会回来的。帕娜达女士要怎样帮助你？

original: Greetings once again, young traveler! Do you have a need?
translation: 又见面了，年轻的旅行者！你有什么需要吗?

original: Another new member? What, are we offering a special?
translation: 另一个新成员?什么，给我们提供特殊帮助的吗?

original: Punga may have offered you wisdom, but it looks like it's still going to be a while before you really learn to accept it.
translation: 膨葛会给你提供智慧，但是看起来它还得过一会儿在你学会接受它之前。

original: Until then, you answer to me. I'm Woodrose, the tribe mother.
translation: 在那之前，你对我的答复。我是银背藤，部落之母。
是的，我那所谓任性的孩子?

original: Oh, I hope you can find my Nadine.
translation: 噢，我希望你能找到我的娜丁。

original: Well, if it isn't our hero.
translation: 嗯，这不是我们的英雄嘛。

original: Have you seen Marcella? What did she have to say?
translation: 你看见玛塞拉了吗？她说什么了？

original: It pains me to say it: but thank you.
translation: 我很不愿说出口：但谢谢你。

original: I think our business is concluded.
translation: 我想我们的交易结束了。
放松。她没事…现在是这样…
放松。她没事…现在是这样…

original: Easy, girl. I'll work it out soon...
translation: 别急，女孩；我很快就能弄好…

original: This never fuckin' ends! You and your pathetic threats!
translation: 这他妈永远不会结束！你可你可悲的威胁！

original: Oh, here we fuckin' go again!
And here we are again, I'm so fucking sick of your empty threats.
translation: 我们又来了，我受够了你空洞的威胁。

original: I'll have none of your posturing!
Always so full of talk, Calvert!
translation: 你总是滔滔不绝，卡尔弗特！

original: This never fuckin' ends! You and your pathetic threats!
translation: 这他妈永远不会结束！你和你那可悲的威胁！

original: Oh, here we fuckin' go again!
And here we are again, I'm so fucking sick of your empty threats.
translation: 我们又来了，我受够了你空洞的威胁。

original: I'll have none of your posturing!
Always so full of talk, Calvert!
translation: 你总是滔滔不绝，卡尔弗特！

original: Ug-Qualtoth is returned. Be afraid, worms.
translation: 阿格-奎尔托斯归来了。战栗吧，懦夫们。

original: You are not welcome in this place.
Our business is at an end. Leave this place.
translation: 我们的交易结束了。离开这地方。

original: Would it have killed you to wipe your feet?
Try not to get the filth on you while you're out there.
You should have seen this place thirty years ago.
translation: 你三十年前就该看看这地方。

original: Lots of people out there, but too few trustworthy.
translation: 外面有很多人，但几乎没有可信任的。

original: Did you want to talk?  I won't bite.
Hail Mary, full of Grace, the Lord is with thee. Blessed art thou among women and blessed is the fruit of your womb, Jesus.
translation: 万福玛利亚，你充满圣宠。主与你同在。你在妇女中受赞颂，你的亲子耶稣同受赞颂…

original: You findin' your way around, sweetie?
Ah, I see you have returned to our world once more!
translation: 啊，我看见你又一次回到了我们的世界！

original: In the mood for a bit of violence?
I didn't come here to make friends.
translation: 我来这儿可不是交朋友的。

original: Try not to fall. Nothing down there but dark and rads.
translation: 别摔下去。下面只有黑暗与辐射。
我的东西有帮助，如果你拿去的话。

original: Stay close - we'll both be better for it.
translation: 靠近点，对我们都会好些。

original: I also can do repairs, if'n you need it.
translation: 我也能修理，如果你需要的话。

original: Take a look around. Let me know if you need anything.
translation: 四处看看。有需要告诉我。

original: New people mean new business, so I'm always happy to see y'all.
translation: 新人意味着这新买卖，所以我很高兴见到你们。

original: We don't get a lot of new folks in here.
Always good to see a stranger.
translation: 看见陌生人的感觉很好。

original: The fates have given me a vision of your future... I see you buying quality merchandise at low prices!
translation: 命运让我看见你未来的情景…我看见你用低价买进上等货！

original: The fates have told me that I have something you need. It is upon you to select well.
translation: 命运告诉我我有你需要的东西。问题在于你如何选择好。

original: It is all good merchandise, no? Surely you will need some. Now... or in the future!
translation: 都是上等货色，不是吗？你肯定会需要一些，现在或者不久的将来。

original: If you see something you need, simply ask me!
translation: 如果看到需要的，就告诉我！

original: Welcome, traveler! Stop by, and have a look at the wares! The fates have told me that you have a need...
translation: 欢迎，旅行者！驻足看看这些货物吧！命运已告诉我你会有需要…
欢迎来到狡诈女公爵号！

original: Let your earthly cares slip away, like a pebble in the sea.
translation: 放开你世俗的牵挂，就像让卵石沉入大海。

original: The physical world holds nothing for us. Release any lingering connections to it.
Learn from the Punga. Accept simplicity.
translation: 从膨葛中领悟。接受朴实。

original: Embrace the simple things in life.
Trust in the wisdom of your higher mind!
translation: 相信你内心深处的智慧吧！

original: Submerge your will in the depths of the astral sea!
translation: 让你的意识湮灭在星海的深渊中！

original: New girl, you try too hard. Be calm.
translation: 新来的女孩，你太卖力了。冷静些。

original: Good to see you still here, my child.
translation: 很高兴你还在这儿，孩子。

original: Can I go back to work now?
translation: 我可以回来继续我的工作了吗？

original: We're running out of time. Go!
Now get out of here. Go!

translation: 不要搞得像个陌生人似的。

original: Then away with your tiny insignificance!
Yes, commune with him, while I see to my tribe. There is much to be done!
translation: 是的，我去处理部落时，你去与他交谈。还有很多事要做呢！
求你了，帮我找到我的女儿！

original: I hope you can convince Nadine to come back.
translation: 希望你能说服娜丁回来。

original: Thank you so much for your help.
Be careful out there. Them swamp folk is nasty.
translation: 在外小心。沼泽居民很凶恶。

original: Come back any time, them swamp types are always bringin' me new stuff.
translation: 随时恭候，那些沼泽居民常给我带新玩意来。

original: Hey, before you go. If you ever want to get rid of that scar on your head, just come and see me, okay?
translation: 嗨，你走之前。如果你想去除头上的疤痕，就来找我，好吗？

original: Take the greatest of care in the world, young traveler!
translation: 万事小心，年轻的旅行者！
欢迎再来，年轻的旅行者！

original: Whenever you're ready, just take a rest on the cot in the cabin. We'll be at Point Lookout in no time!
translation: 等你准备好，就到客舱里的简易床上休息吧。我们立马就到望海崖！

original: Blessings to you on your journey.

translation: 愿你找到属于自己的道路。
不会让你死得那么痛快！
很快就会抓到你的，小妞！
很快就会抓到你的，小子！

original: You in the wrong place, girl!
You in the wrong place, boy!

translation: 给我大声叫吧！哈哈哈哈！
我今晚会有一顿大餐了！
打断你的腿会让你慢下来。

original: Imma take my time with you.
Resistance to the will of the Professor is hopeless.
translation: 反抗教授的意志是无望的行为。
进程：实施卡尔弗特保护。
卡尔弗特保护进程初始化。

original: Inner sanctum violated. Initiate attack protocols.
translation: 圣堂内部遭玷污。初始化进攻方案。
实验室被攻破。入侵者闯入。

original: Unfriendly target located. Protection process initiated.
translation: 锁定敌对目标。保护方案进程初始化。

original: Calculating chance of success... less than 5%.
Warning. Continued operation cannot be guaranteed.
translation: 警告。无法保证继续操作的可行性。

original: Put down your weapons and submit to authority.
translation: 放下武器，听从当局处理。

original: Do not be alarmed. Order will be restored soon. Please stand by.
translation: 不要惊慌。秩序将会立刻恢复。请等待。

original: Please take cover until the danger has been eliminated.
Law abiding citizens, please leave the area.
translation: 遵纪守法的平民，请离开此地。

original: They're still moving! Keep it up!

translation: 这一切很快就会结束的！

original: Hey. What's the big idea? I don't mess with your stuff. Don't mess with mine.
translation: 嘿。想干什么？我没碰你的东西。你也别碰我的。

original: Keep your hands we're I can see 'em!
translation: 把你的手放在我能看到的地方！

original: Get your hands out of there!

translation: 犯罪行为一定会被惩罚的。

original: Ah, keep it! I don't need it.
translation: 啊，你要那就拿好了！我不需要了！

original: You'd better get out of here.
You're not supposed to be here.

translation: 警告：附近区域探测到爆炸物。
你根本就不应该来这里！

original: Come at me, and you'll draw back a nub!
translation: 来我这里吧，你将会变成碎片！

original: We gonna bury you in 'dis swamp!
translation: 我们会把你埋在沼泽深处的！

original: You done mess up now, outsider!
translation: 不会再让你把这里搞乱了，入侵者！
哦，孩子！娱乐的时间到了！
我就知道我听见什么了！

original: I heard something. I'm gonna go check it out.
translation: 我听见有响动。我去看看怎么回事。
我还以为我听见什么了…

original: Whatever it was, it's gone now.
translation: 不管刚才是什么，现在已经不在了。

original: Ah, just getting jumpy I guess.
translation: 啊，我想我有点神经紧张了。
好吃好吃！把他们都吃掉！

original: You won't bother anyone ever again.
translation: 你没有机会再给任何人添麻烦了。

original: Split up and search the area.
Let me go take a look around.
You better leave swamp! You hear me?
translation: 你最好趁早离开沼泽！听懂了吗？

original: Aww... Gone? I wanted to play...
translation: 啊…跑了?我还想接着玩呢…
你以为躲起来就能活命？

original: My only secret is patience. If I could share it with you, I would.
translation: 我唯一的秘密就是耐心。如果我能与你分享的话，我会的。

original: Nope. I'm doing just fine on my own. Gonna keep it that way. Find someplace else.
translation: 不。我一个人挺好。要保持这样。找别的地方吧。

original: Oh, I think I can wait a little while longer before I head back. Say, long enough for you to get five hundred caps...
translation: 噢，我想在我赶回去前还可以再多待一会。可能，时间足够你凑够500个瓶盖…

original: *cough* No, sweetie, this is the Orange Fever, and unless I get somebody to help me whip up some tonic, I'm as good as dust for the grave.
translation: *咳嗽*不，宝贝，这是“橙热病”，除非有人帮我弄点补药，不然我就要入土为安了。

original: Well, we got a bargainer here, haven't we? No, dear, it brews just fine as it is, thank you.
translation: 喔，来了个买卖人，不是吗？不，亲爱的，它酿造得和它看起来一样好，谢谢。

original: Nice try. Your payment is coming, and you're not getting a fucking pence until you're done.
translation: 想得美。你的钱就要到手了，在你完成之前，你他妈一个便士都拿不到。

original: Now, did you come here for something, or are you just wasting my time?
translation: 你是找我有事，还只是浪费我时间？

original: Step into the open and identify yourself.
Is someone messin' around over there?
Hmm. I was sure I heard something.
C'mon out, we ain't gonna bite!
translation: 出来吧，我们不会咬你的！
奥利奥利公牛被放出来了…

original: You can't hide from me forever.

translation: 嗨！不要把我一个人留下来！

original: You go first! I'll cover you!
That book is of the utmost importance, we shouldn't be chatting idly.
translation: 那本书至关重要，我们不该如此怠慢。

original: What else do you want to discuss?
No, not them. That lot wants for brains, but they're at least somewhat civilized. The swampfolk have no creed, no morals.
translation: 不，不是他们。他们想吃人脑，但至少还懂点礼貌。这些沼泽居民毫无教条，毫无道德。

original: You must be new here if you don't know the answer to that by now.
translation: 要是你连这都不知道，肯定是新来的。

original: Yes, they're dangerous. They shoot at, smash or try to eat anything that isn't them, and half the time they shoot at each other.
translation: 是的，他们很危险。他们会花费一半的时间进行杀戮，毁坏或者试图吃掉一切异类，还有一半时间，他们互相射击。

original: They may have been men once, but no more.
translation: 他们或许曾经是人，但再也不是了。

original: They think the book has a kind of occult power. Superstition and nonsense, of course.
translation: 他们认为那书有某种神秘力量。当然，这是荒谬的迷信。

original: I suppose larceny isn't enough reason to hate?
translation: 我想绝不单单因为盗窃吧？

original: Good. The fools who stole it believe it has powers, so the thing is probably well-guarded.
translation: 很好。偷书的傻瓜相信它有超能力，所以那东西可能被严密看管着。

original: There's a ritual site east of the boardwalk, in the basement of a ruined house. I think you'll find it there. Bring it back to me, and be paid.
translation: 仪式之地就在木栈道东边，在某栋废屋的地下室里。我想你会在那里找到书。把它带回来，然后我付钱。

original: Long ago, the Blackhall family possessed a terrible heirloom, a book of evil rituals, best forgotten. The Krvibi have their origins in it.
translation: 很久以前，布莱克霍尔家族拥有一个可怕的传家宝，一本最好能被忘却的邪恶仪式之书。卡维碧便起源于此书。

original: The book was stolen years ago, though the Krvibi have never known of the theft. Their fear has kept the Blackhall Family safe these long years.
translation: 这本书多年前被盗了，但卡维碧从不知道失窃之事。他们的恐惧让布莱克霍尔家族这些年来一直平安无事。

original: They'd never be so bold... that foul book is back in Point Lookout, and they must have it! We can't allow them to keep it.
translation: 他们绝不会如此大胆……那本臭书又回到了望海崖，他们一定要得到它！我们不能让他们得逞。

original: Obadiah sent you?  Well, then, let's see what he has to say.
translation: 奥巴迪亚派你来的？好吧，来看看他要说什么。

original: Oh dear... no, no.  This can only mean one thing.
translation: 哦，天哪……不，不。这只能说明一件事。

original: Well, Blackhall Manor isn't abandoned; not yet. At least have the grace to come speak with her owner properly.
translation: 布莱克霍尔庄园没有荒废，暂时还没有。至少还有得体的风度，来同她的主人交谈。

original: The offer stands for now, though I won't abstain from soliciting other help.
translation: 这个请求只目前有效，不排除我有向其他人求助的可能性。

original: We must get it back before the Krvibi learn anything from it.
translation: 我们必须在卡维碧从中学到任何东西之前夺回来。

original: There's a ritual site... I'm certain they'll be hiding it there.  I don't know yet what we must do, but for now it's enough to steal the book.
translation: 有一处仪式之地……我确信他们会将它藏在那里。我还不知道我们该怎么做，但现在只要偷书就够了。

original: Yes, yes. You're right, of course. I... I guess I should begin right away.
translation: 是的，是的。你说得对，当然。我…我应该立刻开始行动了。

original: My friend! This is a truly noble thing you do. You mustn't fail, that book brings nothing but misery and madness to the world.
translation: 朋友！你的行为真是高尚。你不能失败，那书只会给世界带来痛苦与疯狂。

original: There is... another option. I could never make the journey myself, though. North, far to the north.
translation: 确实还有…个办法。不过仅凭我一人无法完成。在北方，遥远的北方。

original: Constance had a brother, Richard Dunwich. He was a wealthy businessman outside of the city to the north, had a company building there.
translation: 康斯坦茨有个兄弟，理查德·敦威治。他是城外北边的一个富商，并在那拥有一栋公司大楼。

original: His obsession with the occult was as great as her own, and there's an object of great evil in that building. The book has been drawn to it before.
translation: 他对神秘学的痴迷程度不亚于她自己，在公司大楼里有件十分邪恶的东西。这本书曾经被它吸引过。

original: To take the book there would destroy it. You would have to take that journey, though, and you must not fail if you attempt it.
translation: 在那就能摧毁这书。不过你需要长途跋涉，一旦开始就绝不容许失败。

original: This isn't some ordinary book we can toss in a fire and be done with.  I can destroy it here and now, but the ritual requires a sacrifice.
translation: 这书不一般，不是扔到火里烧了就完事的。我可以在此时此地毁掉它，但仪式需要牺牲。

original: They'll kill me anyway. Now that they've possessed the book, they'll do anything to get it back.
translation: 无论如何他们都会来杀我。他们已经丧心病狂了，并会不惜一切将其夺回。

original: I fear the Blackhalls are lost. The only thing left to do is to destroy this evil book, and spare the world further harm.
translation: 恐怕布莱克霍尔庄园家族已经不复存在了。剩下唯一要做的就是摧毁这邪恶的书，让世界不再遭受更深重的灾难。

original: I've got to do what Constance should have done in the first place. There's a way to destroy the damned thing, though I will not survive it.
translation: 康斯坦茨一开始就该做的现在由我来完成。有个办法摧毁这受到诅咒的东西，尽管我无法活到那时候。

original: I... I see. Friend, this book is the bane of my Family. Now it seems it will be the death of us, too.
translation: 我…我明白了。朋友，这书是我家族衰败的根源。看来我们也会因此消失吧。

original: I'll be bloody well damned. She was right.  It's back.
translation: 这也太他妈的离谱了。她是对的。它回来了。

original: You have it?  God help us; you do. That damned book is back, and this time it'll be the death of me.
translation: 你拿到了？天佑我们；你得到了。那本该死的书又回来了，这次它会要了我的命。

original: Impossible! That book's been lost to us for generations. You two must have been mistaken.
translation: 不可能！那本书早在我们几代人以前就已经遗失了。你们肯定搞错了。

original: Marcella?  Why?  She's done nothing to them!
translation: 玛塞拉？为什么？她什么也没做！

original: I see. Do what Marcella asks, and pray she's wrong about this.
translation: 我明白了。按玛塞拉说的去做，真希望是她错了。

original: What good are you, then? Take her that letter; she's the only person who might know how to help me.
translation: 这对你又有什么好处呢？带封信给她；恐怕只有她会帮我了。

original: Good job blocking off that hole!  Hurry and get in here!  It looks like they are about to breach from the East wing!
translation: 洞口堵住了！干得漂亮！快进来！看起来他们要从东翼突破了！

original: Hurry! Get in there before more of them come out!  Find where they are coming from and stop them.  Just like before I'll be keeping an eye out.
translation: 快！在更多人来之前进去！看看他们是从哪进来的，阻止他们。和刚才一样，我会一直盯着你。

original: That's one less way for them to get in.  Follow me.  I think we are about to get hit hard.
translation: 他们又少了一条可以进来的路。跟我来。咱们有场硬仗要打。

original: Yeah, here they come.  Grab all the ammo and stimpaks you need.  This is gonna be a rough one!
translation: 耶，他们来了。拿上你所需要的弹药和治疗针。这会很刺激！

original: If you have any mines, now's the time to use 'em. They could come in through any of the boarded up doors at any second.
translation: 是时候用地雷了。那些木板门挡不了他们多久的，随时做好战斗准备。

original: I don't know who you are but you need to help me if you want to stay alive.
translation: 我不知道你是谁，但想活命的话就帮我。

original: They've been at it all night.  I think they are just about to breach the inner walls. Follow me.  I'm going to go check it out.
translation: 他们忙了一整晚。我想他们就快攻破内墙了。跟我来。我们去看看。

original: It looks like they are coming in from somewhere upstairs.  Hurry, follow me!
translation: 看来他们是从楼上进来的。快，跟着我！

original: Go through these doors and up the stairs.  Find where they are coming in and stop them.  I'll be keeping an eye on the cameras down here.  Hurry!
translation: 从这些门上楼。看看他们从哪进来的，阻止他们。我会在楼下盯着的摄像头。快去！

original: Ok, now hurry up and seal that hole. It looks like an explosion should do the trick. Maybe there's something explosive near the hole you can shoot?
translation: 好了，现在快封住洞口。看来一次爆炸足够了。或许洞口附近有什么可用于引爆的东西？

original: Old Man Herzog's Mine-hole?  Isn't much, but it's home!
translation: 老赫尔佐格的矿井？不多，但那是家！

original: What in the world have we tapped into? Sample Site Three is showing bio-gas concentration off the charts!
translation: 我们到底挖出了什么？三号样本站显示生物气体浓度超标！

original: Wetlands substratum is surprisingly dense limestone at all excavation sites, and we've had no trouble locating naturally-formed chambers.
translation: 所有挖掘点的湿地底层都是令人惊讶的致密石灰岩，我们毫不费力地找到了天然形成的洞室。

original: This and the dense calcite formations suggest that subterranean water flow has eroded a vast network of caves and grottoes throughout the region.
translation: 这和致密的方解石层表明，地下水流侵蚀出了整个地区庞大的洞穴和石窟网络。

original: Mapping these will be a monumental effort, and necessary to fully uncover the bounty of natural gas resources captured down here.
translation: 绘制这些洞穴的地图将是一项艰巨的工作，也是充分发掘这里蕴藏的丰富天然气资源的必要条件。

original: What I don't understand is the amount of lye residue we're encountering.
translation: 我不明白的是我们遇到的碱液残留量。

original: I'm going to try and touch base with some of my academic contacts and see if we can find any precedent for it.
translation: 我会尝试与我的一些学术联系人联系，看看能否找到相关先例。

original: We'll have plenty of time to work that out, though; I've no doubt Bysshe will want to set up shop here and drill their little hearts out.
translation: 不过，我们有足够的时间来解决这个问题；我毫不怀疑彼希会想在这里开店，然后钻出他们的小心脏。

original: This is principal geological chemist Caroline Saunders, for Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
translation: 这是首席地质化学家卡洛琳·桑德斯，负责彼希天然气勘测MD-16-001。

original: Consider this my authorization signature on Sample Site three.
translation: 这是我的三号样本站的授权签名。

original: Far as I'm concerned, this is a prime location for bio-gas harvesting, and a treasure trove for some field research.
translation: 在我看来，这里是采集生物气体的最佳地点，也是进行实地研究的宝库。

original: Caroline Saunders speaking, principal geological chemist on Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
translation: 卡洛琳·桑德斯发言，首席地质化学家，在彼希天然气勘测MD-16-001。

original: Preliminary results from Sample Site Two are promising; we're posting similar concentrations as in the first site.
translation: 二号样本站的初步结果很有希望；我们记录的浓度与第一站点相似。

original: Similar bio-gas makeup here as well, including a few organic compounds that I'm not familiar with.
translation: 这里的生物气体构成也很相似，包括一些我不熟悉的有机化合物。

original: We've also discovered heavy lye residue in a naturally-formed chamber at this excavation site.
translation: 我们还在这个发掘点的一个自然形成的腔室中发现了大量碱液残留物。

original: Lucky we were wearing caustics gear to begin with, or somebody might have suffered some serious chemical burns.
translation: 幸好我们一开始就穿戴了腐蚀剂防护装备，否则可能会有人遭受严重的化学灼伤。

original: I'd like to analyze the site further, see if there's any connection between these compounds and the lye deposits.
translation: 我想进一步分析这站点，看看这些化合物和碱液沉积物之间是否有联系。

original: My tech is telling me he needs a couple of hours to work on our ventilator unit. I suppose I'll move on to Site Three in the meantime.
translation: 我的技术人员告诉我，他需要几个小时来处理我们的通风设备。我想在这段时间里，我可以去三号站点了。

original: Further analysis is for my own curiosity, anyway. This is my authorization signature on Sample Site Two.
translation: 反正进一步分析也是为了满足我的好奇心。这是我在二号样本站的授权签名。

original: This is Caroline Saunders, principal geological chemist, for Bysshe natural gas survey MD-16-001.
translation: 这是卡洛琳·桑德斯，首席地质化学家，负责彼希天然气勘测MD-16-001。

original: Sample set one shows promising concentration of bio-gas in mostly limestone substratum of wetlands.
translation: 第一组样本显示，在湿地的大部分石灰岩底层中，生物气体的浓度很高。

original: No exact levels yet, but this site should exhibit more than enough extraction potential to meet survey goals.
translation: 目前还没有确切的含量，但该地点的开采潜力足以达到勘测目标。

original: I'm going to leave a couple of interns here to handle the minutiae, but it's a formality.
translation: 我要留下几个实习生处理这些琐事，但这只是走个过场罢了。

original: I'll move on to the other sites now to make sure this isn't an aberration.  Consider this my authorization signature on Sample Site One.
translation: 我现在要去往其他地点，以确保这不是异常现象。这是我在一号样本站的授权签名。

original: Ok, any second now.  Get ready!
translation: 好了，随时会来。做好准备！

original: Here they come!  Second floor, on the right!
More of them!  On the right, first floor!
The door on the left!  First Floor!
They're at the front door!  Get Ready!
That looks like the last of 'em.  You're a pretty good shot.
translation: 看来是最后一波了。你枪法不错。

original: Oh, just about whatever ails you, sweetie!  A real cure-all.  Say, I don't reckon you're the dry type, is you?  Oh, nevermind.
translation: 无论是什么让你不适，宝贝！真正包治百病。我认为你不是那种干燥的类型，对吗？噢，别介意。

original: Well, I don't rightly expect you to help me out of goodness, though I welcome you to prove me wrong, sweetie.
translation: 好吧，我并不期望你出于好意帮助我，但我欢迎你证明我错了，宝贝。

original: When we brew this batch of tonic up, you'll have rights to a share for yourself, and a payday of 300 caps to boot.
translation: 等我们制好了这批补药，你将可以分得自己的一份，以及开始每日300瓶盖的报酬。

original: We got everything. Now we wait while it brews. Three days should do the trick.
translation: 万事俱备了。现在等着它调制吧。三天应该就够了。

original: Give me some time to brew.
Aren't you a smart one?  Sweeter tonic's better for both of us, after all.
translation: 你不是一个聪明人吗？毕竟，甜一些的补药对我们俩都好。

original: I reckon you've got a deal, sweetie, but I'd better notice a difference in the tonic.
translation: 我认为你做了笔买卖，宝贝，但我最好注意到补药的不同。

original: I reckon I can scrape that together. Go ahead and do what you can for it.
translation: 我认为我能把那弄到一起。去吧，尽力而为。

original: Could it, now?  I suppose you'd know how to see to that, wouldn't you?
translation: 是吗？我想你知道怎么修，对吧？

original: Here I thought you were a quick one.
Look, sweetie, I reckon you'd have shot me as soon as walked in here if you weren't a kind soul or at least an enterprising type.
translation: 听着，宝贝，你若不是个善心人或者至少是一个有胆识的人的话，我认为你一走进这儿就会把我毙了。

original: Nothing you can catch, if that's what you were wondering. Marsh folk catch it all the time. Lucky my family has a special still pot for tonic-makin'.
translation: 不会传染的，如果你正纳闷的是这事。沼泽地的人经常得上。幸运的是我家有一个特殊的蒸馏器，用来做补药。

original: That old thing's been in my family for years and years.
translation: 那个老古董在我家族中流传了很多很多年。

original: Well before the bombs, there was a time folks couldn't get no tonic by law, and my family did okay helping them get what they needed.
translation: 在核弹爆炸前，曾有一段居民们不能依法获得补药的时光，而我的家族很非常乐意帮助他们取得所需。

original: Things aren't wonderful, but I reckon it's hard all around.
translation: 世事并不美好，但我认为在这儿一向如此。

original: My family's lived hereabouts since well before the War, and I reckon we'll be here a long time yet.
translation: 我的家族早在战争之前就住在这一带，我认为我们还会在这儿住上很久。

original: Why, I'm just folk.  What more is there?
translation: 怎么，我只是个平民。还有什么事？

original: Secret family technique, been so for generations.
translation: 家族秘传的技术，已经相传了几代了。

original: Help me brew some up by gatherin' ingredients. I'll share the batch to make it worth your while, and sweeten the deal with 300 caps.
translation: 帮我用收集来的这些配方酿酒。我会给你很好的报酬的，比如说那美妙的300瓶盖。

original: Oh, you're gonna love it, sweetie. Just you wait.
translation: 哦，你会爱上它的，亲爱的。先稍等片刻。

original: Well, I - oh, fine. Maybe you're no hogsfool, but I reckon we both come out better if you can help me cook up some tonic.
translation: 我—好吧。或许你不是傻瓜，但我认为如果你能帮我调制点补药，对我们俩都有好处。

original: I reckon you can, at that.  I just need some help brewing up a little tonic.
translation: 而且我认为你能做到。我只是需要点帮助来调制补药。

original: Now that is just an awfully rude thing to say, sweetie.
translation: 亲爱的，你这么说太无礼了。

original: Well sweetie, even if you ain't got sympathy in your heart, I think you need the 'ol tonic as bad as me, even if'n you don't know it yet.
translation: 宝贝，即使你没有同情心，我想你也跟我一样急需这补药，尽管你还没发现。

original: Awful malady, I do swear. There's a tonic for it, but I reckon I'm not well enough to make it myself.
translation: 可怕的疾病，我发誓。有种补药可以治，但我认为我一个人做不出来。

original: Reckon it's the Orange Fever.  I do feel light in my head...
translation: 估计是橙热病。我确实觉得脑袋轻飘飘的……

original: Little scrawny, but they'll do. Thank you, sweetie.
translation: 小个了点，但也行。谢谢你，宝贝。

original: Sweet and ripe, too. These will do just fine.
I apologize that I cannot receive you in person, agent Jiang. Our Norfolk contact confirms your arrival.
translation: 江特工，很抱歉我不能亲自接待你。我们在诺福克的联络人已经确认了你的到来。

original: How eager the Americans are to believe that a great mind of the People would defect! Our countrymen will herald you as a hero when your work is done.
translation: 美国人是多么渴望相信人民的伟大思想会叛变啊！当你完成使命后，我们的同胞会把你当作英雄来歌颂。

original: To that end, let us turn to the details of your mission. This room will be your safehouse in Point Lookout.
translation: 为此，让我们来谈谈你的任务细节吧。这个房间将是你在望海崖的安全屋。

original: Focus initially on playing the American lapdog. Do not arouse suspicion.
translation: 一开始要集中精力扮演好美帝的哈巴狗，不要引起怀疑。

original: When it is safe, use the key you were given in Norfolk to open one of the public rental lockers on the boardwalk near the Motel.
translation: 安全之后，使用在诺福克时给你的钥匙，去打开汽车旅馆附近的木栈道上的一个公共出租储物柜。

original: You will be provided with the password you'll need to access your mission debriefing. The agreed-upon payment will be paid upon extraction.
translation: 你将获得访问任务简报所需要的密码。约定的报酬将在撤离时支付。

original: It is I, Professor Calvert! Don't bother looking around, I'm in your mind!
translation: 是我，卡尔弗特教授！不用到处看了，我就在你的心里。

original: But, aren't you Desmond's faithful little employee? Coming to gum up my work, are we? Well... I have a better idea...
translation: 可是，你不是德斯蒙德忠心耿耿的小帮手吗？是来我给我制造麻烦吗？嗯……我有个更好的主意……

original: How about instead of playing his game, you destroy that nasty little device?
translation: 与其帮他做事，不如帮我毁了那令人讨厌的设备？

original: Deposit it in the nearby trash compactor and we will never have to worry about it again.
translation: 把它丢到离你最近的垃圾压缩机里，我们就再也不用去担心了。

original: I assure you that the gratitude of Professor Calvert is worth a great deal more than that of a washed up old limey.
translation: 我向你保证，卡尔弗特教授的感激要远比那没前途的英国佬来得要有价值得多。

original: Processing... Processing... Voice ID confirmed. Access granted.
translation: 处理中…处理中…声音身份验证。

original: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
translation: 密码：通过验证！声音身份：匹配错误！拒绝访问 - 用户声音未经授权。

original: Voice ID or password not recognized. Access Denied.
translation: 语音标识或密码未获承认。拒绝访问。

original: Go to the bank and use password xìn tian weng.  The software is configured to recognize only our voices.
translation: 去银行，并且使用密码xìn tian weng。软件已被设置为只识别我们的声音。

original: Excellent! Most excellent! I knew that you would make the right choice.
translation: 太好了！真的是太好了！我就知道你能做出正确的选择。

original: And now it is time for Desmond to meet his end! He's made a fatal mistake!
translation: 现在，是时候让德斯蒙德去死了！他犯了一个致命的错误！

original: Return to Calvert Mansion. I have something there that I'd like you to see.
translation: 回到卡尔弗特公馆里。我有一些东西想让你瞧瞧。

original: Agent Jiang; as you know, an important Chinese surveillance vessel was lost in American waters.
translation: 江特工；如你所知，一艘重要的中国侦察船在美国海域失踪。

original: Your mission is to destroy derelict submarine SSN-37-1A before the Americans can recover and analyze it.
translation: 你的任务是在美国人找到并分析废弃潜艇SSN-37-1A之前将其摧毁。

original: The recovery location is included in this dossier, and your cover ensures that the Americans will allow you access to their recovery operation.
translation: 回收地点包含在这份文件中，你的伪装确保了美国人允许你进入他们的回收行动中。

original: However; you will need an authorization code to trigger the self-destruct sequence.
translation: 然而；你需要授权码来启动自毁序列。

original: One of our field operatives in your area, Agent Yang, has these codes hidden in a dental capsule, but her current whereabouts are unknown.
translation: 我们在你区域的外勤人员，杨特工，将这些授权码藏在一个牙囊中。但是目前她去向不明。

original: Locate and rendezvous with Agent Yang, then destroy the submarine. Report to your safehouse for extraction information when the mission is complete.
translation: 找到杨特工并与之会合，然后摧毁潜艇。任务完成后，到安全屋报告以获得撤离信息。

original: The will of the People protect you, Agent Jiang.
translation: 愿人民的意志保佑你，江特工。

original: Talking is irrelevant! He must be destroyed!
Assist me, and your reward will be great!
translation: 帮助我，你将有丰厚的报酬！

original: Your sickness is irrelevant! If you require it, I shall reward you!
translation: 你的病不会影响大局！如果你想要，我可以奖赏给你！

original: He is my enemy! And you will be rewarded!
translation: 他是我的敌人！我会付你报酬的！

original: Please, I'm not asking for much. But if you're going to Point Lookout, and you find a girl named Nadine, just give her this note.
translation: 求求你，我不会要求太多。如果你要去望海崖，并且找到一个名叫娜丁的女孩的话，请把这张纸条给她。

original: She stowed away on that boat, and I haven't heard from her ever since. I'll do anything if it'll help find her.
translation: 自从她离开船以后，我就再也没听过关于她的消息。我会尽我一切力量帮助你找到她。

original: Oh, bless you! Her name is Nadine, and she left a couple weeks ago. Said she wanted to see the world, silly little thing that she is.
translation: 哦，祝福你！她的名字叫娜丁，她几周前就已经离开这里了。她说她想要用自己的双眼去看看这个世界，多么愚蠢的小女孩啊。

original: That Tobar said he dropped her off at Point Lookout, but who knows what's happened to her since then?
translation: 托巴尔说她在望海崖就下船了，但是谁知道那之后她又遇上了什么事情呢？

original: I don't know if you can convince my little Nadine to come back, but just give her this note from me, would you?
translation: 我不知道你能否把我的小娜丁带回来，但是至少请把这张纸条带给她，可以吗？

original: Ah, but he's not here, now is he? And besides, I'm no stranger! I'm Tobar the Ferryman, at your service!
translation: 但他不在这儿，对吧？再者，我不是陌生人！我是船长托巴尔，愿为你效劳。

original: You look like a man who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
translation: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。

original: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
translation: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。

original: But keep your wits about you, because you'll find more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're not man enough!
translation: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还不够强壮就先待在这儿吧！

original: You look like a woman who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
translation: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。

original: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
translation: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。

original: But keep your wits about you, because there's more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're too dainty to rough it!
translation: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还太娇贵就先待在这儿吧！

original: You should have seen her back in her heyday! Why, we traveled up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth to the Broken Banks.
translation: 你应该看看她最光辉时候的样子！我们沿着海岸旅行，从联邦旅行到破碎海岸。

original: Good times, but these days she's not fit to take out to the coast. Too many spouts ready to drown her, and too many critters looking for lunch.
translation: 那是一段美好的时光，但是最近她都没有再去海岸。太多的人打算用口水淹没她，而且也有太多饥饿的家伙在寻找午餐。

original: But the Point Lookout run is good enough for now. We've got a sweet deal ferrying cargo and the occasional traveler.
translation: 但现在有望海崖航线就足够了。我们在运送货物和偶尔的旅客方面做得很好。

original: I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
translation: 我已经在这呆了很久。上一次我认识一只叫娜丁的鸟时，我还有皮肤。

original: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could... introduce myself.
translation: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但我还没能……做自我介绍，她就跑了。

original: Ah, Nadine! Spritely little tomboy with more curiosity than common sense, that one.
translation: 啊， 娜丁！像个假小子一样，知道的不多，好奇心不少。

original: Caused so much trouble on the trip that I probably would have thrown her overboard... if she hadn't reminded me of myself at her age.
translation: 她在旅途中总是制造麻烦，要不是因为她钩起了我儿时的回忆，我早就把她扔到水里去了。

original: Haven't seen her since we hit land at Point Lookout. But knowing her, I'll bet she's gotten herself in plenty of trouble.
translation: 到达望海崖后我就没再见过她。但是基于我对她的了解，她肯定有卷入到什么麻烦里了吧。

original: She's about your age, and when she left, her hair was dyed bright orange. You shouldn't have any problem recognizing her.
translation: 她跟你差不多大，并且她离开的时候，染了橘红色的头发。你肯定一眼就能认出她来。

original: She told me she wanted to go find her fortune, but I thought it was too dangerous. I should've known better than to say that.
translation: 她告诉我说她要去寻找财富，但是我认为那太过危险了。我应该多劝劝她就好了。

original: Moment I told her she couldn't go, it was just a matter of time before she ran off...
translation: 那时候我跟她说不要走，实际上，她的离开只是时间上的问题。

original: That sounds like her. Too busy having her adventures to think about family. Like mother, like daughter.
translation: 那听起来像是她的所作所为。总是忙于她自己的冒险以至于没什么时间去考虑家庭。像是母亲，或者女儿一类的事情。

original: Yes, thank you so much! And now that she's got this boat and carrying all this cargo... well, I can afford to actually pay you! Thank you so much!
translation: 是啊，太感谢你了！现在她有了这艘船，还载着这么多货物……嗯，我真的付得起你的报酬了！太谢谢你了！

original: I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
translation: 我已经在这呆了很久。上一次我认识一只叫娜丁的鸟时，我还有皮肤。

original: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could ... introduce myself.
translation: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但是在我还没来得及做自我介绍的时候，那个女孩子就跑了。

original: What is this, a date? You start making a move, and it's stabbing time.
translation: 这算什么，约会吗？你倒是挺主动，不过，也是该出手的时候了。

original: What? There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
translation: 什么？我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？

original: There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
translation: 我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？

original: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
translation: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的。

original: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
translation: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。

original: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
translation: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。

original: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
translation: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的.

original: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
translation: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。

original: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
translation: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一片湿漉漉的海滩叫“望海崖”。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富、权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
translation: 抱歉，但我不接待团体旅行。如果你想去望海崖看看，就得把你朋友留在这儿。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一片湿漉漉的海滩叫“望海崖”。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的遗址，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富，权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一片湿漉漉的海滩叫“望海崖”。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富，权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: You're staring at it, friend! Drink it in!
translation: 你正目不转睛地盯着它，朋友！喝吧！

original: See the glorious boardwalk, fabled pleasure-town of the sunny past! And beyond it lies the haunted swamplands. Who knows what's hidden in them?
translation: 看那辉煌的木栈道，传说中沐浴在阳光下的欢乐之镇！而远处是闹鬼的沼泽地。谁知道里面藏着什么？

original: But while you get your bearings, my friend runs an excellent supply shop right here, near the boardwalk.
translation: 趁着你搞清了状况，不妨去木栈道那边看看吧，我朋友就在那里经营一家店。

original: Only that it's where Tobar gets those Punga Fruits he sells off. Must be making a good profit off of them, too.
translation: 托巴都是从那里搞到膨葛的。他肯定靠这个得到不少好处。

original: I hear rumors the place is full of swamps and killer plants, but I don't know about all that.
translation: 谣传说那里到处都是沼泽和杀人植物，但是具体情况我就不清楚了。

original: Good stuff, isn't it? Actual, healthy food, grown in the actual ground and everything!
translation: 好东西，不是吗？实际上啊，这可是健康食品，这可是在土里面长的哦！

original: There's a few places out in the Point where it grows naturally. One group of Tribals have cultivated and refined it, but they're not big on sharing.
translation: 在望海崖的几个地方，有野生生长的。有一个部族种植并培育它，但他们不太愿意分享。

original: Don't even ask how I get my hands on the refined crop. A magician never reveals his secrets, does he?
translation: 别问我是怎么搞到精制作物的。魔术师从不泄露秘密，不是吗？

original: Punga grows strong. I help Punga grow stronger.
translation: 膨葛长得很茂盛。我帮助膨葛长得更加茂盛。

original: Punga understands me. I understand Punga.
translation: 膨葛理解我，我理解膨葛。

original: That is all it needs to be.
Are you kidding? Why wouldn't we? As much as we want to reject earthly desires, we still need to eat, right?
translation: 你开玩笑吗？为什么不呢？即使我们抛弃对尘世的渴望，但是我还们还是需要吃东西的啊，不是吗？

original: It grows fast, fills you up, and you can make a lot of things with it.
translation: 它长得很快，能填饱你的肚子，也可以拿来做很多的东西。

original: Anything it doesn't provide, we can get by trading it to outsiders. That shifty bastard Tobar's always looking to buy more from us.
translation: 它不能提供给我们的东西，就需要我们去从外来者那里购买。那个叫托巴尔的混蛋总是想赚我们一笔。

original: It is a gift from the earth itself, in acknowledgement of our perfect balance with nature and the higher planes.
translation: 这是大地的馈赠，是对于我们与大自然和更高的层次实现完美平衡的奖励。

original: She recognizes that we seek to leave behind the corrupt physical, and she nurtures us in our quest.
translation: 她对我们抛弃身上腐朽废物的做法非常认可，并在我们的征途中给我们以指导。

original: Tell the truth, I got no idea. Ground's probably pretty fertile here, on account of the graveyard.
translation: 告诉你说，我完全不知道。这里的土地之所以很富饶，我估计跟那个墓地有关。

original: Plus, we got lots of people tending the gardens. Especially the big man, Croatoa.
translation: 此外，我们有很多人都在照料那个花园。特别是那位大人，克罗托亚。

original: Guy's got a knack for plants. Makes sense - mentally, they're on the same level.
translation: 他对如何照料植物有自己的敲门。挺管用的 - 也就是心理作用吧，大家的水平其实都差不多。

original: Please step inside, agent. Extraction details can be found on the terminal inside.
translation: 请进，特工。您将会在里面的终端找到脱身详情。

original: Clearance acknowledged. Follow me for your extraction debriefing, Comrade.
translation: 得到许可。请随我来做任务情况汇报，同志。

original: Oh, it's smoke, all right. Where there's smoke, there's fire - and where there's fire, there's profit to be made selling an extinguisher!
translation: 噢，是烟，好吧。哪儿有烟，哪儿就有火 — 哪儿有火，哪儿就有兜售灭火器的机会！

original: That smoke's coming from old Calvert Mansion. I always heard it was haunted, but more importantly, I always heard it was full of pre-war treasure!
translation: 烟是从老卡尔弗特公馆出来的。我一直听说那儿闹鬼，但更重要的是，总听到那里满是战前宝藏！

original: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
translation: 我知道我说过望海崖非常适合财宝猎人，但很少有一天能遇到这样的烽火！

original: Oh, nothing much. Just old Calvert Mansion.
translation: 没什么。就是老卡尔弗特公馆。

original: Just a huge, abandoned estate teaming with who knows what opportunities for profitable scavenging. Y'know, nothing much.
translation: 只是做不知道有没有搜刮价值的巨大废弃的地产而已。你知道，仅此而已。

original: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
translation: 我知道我说过望海崖非常适合财宝猎人，但很少有一天能遇到这样的烽火！

original: Anybody ever say you talk too much?
translation: 有人见过你说这么多话吗？

original: Sure. I was getting tired of that anyway.
translation: 当然，不管怎么说我也对那感到厌倦了。

original: I go out to play some days and might bag me a shellman to eat. Most days I just sit here with my stories and toys, though.
translation: 我有时候出去玩，也许还会要点果仁吃。大多数时候我只会坐在这里玩我的玩具，讲我自己的故事。

original: Swamp Folk know Ol' Herzog's Mine-hole. Say it's haunted. So I knew most folk wouldn't wander this way, except outsiders like you.
translation: 住在沼泽的人都知道赫尔佐格的那个矿洞。传闻说里面闹鬼。所以说住在这里的人都不会去靠近的，除了像你这样的外来者。

original: Doesn't usually take more than a clapper-jaw on the leg to scare them off.
translation: 想要吓走他们恐怕不会很容易吧。

original: He was a mean old man, owned this mine a million years ago. Made the miners work real hard and didn't give them any money or food for their kin.
translation: 他是个非常小气的老家伙，很多年前就获得了这矿井的所有权。他对矿工很苛刻，逼着矿工干很多活，但是又不给他们工钱或者食物。

original: One day a bunch of miners sat down and just stopped working. Old man Herzog, he didn't like that. Not a bit.
translation: 有一次，一些矿工停下手里的活坐下来休息。那个老家伙赫尔佐格，不喜欢那些矿工这样做，一点也不。

original: So, he blew them all up! With a million-million tons of dynamite!
translation: 所以他就把他们都炸飞了！用了好多好多炸药！

original: No one wanted to work in the mine after that. Then Ol' Herzog came down here and hung himself.
translation: 自从那以后，就没有人为他工作了。然后他就一个人来到了这里。

original: They say his angry ghost still haunts the mine. That doesn't scare me, though.
translation: 他们说那个生气的幽灵经常在矿井附近出没。不过我并不害怕。

original: The grownups like my mama and pop just live in the wet. They're okay, they just don't trust outsiders like you.
translation: 像我妈妈爸爸这样的大人都只是生活在湿地。他们是好人，只是不太信任像你这样的外来者。

original: Most think I'm an outsider too, because I don't got the markings on me. I tend to stay away from the grownups.
translation: 大多数人认为为我也是个外来者，因为在我身上没有什么标示。我总是尝试远离那些大人。

original: Except when they have a campfire. Some nights I hear them dancing. Then I sneak out to watch.
translation: 除非有篝火。有时候我能听见他们在跳舞。然后我就在一旁偷看。

original: I dunno. I ran away a long time ago. I live here all by myself.
translation: 我不知道。我从那里跑出来已经很久了。我一直一个人生活。

original: I already told you. I ran away. Shut up about it, all right?
translation: 我已经告诉你了。我从那里跑出来了。不要再提这件事情了，知道吗？

original: Well... all right. But any funny business and I'll pop you one. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine.
translation: 嗯…好吧。但是要规矩点，否则我会给你好瞧。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。

original: Look at me. I don't got the marks. I go around the wets and folk will shoot at me! Thinking I was one of your type.
translation: 看着我。我身上没有标示。我走过湿地就会有人朝我射击！想象一下我曾经就像你一样。

original: I wasn't born right.  Mama hid me in the basement and pappy kinda just forgot about me, but I knew I had to go before I grew up.
translation: 我生得不是时候。妈妈把我藏在地下室，爸爸好像是把我忘了一样，但是我知道我要在我长大之前离开这里。

original: Did you know I once bagged a Mirelurk ten feet tall?
translation: 你知道我曾经搞到过一个10英尺高的泥沼蟹吗？

original: I bet you can't beat me in a race. You look reeeal slow.
translation: 我敢打赌你跑得肯定没有我快。你看起来真的很慢。

original: This one time I'm pretty sure I moved a bottle with my mind...
translation: 这一次我确信我用精神力量移动了瓶子…

original: I bet I can burp louder than you!
translation: 我敢打赌我打嗝的声音比你大！

original: No, I mean it, mister. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
translation: 不，我是认真的，先生。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！

original: No, I mean it, lady. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
translation: 不，我是认真的，女士。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！

original: Yeah, you'd better scram - if he looks you in the eyes, your brain will melt!
translation: 是啊，你最好快跑 - 如果你与他的双眼对视，你的大脑就会被溶化！

original: So what if it was? I've bagged meaner than you, and I'll do it again!
translation: 如果是真的又怎么样？我抢的比你要多得多，让我再来一次也没关系！

original: Come over here, boy. Let's talk.
Come over here, girl. Let's talk.
At last! Our game is ending!
translation: 终于！我们的游戏要结束了！

original: Damned if I know. It was abandoned when I got here.
translation: 该死，我根本就不知道。在我来这里之前那里就被遗弃了。

original: There's plenty hidden away here, none of it would be useful to to a bunch of crazed inbreds.
translation: 这里有很多的隐蔽通道，不过对于那些疯狂的蠢蛋，这些都毫无意义。

original: Our most enlightened one divined that the fates themselves did decree the mansion must be burnt to the ground!
translation: 我们的最开悟者预感到，命运早已注定了这公馆必须要被烧成灰烬！

original: Honestly? I got no idea. Word came down on high that the place had to come down.
translation: 真的吗？我也不知道。高高在上的神谕说，这地方必须夷为平地。

original: I probably should have joined the war party, but... well, I'm not really comfortable with violence.
translation: 我本应该加入主战派的，但是…嗯，我不太习惯使用暴力解决问题。

original: Jackson said he saw its destruction in a vision. There were some concerns, but when the leader says it's a mandate from beyond, you don't ask why.
translation: 杰克逊说他看到了它的毁灭。虽然还有一些疑问和忧虑，但是如果首领说那是神谕，你就不能问为什么了。

original: That hill is holy. It must be cleared. Jackson told us this.
translation: 杰克逊跟我们说，那个小山是神圣之所，必需要被净化。

original: Some went to fight. I stayed with Punga.
translation: 有些人去战斗了。我留下来待在膨葛身边。

original: Punga does not fight. Punga grows where it can. Punga knows what is important.
translation: 膨葛不参加战斗。膨葛尽可能得到处生长。膨葛知道什么是重要的。

original: We take no pleasure in violence. Our goal was merely to remove the ghoul. His presence is an offense to the Transcendent Master's astral dominion.
translation: 我们不以暴力为乐。我们的目标仅仅是除掉那个尸鬼。他的存在是对我们至高无上主人的星之领土的冒犯。

original: I cannot claim to understand the exact reasons that the mansion's resident caused such disruption, however. To understand fully, ask the Master.
translation: 不过，我并不了解这公馆的住户造成如此混乱的确切原因。要想完全了解，去找主人。

original: Of course I did, but that moron thought it was one of his addled visions. The real goal was to destroy the ghouls' jamming device!
translation: 当然是我，但那个傻子以为是他混乱的幻象呢。真正的目的是去摧毁尸鬼的干扰装置！

original: Honestly, those fools aren't worth the meat they're made of. A minion that can't follow directions is no use at all!
translation: 坦白地说，那些蠢货一点存在的价值都没有。奴才要是不听话，那就一点用都没有！

original: Woah, woah, woah! That was all Jackson's crazy idea. I knew better than to volunteer for that suicide mission!
translation: 哇哦，哇哦，哇哦！这很显然是杰克逊出的疯狂的主意。这种自愿去送死的做法，我一眼就能看出来。

original: Last time I wandered too close to that mansion, some old ghoul sicced his dogs on me. Screw that!
translation: 上次我溜达太靠近那公馆，有些老尸鬼放狗放出来咬我。去他娘的！

original: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
translation: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？

original: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
translation: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？

original: We espouse the expansion of the perfect mind, and the rejection of the corrupt physical!
translation: 我们崇尚对完美思想的延伸和对腐朽肉体的拒绝。

original: The material world is destroyed and imperfect. We seek to release our minds from their tainted cages, so as to find a better world.
translation: 我们的物质世界已经分崩离析，并且也十分的不完美。我们在寻找并且传播我们的理念，好让人们从他们的枷锁中得到解放，我们要把这个世界变得更美好。

original: We're all about expansion of the mind, denying the physical, all that good stuff.
translation: 我们都在扩展着我们的思想，鄙弃我们的肉体以及其他。

original: I mean, have you looked around? This world sucks the big fat one, so we're ditching it and going off to fantasyland.
translation: 我的意思是，你看到你的周围了么？核弹摧残着这个世界，所以我们要抛弃它，去追寻梦想的天堂。

original: Only, not imaginary fantasyland. Real fantasyland, right? A world of perfect thought. Anywhere but this shithole, at least.
translation: 只是，不是什么幻想世界，而是真正的梦想世界，对么？一个充满着完美想法的世界。不管它在哪，它绝不会在这个糟糕的洞穴里。

original: I'm denmother. I keep us safe and make sure everyone remembers to eat and sleep. It's more work than you might think.
translation: 我是洞穴之母。我保证大家的安全，并且确保每个人都记得吃东西，去睡觉。这工作比你想象的要辛苦得多。

original: A lot of our members have... "transcended conscious thought." Someone's got to take care of them.
translation: 我们许多成员都有…“超脱神智的思维”。需要某些人来照顾他们。

original: We dream. Dream of a better world, not falling apart like ours.
translation: 我们梦想着。梦想一个更美好的世界，而不是像我们这样四分五裂。

original: And when we find a dream that makes us forget this world, we dream that we do not have to wake up.
translation: 当我们找到一个能让我们忘记这个世界的梦想时，我们就会梦想我们不必醒来。

original: We are a family of dreamers, a band of astral explorers, and a church of the mind.
translation: 我们梦想之人是一个大家庭，是一群星界的旅行者，是思想的教堂。

original: In time, we will be free of the horrors of the base physical world. We will play amongst the pure thoughts of the universe!
translation: 迟早，我们要从这个以物质为基础的世界里解脱。我们要在宇宙里的纯粹的思想世界里畅游。

original: Now, hold on there. Not so fuckin' fast. You can be useful to me. I need someone willing to get their hands dirty.
translation: 等一下，别他妈的这么快。你对我有用。我需要个愿意干脏活的人。

original: So, here's the deal: I help you get in with those Tribals, you help me get what I want, and I'll make you fuckin' rich.
translation: 这样吧，有个个交易：我帮你和那些部落打交道，你帮我得到我想要的东西，我就让你他妈的发大财。

original: Just try not to sprain a lobe while you're thinking about it. My time is short.
translation: 只是你在考虑的时候别扭伤了脑叶就行。我没那么多闲工夫。

original: Oh, there's always a chance, certainly. But what you earn depends on how well you can follow directions.
translation: 哦，当然了，机会总是有的。但是你能获得什么，要取决于你在多大程度上服从于我的命令了。

original: You're not the most incompetent waster I've ever met. I think we could put you to work and figure out what's going on here.
translation: 你并不是我见过最无能的废物。我想，这里有点工作需要你去做，并且看看这里到底放生了什么事情。

original: Your reward would be considerable, since I know that's what you wasters value. Decide.
translation: 我发现你这个垃圾有点价值吗，我会考虑关于奖励的问题的。 决定吧。

original: Not a fuckin' clue. It'd be easy to chalk it up to their crazy religion, but if I'm right, and I always am, there's something else going on.
translation: 一点他妈的线索都没有。但是仍然很容易就能联系到这与他们该死的疯狂的宗教有关，如果我的猜测是对的话，当然了，我的猜测总是对的，他们肯定在谋划着什么。

original: That's the third attack in a month, so somebody's got a grudge with me. Whether it's a man or a god, I intend to set them straight.
translation: 这已经是这个月第三次袭击了，所以，这看起来有人对我充满了怨恨。不管这背后是人还是神的指使，我都要跟他们算算账。

original: You saw it. He uses his device to talk to their soft-headed leader in those caves. They think he's a fuckin' god, and they do what he wants.
translation: 你看见了。他使用了某种装置在洞穴里跟他们的蠢蛋领袖交流。他们以为他是他妈个神，便任由他使唤。

original: The blighters are too stupid to get it right most of the time. But, seeing as how they figured to attack me here, Calvert is getting close.
translation: 那些家伙太愚蠢了，命令他们办事可不容易。不过，他们既然能到这来袭击我，看来卡尔弗特就快成功了。

original: But if their "god" goes silent, then they won't be a problem anymore, now will they?
translation: 但如果他们的“神”沉默了，那他们就不再有威胁了，是吧？

original: At some point, Professor Calvert developed the ability to speak inside people's heads. Problem is, he's not so good at it.
translation: 从某种角度讲，卡尔弗特教授发展出一种建立在人脑中通话能力。问题是，他还不能很好地驾驭这种能力。

original: He's using something to boost his power and talk to those Tribal simps. The fools think he's God or something.
translation: 他用某种东西加强了与部落白痴们的交流。那些傻瓜以为他是神之类的。

original: Once I jam up his signal, he won't be able to get them to do what he wants, and I'll be able to find where the little fuck is hiding.
translation: 一旦我阻断他的信号，他就无法随心所欲的操纵部落了，而这个时候我就能找到那个小杂种的藏身处。

original: Were you not paying attention? I need you to take that Cogwave Jammer over to the Ferris wheel by the docks.
translation: 你没听见吗？把脑波干扰器带到码头边的摩天轮那里。

original: Attach it to one of the cars, then raise it as high as it will go.
translation: 装到一个客厢上，再转到最高点。

original: That's the only way we'll be able to shut off the Professor's ability to talk to those simple bastards who work for him.
translation: 教授能跟那些弱智混蛋进行通话，从而来操控他们。只用通过这个我们才能阻止他们的通话。

original: Well, that's just too bad, ain't it? But since you're so afraid, attach the thing to one of the cars and then spin it around to get it to the top.
translation: 喔，那太糟了，不是吗？但既然你这么害怕，那就随便装到一个客厢上，再转到高处。

original: I'll watch from here and turn it on when it's ready. Then we'll see where our little Professor is.
translation: 我就从这里观察，就绪了便开启开关。然后就能知道咱们的小教授在哪了。

original: Right. Attach it to the bottom car, then turn it on and spin the jammer to the top. No fuckin' problem.
translation: 没错。装到最下面的吊箱上，开启开关，把干扰器转到最高处。绝对他妈的没问题。

original: I'll watch from here and turn it on. Then we'll see where our little professor is.
translation: 我在这里看着并打开它。然后看看我们的小教授在哪儿。

original: If I know the Professor, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
translation: 要说我了解教授的话，他肯定正用一种高频感知正弦广播。

original: I have the perfect device to jam up that little worm's talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point around and install it.
translation: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。

original: If I know Professor Calvert, and I do, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
translation: 要说我了解卡尔弗特教授的话，我确实了解他，他在用一种高频感知正弦广播。

original: I have the perfect device to jam up his little talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point on the shore and install it.
translation: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。

original: So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to them.
translation: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。

original: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
translation: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。

original: So, we cut off his ability to talk to them, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
translation: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！

original: So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to 'em.
translation: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。

original: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
translation: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。

original: So, we cut off his ability to talk to 'em, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
translation: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！

original: Nothing but the best for people who stay in my good graces. Now, you ready to stop whining and listen?
translation: 我决不会亏待我所赏识的人。现在，你能闭上臭嘴听我说两句吗？

original: You're goddamn right, I am. Now, let's get on with the work, shall we?
translation: 太他妈正确了，这就是我。现在，咱们开始干正事吧，好吗？

original: Or what? You think I haven't been shot before? Think that you, over the thousands who have tried, can take me down?
translation: 你想怎样？你以为我没中过枪吗？无数的人都想要我的命，你以为你能行？

original: You'd best wise the hell up and play along. I'll get what I want, and you'll get rich, and then we can go about our separate goddamn ways.
translation: 你最好放聪明点，乖乖听我的。我拿到我想要的，你也会得到报酬，然后我们就能他妈的分道扬镳了。

original: Of course I fucking want you to do something else. You don't expect me to trod around this mudhole my self, do you?
translation: 我他妈当然想让你干点别的。你不会想让我自己在这泥潭里踩来踩去吧？

original: Calvert is my old rival. Centuries, we've played this game. I knew he'd be stupid enough to hide so close to his family home.
translation: 卡尔弗特是我的老冤家。几个世纪以来，我们一直在玩这游戏。我就知道他会蠢到，藏在离他家这么近的地方。

original: It's not a matter of hate, it's a matter of destiny. He is my enemy, and I do not suffer any bastard who opposes me to live.
translation: 这无关恨，只是宿命。他是我的敌人，我不能容忍任何反抗我的杂种活着。

original: I knew he was here, and it is my intent to find him, and call down a righteous fucking hammer on his head.
translation: 我知道他在这里，我一定要找到他，然后用他妈的正义之锤敲碎他的脑袋。

original: HIM! I should have known. My old rival... so close to his family home. Only he would be so stupid.
translation: 是他！我早该知道。我的老冤家…离他的老家如此之近。只有他才会这么傻。

original: He was once a man -- Professor Calvert. The Calverts owned half of Maryland, back when there was a Maryland to own.
translation: 他曾是卡尔弗特教授 — 在他还有人样的时候。那时候马里兰州还存在，卡尔弗特家族则拥有半个马里兰州。

original: Members of the Calvert family were influential all over the world. They practically owned a deed to the US government.
translation: 卡尔弗特的家族成员在全球都极富影响力。实际上他们在美国政府大有势力。

original: In their best days, there were no less than three Calvert family senators, seven members of the house, and two governors.
translation: 在最辉煌的日子，卡尔弗特家族有至少三名参议员、七名众议员和两名州长。

original: They even had a top candiate for president, until that scandal with the dog forced him to drop out of the race. I was particularly proud of that one.
translation: 他们甚至有过最有希望的总统候选人，直到与狗的丑闻迫使他们放弃了竞选。我对此感到分外自豪。

original: Tough, are you? Good, I might have use for that. Come, let's talk.
translation: 真狠啊，不是吗？很好，我可不那么好惹。来吧，我们谈谈。

original: You're in Blackhall Manor.  This isn't a tourist attraction, but I appreciate your good taste. Come, let's talk.
translation: 你身处布莱克霍尔庄园。这不是旅游胜地，但我欣赏你的品位。来吧，我们谈谈。

original: I... guess that's Kenny-Bear. Thanks for bringing him back.
translation: 我…猜那就是肯尼熊吧。谢谢你帮我把他带回来。

original: Gee, thanks!  I dropped him near the shaft, so he's probably at the bottom.
translation: 耶啊，谢谢！我把他掉进那个通风管道里了，也许你能在最底部找到。

original: I don't go back there much - it's real dark and there's lots of critters. You should be fine, though!
translation: 我不常去那里 - 因为里面太黑了，而且里面有很多吓人东西。但是你肯定能应付！

original: Bring him back as fast as you can!
So hey. You can use this place as your hideout if you want. Hide from the folk out there. Stash your stuff. Okay?
translation: 那么，嘿。如果你想的话你可以把这里当做你的藏身之处。藏起来不被外面那些家伙发现。存放你的东西。好吗？

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Well, I certainly can do one thing that you can't: I can fucking well walk!
translation: 有件事你不能做而我能：我他妈能好好走路！

original: And you! Always with empty fucking threats and meaningless drivel, but never the will to act!
translation: 而你！他妈的只会耍嘴皮子吓唬别人，整天胡言乱语，但从不付之行动！

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Well, I certainly can do one thing that you can't: I can fucking well walk!
translation: 有件事你不能做而我能：我他妈能好好走路！

original: And you! Always with empty fucking threats and meaningless drivel, but never the will to act!
translation: 而你！他妈的只会耍嘴皮子吓唬别人，整天胡言乱语，但从不付之行动！

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: So vulgar, Mister Lockheart! After all this time, you still haven't learned to expand your vocabulary! Fool!
translation: 这太粗俗了，洛克哈特先生！事隔这么久，你还是没能扩展你的词汇！蠢货！

original: Your words mean nothing to me, Mr. Lockheart. You are a foolish and vulgar man, incapable of the slightest forethought!
translation: 你的话对我毫无意义，洛克哈特先生。你是个愚蠢粗俗的人，没有一点深谋远虑。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: So vulgar, Mister Lockheart! After all this time, you still haven't learned to expand your vocabulary! Fool!
translation: 这太粗俗了，洛克哈特先生！事隔这么久，你还是没能扩展你的词汇！蠢货！

original: Your words mean nothing to me, Mr. Lockheart. You are a foolish and vulgar man, incapable of the slightest forethought!
translation: 你的话对我毫无意义，洛克哈特先生。你是个愚蠢粗俗的人，没有一点深谋远虑。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！
你这个没实体而可悲的小脑！
你这个恶心滑腻的混蛋，还没头盖骨！

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！
你这个没实体而可悲的小脑！
你这个恶心滑腻的混蛋，还没头盖骨！

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！

original: Obadiah's a good man, but his family has an evil past. This book is an unwanted heirloom, and the foundation of the heathen Krvibi ritualists.
translation: 奥巴迪亚是个好人，但他的家族有着邪恶的过去。这本书是多余的传家宝，也是异教徒卡维碧祭祀的基础。

original: I told you about their ritual site, remember? See if they're hiding the book there and bring it back to me. From there?  I don't yet know.
translation: 我跟你说过他们的仪式场所，记得吗？看看他们有没有把书藏在那儿，有的话带回来？我可说不好。

original: I fear Obadiah is in dire straits. What do you want to talk about?
translation: 恐怕奥巴迪亚状况不妙。你想谈什么？

original: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
translation: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened sister!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！

original: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
translation: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened brother!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！

original: You're still going to be like that, huh? I suppose it was too much to hope that transcendental enlightenment had taught you some manners.
translation: 你还是会像那样做，哼？我想我我对超脱的启迪能教你些礼貌抱太高的期望了。

original: Oh well, you'll learn some humility eventually, even if Woodrose has to beat it into you.
translation: 好吧，你最终还是会学会的有些人性，即便银背藤要对你强行灌输。

original: Just get inside the sacred cathedral. You're enlightened now, so try to act like it, okay?
translation: 进神圣大教堂去吧。你已经开化了，表现得像样点，好吗？

original: That is merely the sensation of your consciousness rushing to embrace its true potential. It is the feeling of having no boundaries. No limits!
translation: 那只是你的意识急于拥抱其真正潜能的感觉。那是种没有界限的感觉。没有界限！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened sister!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！

original: That is merely the sensation of your consciousness rushing to embrace its true potential. It is the feeling of having no boundaries. No limits!
translation: 那只是你的意识急于拥抱其真正潜能的感觉。那是种没有界限的感觉。没有界限！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened brother!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！

original: Okay, be that way. It's called the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Laugh if you want, but it will open your mind to the world!
translation: 好，就那样吧。这叫做母亲之种仪式。想笑就笑吧，但它能解放你的思想！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 冒险向西去大沼泽，在那你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人还高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect its seeds, and you will be welcome in the tribe. Then you shall learn the true wisdom of our ways!
translation: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。

original: These are people who think cutting a hole in their skull can expand their mind. They're not exactly scholars over there.
translation: 他们是群想着在脑袋上开个洞来扩展思想的人。他们可不是什么知识分子。

original: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
translation: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。

original: I just need information. No need for violence... yet.
translation: 我需要信息。不需要暴力…就目前来说。

original: What, like you've never done something unpleasant for the promise of your own personal gain? Give it a rest, saint.
translation: 什么，你这么说就好像是你从来都没因为自己的私利而作过不好的事情一样？你算了吧，圣人。

original: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
translation: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。

original: I just need information. No need for violence... yet.
translation: 我需要信息。不需要暴力…就目前来说。

original: Sorry, but that's not really an option. I was only being polite in pretending that it was.
translation: 很抱歉，但是那并不是一个选择。只是出于礼貌我才说它是。

original: Tell you what, take a while and roll it around in your tiny brain. Consider your other options, if you think you've got any.
translation: 告诉你吧，用你的小脑袋好好想一想。考虑一下你的另一个选择，当然了，假如你还能再想出来一个的话。

original: The only reliable currency in the world: information. You provide me with valuable info about the Tribals, I pay in kind.
translation: 这个世界上最可靠的货币：信息。如果你能提供我一些关于部落有价值的信息，那么你将获得很好的报酬。

original: I've got a few more tricks I can share with you, if that's not enough to get you barking.
translation: 如果这还不够让你叫唤的话，我还有一些小把戏可以与你分享，

original: Easy-peasy, right about now they'll be wondering what happened to their hunting party.
translation: 相当容易，这样一来他们就会想要知道，他们的狩猎小队出了什么事。

original: You need to learn to pay attention when I speak.
translation: 当我说话的时候你要注意听。

original: Those mud-lovers want me dead, and haven't extended the common fucking courtesy of telling me why.
translation: 那些玩泥的家伙想要我死，并且还不不能指望他们像正常人一样告诉我为什么要杀死我。

original: So I need you to find a way into their commune and figure out what's going through their addled little heads.
translation: 我需要你跟他们混熟，并且从他们的愚蠢的小脑袋里面找出他们在想些什么。

original: Be a good pup, and Ol' Desmond will give you a treat. And, of course, who knows what riches they have for you to steal?
translation: 乖乖听话，老德斯蒙德会好好地招待你的。当然了，谁知道他们有什么好东西值得你去偷呢?

original: What? Do you have to make some sort of tea out of magic beans, or play a song for their lizard king?
translation: 什么？你打算从那个神奇的豆子里搞出点茶来还是说你打算去给他们的蜥蜴国王唱首歌啊?

original: Please. They're a pack of religious nutballs. Grow a pair and just go through the motions. Anyone with a brain knows that it's all bullshit.
translation: 求求你了。那些都不过是宗教性质的歪理邪说。有点风吹草动就把事情带有感情地夸大到不行。有点大脑的人就会明白那些都是胡扯。

original: Much better! Ahem... Wisely spoken, initiate! Your dedication and, um, flexibility shall serve you well in the Ritual of the Mother Seed!
translation: 好多了！咳咳……说得真好，新人！你的献身精神和，呃，灵活性将在母亲之种仪式中为你所用！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
