translation: 冒险向西去大沼泽，在那你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人还高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集她的种子，跪拜她的智慧。只有这样，你才能进入这神圣的殿堂。

original: Your caution is a credit to your wisdom - only a fool eats before he knows the meal. You are worthy to attempt the Ritual of the Mother Seed!
translation: 你的谨慎是你智慧的证明—只有傻瓜才会吃不了解的东西。你值得尝试母亲之种仪式！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 冒险向西去大沼泽，在那你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人还高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集她的种子，跪拜她的智慧。只有这样，你才能进入这神圣的殿堂。

original: You may not be so brave when you face the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Stronger souls than you have attempted it and lost their minds.
translation: 当你面对母亲之种仪式时，可能就不会这么勇敢了。更强大的的人也已经尝试过，但都丢失了自己的意识。

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 冒险向西去大沼泽，在那你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人还高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集她的种子，跪拜她的智慧。只有这样，你才能进入这神圣的殿堂。

original: What? No, you're doing it wrong! If you want to join, you're supposed to get into the right mindset, you know?
translation: 什么？不，你理解错了！如果你想加入，就应该有正确的思维，知道吗？

original: We don't just take any recruit, either. You've got to be willing to see the world a different way. You may not understand, but it's important to us.
translation: 我们也不会随意招募人。你得愿意换个角度看世界。你可能不理解，但对我们来说很重要。

original: And that means you can't get in unless you've gone through the ritual. Don't worry, it's nothing big. But it really does makes a difference.
translation: 那意味着在完成仪式前，你不能加入。别担心，没什么大不了的。但它真的会带来不同。

original: What's this? A humble traveler, seeking the guidance of our awakened minds? Truly, this is a glorious day!
translation: 这是什么？一位谦逊的旅行者，寻求我们苏醒意识的指引？真的，这是光荣的一天！

original: You are from far away, and must be strong indeed to have traveled this far! But strength is nothing without the guidance of the enlightened mind.
translation: 你从远方来，你确实很强壮，走了这么远的路！但没有觉醒的意识指引，力量将一无是处。

original: If you seek entry, you must be prepared to expand your consciousness. You must prove yourself worthy to transcend!
translation: 如果你在找入口，你必须准备好拓展你的意识。你必须证明自己值得超脱！

original: Look, it's not that I don't want to go home, or anything. I mean, I love my ma, even if she does make me want to claw my eyes out sometimes.
translation: 听着，事情不是这样的，并不是我不想回家。我的意思是，我爱我的母亲，虽然有时候她会逼我发狂。

original: It's just, I came out here to find a fortune. To make my mark. To be able to bring something with me when I do come back.
translation: 我来这里只不过是为了发财。我要成名。我可不想空着手回去。

original: If you see my mom again, let her know I'll be coming back, eventually. Just... not quite yet.
translation: 如果你有机会再见到我母亲，告诉她，我会回去的。只不过…不是现在。

original: Now that I've got this sweet boat? I guess I could head back home... for a while, anyway.
translation: 现在我有了这艘好船？我想我可以回家……一段时间，就这样。

original: Just wait 'till mom sees the haul I'm bringing home!
translation: 等妈妈看到我带回家的东西再说吧！

original: Spare me the details, you goon.
No, but you helped me out, and that's something. Can't let you think I'm not a gracious host, can I?
translation: 不，只要你帮我解决了这个问题，那不就可以了吗。我怎么可能会让你觉得我不是一个仁慈的主人呢？

original: So, tell you what I'll do, I'll share a few tips for the next time you're making a dramatic final stand.
translation: 所以，告诉你我会怎么做吧，我会分享一些技巧，供你下一次做戏剧性的最后一搏时参考。

original: Have I tried to chew on your skull, sir? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
translation: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
translation: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: Have I tried to chew on your skull? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
translation: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
translation: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: Not an option, I'm afraid. The thrill wouldn't be the same if you knew I'd release you at the first sign of trouble, now would it?
translation: 那可不行。如果在一开始就给你制造麻烦的话，那会减少乐趣的。

original: The participants - that's you - assemble in the arena. Once you've made your preparations, signal me with the button inside to begin the hunt.
translation: 参与者——也就是你——在竞技场集合。准备就绪后，就按那里的按钮通知我，开始狩猎。

original: I'll remotely release groups of ferals against which you must defend yourself. Don't worry, I'll make sure there aren't too many loose at one time.
translation: 我会远程遥控，放出几组狂尸鬼，而你则需要保护自己。别担心，我会确保一次放出的数量不会太多。

original: You're in for quite a treat, if I do say so myself.
translation: 要我说的话，你简直是来这里享受大餐的。

original: Weapons are your own responsibility, ma'am. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
translation: 你要自己解决武器问题，女士。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。

original: Weapons are your own responsibility, sir. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
translation: 你要自己解决武器问题，先生。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。

original: Ah, but of course. What would you like to know?
translation: 啊，当然了。你想要知道些什么呢？

original: I do hope you enjoyed it. What shall we discuss?
translation: 我真希望你能乐在其中。我们需要讨论一些什么呢？

original: Need a refresher, do we? What would you like to know?
translation: 需要学习一下，是吗？你想要知道些什么呢？

original: Perhaps you're in the wrong place?  Do come back when you have the means.
translation: 也许你找错地方了吧？当你想到解决办法的时候再回来。

original: That's the spirit! The other participants are waiting, so just press the button inside to let me know when to begin.
translation: 要的就是这种精神！其它的参与者都在等着呢，如果你准备好的话就按下那个按钮。

original: Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: You know nothing! You are nothing! If you're such a man of will, attack me and be done with it! Or do you fear for your life?
translation: 你知道些什么！你这杂种！如果你意志坚定，那就跟我做个了断吧！还是说你贪生怕死？

original: Ha! You make me laugh! So proud! So foolish! Yet, you are all talk! Attack me, if you wish to be done with this!
translation: 哈！真是笑话！如此自大！如此愚蠢！废话连篇！想做个了断的话，就放马过来吧。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: You know nothing! You are nothing! If you're such a man of will, attack me and be done with it! Or do you fear for your life?
translation: 你知道些什么！你这杂种！如果你意志坚定，那就跟我做个了断吧！还是说你贪生怕死？

original: Ha! You make me laugh! So proud! So foolish! Yet, you are all talk! Attack me, if you wish to be done with this!
translation: 哈！真是笑话！如此自大！如此愚蠢！废话连篇！想做个了断的话，就放马过来吧。

original: Yes, Desmond. But who's side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were do bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我和卡尔弗特斗了两百多年！现在，我终于胜利了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 他从我这里偷走了200年的技术、知识和研究成果！每次他打我，现在都不重要了！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我和卡尔弗特斗了两百多年！现在，我终于胜利了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 他从我这里偷走了200年的技术、知识和研究成果！每次他打我，现在都不重要了！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我和卡尔弗特斗了两百多年！现在，我终于胜利了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 他从我这里偷走了200年的技术、知识和研究成果！每次他打我，现在都不重要了！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我和卡尔弗特斗了两百多年！现在，我终于胜利了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 他从我这里偷走了200年的技术、知识和研究成果！每次他打我，现在都不重要了！

original: If nothing else, I have to say that you were good sport!
You'll be the appetizer before I destroy the professor!
translation: 你将会成为我消灭教授前的开胃菜！

original: Brace yourself, my friend. You're about to witness the end of an era!
translation: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！

original: Nihilism is so boring. Try it if you must, I could use the warmup before I kill the professor!
translation: 怀疑主义实在是无聊。如果你想试一下就去吧，我就把这个当作是杀死教授前的暖身运动。

original: And you... Impressive. Very impressive. Perhaps there's more to you than meets the eye.
translation: 至于你…令人印象深刻。非常令人印象深刻。也许你比你看起来的样子要强大得多。

original: I suppose I had you wrong. And that in itself is a once in a lifetime event.
translation: 我想我误解你了。我想这在我的一生中不会再犯第二次了。

original: After this, I won't require your services any longer. I suppose that works out now, doesn't it?
translation: 这一切结束以后，我就不再需要你的服务了。我想这就解决了我们之间的问题，不是吗？

original: So, since we're in agreement about this, let's go in there and "retire" the good professor!
translation: 因为你已经同意了，那么就让我们进去，让那个大教授“退休”吧！

original: Brace yourself, you're about to witness the end of an era!
translation: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！

original: No, I can't. But let's see if you can!
translation: 不，我不能。但是也许你能！

original: I'm 250 years old, so I think I have a shiny thing or two that might interest your tiny brain.
translation: 我已经250岁了，所以说我有一两个好东西可能会让你的小脑袋感兴趣。

original: So, if it's riches and weapons and things that you want, I have more than enough to spare. And all you have to do is do what you do best.
translation: 所以，如果你想要财富或者武器又或者是其他东西的话，我的储藏足够与你分享。而你则做你擅长做的事就好了。

original: Follow orders, and end Professor Calvert.
translation: 听从命令，杀了卡尔弗特教授。

original: I've waited a long time for this.
translation: 我为了这一刻已经等了很久了。

original: Savor the moment, my friend. This is the end of an era.
translation: 好好品味这一时刻吧，我的朋友。这是一个时代的终结。

original: Is that so? I've come a long way, my friend. I highly doubt that my journey will end today!
translation: 是这样吗？这么长时间了，我一路走过来，我的朋友。我觉得我的旅程会在今天结束！

original: Fine then. Would it make your little feelbads all better if I said please?
translation: 好吧好吧。我如果对你说“请”，感觉会好点吧？

original: Then pretty please, fucking help me rid the world of Professor Calvert.
translation: 那么就非常的、非常的请你他妈的帮我解决掉卡尔弗特教授。

original: After 250 years, you think I'll go down to you? Ha! Try it!
translation: 250年了，你以为我会臣服在你的脚下？哈，有本事你就试啊！

original: Well now, finally you show some goddamn sense.
translation: 嗯，你终于说出点他妈的人话了。

original: So, if you're on my side, why did you destroy my jammer?
translation: 那么，如果你是站在我这边的，那你为什么还要摧毁我的干扰设备呢？

original: What? You betrayed me because I wasn't polite? Are you out of your fucking mind?
translation: 什么？你背叛我就因为我没有礼貌？你他妈是不是疯了啊？

original: I... I can't explain it, but I know what I must do. I'm the last Blackhall.
translation: 我…我解释不清楚，但我我必须这样做。布莱克霍尔庄园家族只剩我一人了。

original: I don't need eyes to know you're there. Come here!
translation: 我不用眼睛就知道你在哪里。过来！

original: Yes, we shall be free of all limitations! Thank you, master. We shall be the instrument of your mighty will.
translation: 是的，我们不应受任何界线的阻碍！谢谢你，主人。我们将辅佐你万能的意念。

original: Yes, fine, go destroy the house and its "impurities." Just stop that jammer, and I'll be free of you morons, once and for all!
translation: 是，好吧，去毁了那房子和它的“杂质”。只要关了干扰器，我就能永远摆脱你们这些蠢货了！

original: No need to worry, enlightened one. We shall re-consecrate the mansion, and remove the impurities disrupting your perfect guidance.
translation: 不必担心，开悟者。我们将重新圣化那座宅邸，并清除干扰您完美指引的杂质。

original: No, not "astral knowledge" you simpleton! Psychic domination! And that still won't be possible until you destroy Desmond's jamming device.
translation: 不，不是“星界知识”，你这呆子！心灵控制！而且要等你摧毁了德斯蒙德的干扰器后才有可能！

original: Yes, and you will be able to spread your knowledge across the astral plane for all those wise enough to accept it!
translation: 是的，你将可以在整个星界对那些足够聪明的人散播你的知识。

original: At last, yes! Desmond will die, and our long struggle will finally end the only way it could have - with me as the victor!
translation: 最终，是的！德斯蒙德会死，而我们旷日持久的斗争终将迎来唯一可能的结局——我是胜者！

original: Soon, your sacred land shall be cleared of all obstacles. No longer shall its mystical powers be diminished!
translation: 不久之后，你的圣地将清除一切障碍。所蕴藏的神秘力量将不再衰弱！

original: I only been here a week or so, but I'm about ready to ditch this bunch of dummies. I already stole all the Punga I could ever need.
translation: 我到这里也不过一个星期左右，但是我已经准备好甩开这些白痴了。我已经偷到了足够多的膨葛了。

original: Hey, if you still wanna know where Jackson's hiding, I can help you out. No reason for me to give a damn about this place, y'know?
translation: 嘿，如果你还打算寻找杰克逊的藏身之处的话，我可以帮你。我他妈的才不关心这个地方呢，你要知道。

original: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
translation: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。

original: Sure, fine. Why not? I'm planning on ditching this place, anyway. If you're about to cause trouble with Jackson, all the more reason.
translation: 当然，好吧。为什么不呢？我本也在计划离开这里了。如果你想跟杰克逊一起在这里制造麻烦的话，那就更有理由了。

original: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
translation: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。

original: When you find that old idiot, tell him thanks for all the Punga I could steal!
translation: 当你找到那个老笨蛋的时候，替我转告他，我十分感激他种了那么多膨葛让我偷。

original: Not so fast, grub. You haven't earned the right to go to the transcendent master's retreat.
translation: 还不是时候，食物。你还没有得到许可，去进入至高无上的主人的休养地。

original: Couldn't tell you where he goes for his meditations. I swear, nobody tells me nothing. Maybe ask one of the others?
translation: 我不知道他去哪里冥想去了。我发誓，我什么都不知道。也许你应该问问其他人。

original: Alas, only the worthy may enter his nexus of meditation. He has not seen fit to enlighten me!
translation: 啊呀呀，只有有价值的人才能进入到他那奢华的冥想之地。我可不值得他的启发！

original: Off at his magical thinking-cave, I guess. We're not allowed to know where it is. He says we're not enlightened enough to understand.
translation: 我猜他在那个神奇的冥想之洞里吧。我们不被允许知道它在哪里。他说我们还不够开化，无法理解。

original: I swear, that sort of stuff pisses me off so much. I thought joining would be all drugs and magic, but it's just the same crap as everywhere else.
translation: 我发誓，这种事让我很不爽。我以为加入这里会有药物和魔法，但这里和其他地方都是一样的垃圾。

original: Guess that's why I trailed Jackson to his stupid mystery cave!
translation: 我猜这就是我跟踪杰克逊，找到他那愚蠢的神秘洞穴的原因吧！

original: Leader? That would be Jackson, a man of great wisdom. He has withdrawn to his Cavern of Communion, the better to contemplate the unknowable!
translation: 首领？我想那是杰克逊，一个充满了智慧的人。他离开了圣仪洞窟，是为了更好的冥想未知的事物。

original: Only the righteous are trusted to know where this nexus of understanding lies. And alas, I am not so blessed.
translation: 只有正直的人才会被信任，而去了解那些一目了然的谎言之间的关系。但是我并没受到那种祝福。

original: That would be Jackson. He's normally in here, leading sermons, tending to our needs, and speaking to us of his journeys in the realm of pure thought.
translation: 肯定是杰克逊。他通常都在这里传授知识，或者倾听我们的需求，又或者是用他那纯净的思想来讲述旅行故事。

original: I guess he went off on one of his meditations again. He's always off praying for guidance, especially these days.
translation: 我估计他肯能又去做什么冥想了吧。他总是祈祷能得到引导，尤其是这段日子。

original: You mean Jackson? I thought he was inside. I guess you could check there.
translation: 你是说杰克逊吗？我估计他可能在里面吧，你进去找找吧。

original: I guess you mean Jackson. He speaks the word of enlightenment at us, but he ain't fit to lead a song, much less this bunch of morons.
translation: 我想你说的是杰克逊吧。他时常开导我们，但是他却不是什么当领导的料，在一群白痴面前更是如此。

original: I been meaning to talk to him about this place, but he's off doing his meditation thing.
translation: 我本来是打算跟他谈谈关于这个地方的事情的，但是他好像又去做什么冥想了。

original: Damn, you are wet behind the ears. Jackson leads us, and don't you forget. When he talks, you listen up and catch every word!
translation: 该死，你还真是嫩得一无所知呢。杰克逊领导我们，你可别忘了这一点哦。每当他说话的时候，你要注意去听他说的每一个词。

original: Not that you'll be hearing much for now. He's off meditating.
translation: 你暂时是听不到什么了。他去冥想了。

original: Look to Jackson. He is the one who knows.
translation: 小心杰克逊。没人了解那个人。

original: But do not strain to see him here. Jackson is away.
translation: 别那么想着去见他了，杰克逊已经离开了。

original: I know it may seem that I am a brave shepherd to my flock, but the truth is far more humble.
translation: 我知道，这可能看上去我是我们这些人中勇敢的指引人，但是事实上，我是很卑微的。

original: I am nothing more than the largest fish in our school, as we swim through the astral seas... exploring, learning, and becoming one.
translation: 我不过像是鱼群里最大的一条鱼，畅游于星界之海…去探索，去学习，并且成为其中的一员。

original: But we are not swimming aimlessly! No, we have a beacon! The shining mind speaks to me in my meditations, and guides us always.
translation: 但我们并不是漫无目的地去畅游！不，我们有一个指引人！那光辉的思想总是引导着我的思维，引导着我们的方向。

original: What you are interacting with is merely a holographic projection. And a rather clumsy one, at that, but it's all I can manage at the moment.
translation: 你交互的东西不过是台全息投影仪。而且还是台残次品，不过吗，这也是目前我所能做到的了。

original: As for myself, you gaze upon one of America's greatest minds, preserved through the miracles of SCIENCE!
translation: 至于我嘛，你盯着的是美利坚最伟大的思想之一，通过科学奇迹得以保存！

original: Much more elegant than shambling on as some rotting corpse for all eternity, don't you agree?
translation: 这永远比一具腐烂尸体蹒跚而行要优雅得多，不是吗？

original: Excellent. I cannot tell you how satisfying it is to find a suitable assistant after all these years.
translation: 太好了，这么多年，我终于找到了像你这样合适的帮手，这可真是太令我满意了。

original: Now, the ghoul is a pain, and may require disposal, but Desmond is only of secondary importance. The real target is a device in his possession.
translation: 现在，那个尸鬼是个障碍，也许需要除掉他，不过嘛，德斯蒙德是次要的。真正的目标是他拥有的装置。

original: He has a jammer which limits my projection range to this pathetic cave. Remove that, and I can extend my reach so much further...
translation: 他的那个干扰设备限制了我的对这个可怜的洞穴的控制。除掉那个东西，我就可以将我的思想传播得更远了…

original: More than you could possibly imagine with your squishy pink mind, but the only pressing matter at the moment is a device in his possession.
translation: 理由甚至比你那扁铲脑袋能够想象到的要多得多，但最令人心烦的是他手里的那台设备。

original: He has a jammer that limits my projection range to this pathetic cave. Remove that, and I can extend my reach so much further...
translation: 他的那个干扰设备限制了我的对这个可怜的洞穴的控制。除掉那个东西，我就可以将我的思想传播得更远了。

original: Killing Desmond would be a nice plus, but I'm sure we can get around to that later.
translation: 能除掉德斯蒙德那当然是更好了，不过吗，我想我们可以以后再考虑这件事情。

original: At the moment, they've been no use at all, but I have very few options. They can't even seem to remove a single ghoul from a house.
translation: 目前来说，这些人一点用都没有，但是我的选择并不多。他们连个房子里的一个尸鬼都搞不定。

original: Jackson believes me to be some kind of god. You'd think that would be good, but his interpretations of my commands leaves something to be desired.
translation: 杰克逊还以为我是什么神呢。你也许认为这不错，但是他对我的命令的解释说明却延缓了我渴望要做的事情。

original: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
translation: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。

original: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
translation: 有一个非常麻烦的尸鬼，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要立刻消灭他，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。

original: He thinks I'm some sort of god, and I have no reason to disabuse him of the notion. This makes me de facto leader of the tribe, as it were.
translation: 他以为我是个神，并且我也没有理由去纠正他错误的想法。在某种程度上，这使我成为这个部族的实际首领。

original: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
translation: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。

original: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
translation: 有一个非常麻烦的尸鬼，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要立刻消灭他，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。

original: It is very rare that others are permitted to commune with the master. Many are too foolish to understand the great truths of his higher mind.
translation: 在这里，与主人直接交谈是非常少见的。很少有人能够理解他那更加高尚的思想。

original: But I sense in you a great potential. Perhaps you have what is needed to accept his teachings and grow from his wisdom.
translation: 但是我感觉你很有潜力。也许你能够理解他所传授的东西并且从他的智慧中获益。

original: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Seek him out, and all shall be revealed.
translation: 他在这里显灵，就在海蚀洞里的一个岩石上。找到他，你所有的疑问就会被解答了。

original: Would that I was so wise! No, true leadership of the tribe belongs to the higher mind of the enlightened one!
translation: 要是我也这么聪明就好了！不，部落的真正领导权属于开悟者的更高思想！

original: Although his mind has moved beyond the need for flesh, his consciousness still returns here to guide our people. I merely interpret his wishes.
translation: 尽管他的思想已经超越了肉体，他的意识还留在这里引导我们。我只不过在口述他的希望。

original: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Perhaps if you are fortunate, he will choose to share his wisdom with you!
translation: 他在此显灵，就在伟大海洋旁边洞穴里的一个平台处。如果你够幸运的话，他会与你分享他的智慧。

original: I may be the man who leads our physical affairs, but I cannot claim true wisdom. I take my orders from a higher master!
translation: 我大概是领导这里实际事务的人，但我不能称自己是真正的智慧。我接受更高阶主人的命令！

original: Whether it be how to explore higher planes, or the decision to remove the disruptive ghoul, all wisdom comes from the Transcendent Master.
translation: 无论是定下长远目标，还是决定除掉恼人的尸鬼，所有的智慧，学问与正确的判断都来自于那个至高无上的主人。

original: How wonderful! Perhaps you shall be the one who can clear the holy land of its disruptive presence!
translation: 多好啊！也许你就是那个能够净化这片残破不堪的圣地的救世主。

original: Oh, but the Transcendent Master will want to hear of this! And as one so obviously led by visions, it is your right and honor to tell him yourself!
translation: 哦，但是至高无上的主人会想知道的！作为一个明显被幻象所引导的人，你有权利和荣誉亲自告诉他！

original: After all, it is he who makes all true decisions about the spiritual growth of our tribe, including the decision to cleanse the mansion.
translation: 毕竟，他才是我们部族精神上的决策者，决策也包括净化那公馆。

original: You best keep this one to yourself, sweetie.   The family tonic gets real kick from our secret ingredient.  We just need a lil' bit of battery acid.
translation: 这个你最好自己留着，亲爱的。家传补药的真正刺激来自于我们的秘方。我们只需要一点点电池酸液。

original: Oh, don't look like that, now.
You reckon I'd be around to tell you about it if it weren't safe enough? Bring me six fission batteries and I'll scrape 'em into the mix.
translation: 要是危险的话，你觉得我还会告诉你吗？给我带六块裂变电池，我来把它们磨碎搅进去。

original: I thought so. Those things do carry a smell, don't they? Let me take 'em off your hands, then.
translation: 我想也是。那些东西真臭，不是吗？那我把它们从你手里拿走吧。

original: Well, we'll need yeast. You can find it about anywhere, but there's a big stash on the boardwalk. Three sacks is enough.
translation: 嗯，我们需要酵母。那东西到处都是，不过在木栈道上有一大堆。三袋就够了。

original: I see. Thank you kindly for these.
translation: 我知道了。谢谢你这些东西。

original: Punga fruit and lots of it. The stuff those loonies make at the church is best. Ten of those will do, but might cost you.
translation: 膨葛水果要很多。最好是那帮疯子在教堂种的。10个就行，不过可能要费点力气。

original: Wild fruit will do the trick, but you'll need twice as much of it.
translation: 野生水果也可以，但那样需要两倍的量。

original: Yeah, ten from the growers at the cathedral, or twenty wild ones.
translation: 是的，教堂的10个，或者野生的20个。

original: Well, that's quite a haul you have there, sweetie. You prefer to hand over the wild or the refined fruit?
translation: 喔，好大一堆水果啊，宝贝。你是要给我野生的还是精制的呢？

original: Wild fruit, eh? Just as good, if a sight weaker for flavor.
translation: 野生果，嗯哼？也不错，希望味道不会太浓烈。

original: I see you sprung for the refined fruit. Good for you, sweetie.
translation: 看来你搞到了优质果。太棒了，亲爱的。

original: Should be ready in a matter of hours. Check back soon.
translation: 再过几个小时就好了。稍后再来。

original: Brewin' low and slow, sweetie. Process takes about a day. Why don't you come back in a piece?
translation: 酿酒要小火慢炖，亲爱的。需要一天时间。你为什么不完工后再来？

original: You're an eager one, ain't ya? I have to let the still air out a few days between brews. Check back with me later.
translation: 你还真心急啊？我得让蒸馏器在两次酿酒之间晾上几天。晚点再来找我。

original: I reckon we can. Let's go over the ingredients again.
translation: 我觉得可以。让我们再过一遍材料。

original: There aren't too many ingredients, but I brew large batches, so we need a good bit of each.
translation: 配料不多，但我的酿造量很大，所以每种材料都需要很多。

original: We'll need Punga Fruit, Yeast, and some Fission Batteries - for that extra little kick.
translation: 我们需要膨葛果、酵母和一些裂变电池——以增加刺激性。

original: We need to gather up the ingredients.
That's a righteous shame, but the offer stands. You just say the word, hon.
translation: 真是遗憾，但提议仍然成立。只要你开口，亲爱的。

original: This and that. Let me know when you want to work out the details.
translation: 这样那样。想知道细节就来找我。

original: This isn't a game, you twit. Piss off and do what you're told.
translation: 这可不是闹着玩，你这蠢货。快滚去干你的活吧。

original: Piss off and do what you're told.
If you cross me, it'll be the last fuckin' mistake you ever make in this life.
translation: 如果你跟我作对，那他妈将是你这辈子犯的最后一个错误。

original: Now what else do you want?
Whatever we are, we are not "buddies."
translation: 无论怎样，我们都不会是“伙伴”。

original: Now, what the bloody Christ else did you want?
Are you fucking joking? I suppose you aren't. What is it you people use for money these days? Those bottle caps?
translation: 你他妈在开玩笑？我看不像。最近你们人都把什么当作货币？那些瓶盖？

original: Right. Well, here's a bunch of those. Now go do your goddamn job before my patience runs out.
translation: 没错。唔，这还有一堆。现在，在我失去耐心之前滚回去做你那该死的工作。

original: Then why are you wasting my fuckin' time? Don't you have somewhere to be?
translation: 那你他妈干嘛浪费我时间？没地方可去了吗？

original: I can't exactly say I'm surprised. You're not thinking about doing it, are you?
translation: 我只能说这在意料之中。你没想要这么做，对吧？

original: Well, I'm glad I could be of fuckin' help to you.
translation: 唔，很高兴我他妈帮了你。

original: Well, get on with it. We haven't got a lot of time, you know.
translation: 好吧，有话快说。你明白，我们没多少时间。

original: You fool! What have you done? You will pay for this! PAY!
translation: 你这个笨蛋！你做了什么？你要为此付出代价！付出代价！

original: No one betrays me! Do you under...and? You will SUFFER ... this!
translation: 没人能背叛我！你知……道吗？你将承受……这一切！

original: Now, I'm not normally one to discourage an adventurous spirit, but certain... events have convinced me of the value of forewarning.
translation: 如今，我通常不会劝阻有冒险精神的家伙，但某些……事让我相信预先警告的重要性。

original: I know you think you're ready for anything, but the threats you'll face in the swamp make those super mutants look like playful puppies.
translation: 我知道你认为自己已经做好面对一切的准备，但你在沼泽里面对的威胁，会让那些超级变种人看起来像顽皮的小狗。

original: So just be sure you know what you're getting into, okay? You still want to head out to Point Lookout?
translation: 所以你一定要清楚自己要面对什么，好吗？你仍想去望海崖吗？

original: Looking for fame and fortune? Hoping to cultivate the delicious Punga fruit? Or just looking to run away from your life on these dreary shores?
translation: 在寻找财富与名誉么?渴望播种美味的膨葛果吗?还是说打算离开这个阴郁的海岸?

original: Let's see what you've got to trade.
translation: 让我看看你都有些什么东西要卖。

original: At last! He's just ahead! I'll circle around and distract him. You take him from the front.
translation: 终于！要逮到他了！我绕着分散他的注意力。你从正面进攻。

original: Not hardly. I'll be here, and you'll be back. But you'd best hurry, or I may reconsider that reward I promised you.
translation: 还没完呢。我就在这，你也会回来。但你最好赶快，否则我要重新考虑下你的报酬了。

original: I've got a lifetime to wait.
translation: 我有一辈子时间来等你。

original: Now that's more like it. Follow me! You're about to witness the end of an era!
translation: 这才像话嘛。跟着我！你将见证一个时代的终结！

original: I suggest you hurry your pretty self up. I'm sure the bastard's got some sort of escape plan.
translation: 最好抓紧时间。我保证那个混蛋会想法子跑掉。

original: Well, aren't you a fuckin' softie. But Calvert is here. He's got a lab under the lighthouse, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
translation: 唔，你太他妈软了。但卡尔弗特就在这里。灯塔下有一座他的实验室，那个小杂种。一直在我眼皮底下！

original: I found it when he boosted his signal to try to get through the jamming, when he sent those Tribals to kill my poor pups...
translation: 为了派部落来杀掉我可怜的狗狗，他便加强了信号以突破干扰，就这个时候被我发现了…

original: He's down there, hiding behind robots and machines, sucking life! Pathetic! He dies now!
translation: 他就在下面，躲在机器人与机器身后，悲惨的生活！悲哀！现在去死吧！

original: The lighthouse. He's got a lab under there, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
translation: 那灯塔。他在下面有座实验室，那个小杂种。一直在我眼皮底下！

original: I found it when he boosted his signal to try to get through the jamming, when he sent those Tribals to kill my poor pups...
translation: 为了派部落来杀掉我可怜的狗狗，他便加强了信号以突破干扰，就这个时候被我发现了…

original: He's down there, hiding behind robots and machines, sucking life! Pathetic! He dies now!
translation: 他就在下面，躲在机器人与机器身后，悲惨的生活！悲哀！现在去死吧！

original: Well, that's good since the game is almost done. He's in the lighthouse, the little fuck. Right under my nose the whole time!
translation: 唔，很好，游戏快结束了。他在灯塔里，小杂种。一直就在我眼皮底下！

original: Hiding behind robots and machines, what a miserable life! Pathetic! He dies now!
translation: 躲在机器与机器人身后，多么可悲的人生！悲哀！他现在死了！

original: You! You're no tribal! Get in here and help me fight these bastards off, goddamnit!
translation: 你！你不是部族的人！快进来帮我对付这些混蛋，该死！

original: Yes, you! I see you out there. Stop dicking around and help me, or else these cocksuckers will be coming after you next!
translation: 是的，就是你！我看见你了。别闹了，快来帮我，不然这些狗杂种下一个就会来对付你！

original: I can't stay barricaded in this saferoom forever. Now get in here and lend a hand!
translation: 我不可能把自己永远锁在这间安全室里。快进来帮忙啊！

original: Time to shit or get off the pot, joker. Get inside and help, or get off my damned lawn.
translation: 别站着茅坑不拉屎，小丑。要么进来帮忙，要么滚出我的草坪。

original: The type that kills everyone outside of my saferoom and leaves a hell of a mess to clean up. Standard type.
translation: 就是杀掉我安全室外所有人，留下一地狼藉的那种。标准型。

original: Not worth wasting on ignorant savages like them, honestly. Just as well you came along when you did.
translation: 老实说，不值得浪费在他们这种无知的野蛮人身上。还好你及时出现了。

original: So, tell you what I'll do, I'll share a few tips for the next time you're making a dramatic final stand.
translation: 所以，告诉你我会怎么做吧，我会分享一些技巧，供你下一次做戏剧性的最后一搏时参考。

original: Air Com, we have multiple flashpoints on horizon, come back?
translation: 空军指挥部，我们发现地平线有多处闪光点，请指示？

original: Air Command, USN Three-Five-Oh requesting landing vector. Have zero ceiling visbility and low on state, somebody get me a landing clearance.
translation: 空军指挥部，美国海军3-5-0请求着陆航线。当前能见度为零并且器械运转状态不佳，请给与着陆指示。

original: State One plus one zero to splash, have zero read on outer marker. This is USN Three-Five-Oh, I'm blind out here.
translation: 状态为离斑点1+10处，雷达无显示。这里是美国海军3-5-0，我失去定位能力。

original: Attempting Emergency Landing over water. INS pinger active on distress band. Flaps up, descent to eight cherubs. Three green, over.
translation: 尝试紧急水上迫降。惯性导航系统声波发生器紧急启动。有振动，高度降至800。通话结束。

original: Five cherubs, treeline up, throttle easy on four lights. Prepping to pull the loud handle.  <Static>
translation: 高度降至500，垂直下降，油门调节可轻易达到四灯。做好拉起飞机准备。<静电声>

original: Good! Good... now, come speak with me. We have matters to discuss...
translation: 很好！好吧… 现在，来跟我聊聊。有些事需要讨论…

original: No! How... how could this... be... ... ?
No! How... how could this... be... ... ?

translation: 所有机器人！启动！干掉德斯蒙德！

original: What are you waiting for? Why do you hesitate? DESTROY HIM!
translation: 你还等什么？还犹豫什么？消灭他！

original: Surely you mean that you will TRY!
I certainly hope you enjoy your final moments!
translation: 我当然希望你能享受最后的时刻！

original: Ha ha ha ha ha! YES! LET'S!
Assist me, my robots! I am... under attack!
translation: 协助我，我的机器人！我遭到了…攻击！

original: Assist me, my robots! I am... under attack!
translation: 协助我，我的机器人！我遭到了…攻击！

original: Don't think of it as betrayal. No no no, betrayal is for lesser men! Your use to me has simply expired.
translation: 别把这当做背叛。不不不，小人才会背叛！只是你对我已经没用了而已。

original: And now, I will dispose of you.
Betrayal? No no no, betrayal is for lesser men! Your use to me has simply expired.
translation: 背叛？不不不，小人才会背叛！只是你对我已经没用了而已。

original: And now, I will dispose of you.
Well, for you... I have a very special gift:
translation: 唔，我为你…准备了一份特别的礼物：

original: Well, I would have expected nothing less from you. And now, I have a very special gift:
translation: 我没想到你会这么无能。现在，我有份特别的礼物：

original: Well, for you... I have a very special gift:
translation: 唔，我为你…准备了一份特别的礼物：

original: Me? Nah, not unless you try any funny business. Besides, you already got stabbed enough today.
translation: 我？不，除非你尝试点有意思的事。再说，你今天已经被捅够多刀子了。

original: Oh, guess you don't know. For the last part of the ritual, after you pass out, this guy brings you back, cuts open your skull, and "frees your mind."
translation: 噢，看来你还不知道。仪式最后一部分。你晕倒后，他们找人把你带回来，切开你的头颅，然后“解放你的思想”。

original: As in, he rips out a bit of your brain. It's supposed to be the part that "holds you back," but that doesn't always work out so good...
translation: 就是说，他挖下你大脑一小点。本应该是“束缚你”的部分，但不是总这么顺利……

original: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
translation: 总之，你看上去生龙活虎，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！

original: That's gotta be the sanest thing I've heard all day! Of course, 'round here that's not saying a whole lot. Ritual hit most of them pretty hard.
translation: 这是我今天听到最理智的声音！当然，在这儿还不算什么。仪式对大多数人伤害很大。

original: Oh, guess you don't know. For the last part of the ritual, after you pass out, this guy brings you back, cuts open your skull, and "frees your mind."
translation: 噢，看来你还不知道。仪式最后一部分。你晕倒后，他们找人把你带回来，切开你的头颅，然后“解放你的思想”。

original: As in, he rips out a bit of your brain. It's supposed to be the part that "holds you back," but that doesn't always work out so good...
translation: 就是说，他挖下你大脑一小点。本应该是“束缚你”的部分，但不是总这么顺利……

original: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
translation: 总之，你看上去生龙活虎，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！

original: You sure you're feeling okay in there? You might want to check your head for a scar. We all get 'em after going to that bog.
translation: 你确定你没事？你最好检查一下头上有没有伤疤，我们去沼泽后都会留下疤痕。

original: Y'know, the last part of the ritual. After you pass out, they get a guy to bring you back, cut open your skull, and "free your mind."
translation: 你想想，就是仪式的最后部分。你晕倒后，他们找个人把你带回来，割开你的头骨，“解放你的思想”。

original: As in, he rips out a bit of your brain. It's supposed to be the part that "holds you back," but that doesn't always work out so good...
translation: 就是说，他挖下你大脑一小点。本应该是“束缚你”的部分，但不是总这么顺利……

original: Anyway, you look like a lively one, so welcome to the tribe! My name's Nadine!
translation: 总之，你看上去生龙活虎，所以欢迎来到部落！我叫娜丁！

original: Hey, now! I might still be ten kinds of crazy! You don't even know me, and you can't tell just from looking!
translation: 现在！我可能还是疯疯癫癫的呢！就算看到了我，你甚至不知道我是谁！

original: I could be the "friendly 'til she stabs you in the neck" kinda crazy. Then where'd you be, smart-aleck? All surprised and stabbed, that's where!
translation: “我一直对她很友好，直到她发狂的捅了你一刀。”你会怎么办，自作聪明的家伙？被捅了，然后大吃一惊，就是这样！

original: But I'm not a vegetable, so I'm sane enough. The rest weren't so lucky when they got their heads cut open.
translation: 但我还没变成植物人，所以算是清醒。其他人被开脑时可就没那么幸运了。

original: You still remember your name? Math? How's your memory?
translation: 你还记得你叫什么吗？Math？你还记得点什么吗？

original: When I came back, there were bits in my memory where all I could recall was a white light and a jumble of voices. Crazy, huh?
translation: 我醒来时，脑中只有一片白光和嘈杂的声音嗡嗡作响。听上去很疯狂，呃？

original: But you're not drooling, so you're doing okay. The rest weren't so lucky when they got their heads cut open.
translation: 但你还清醒，看来情况不算太糟。其他人被开脑时可就没那么幸运了。

original: One-Mississippi, two-Mississippi, three-Mississippi, four-Mississippi, five-Mississippi, six-Mississippi, seven-Mississippi, 8-9-10.
translation: 一只羊，二只羊，三只羊，四只羊，五只羊，六只羊，七只羊，八—九—十。

original: One... two... three... four... five... six... seven... eight... nine... ten...
translation: 一…二…三…四…五…六…七…八…九…十…

original: Depends what you're looking for. If you need supplies, head to the shop over at the end of these docks. Convenient, and I get caps for referring you.
translation: 看你要找什么了。如果你需要补给，可以去码头尽头的商店。很方便，而且我介绍你去还能拿盖子。

original: If you need a place to stay, there's an old motel further into town. The beds there are still pretty soft, even if it's because they're full of lice.
translation: 如果你需要住的地方，城里有家老汽车旅馆。那里的床还是很软的，即使因为长满了虱子。

original: And if you're looking for some hunting, there's a fellow named Plik who runs a club out in the northeast. Strictly for high-rollers, though.
translation: 如果你想打猎，有个叫普利克的家伙，在东北部开了家俱乐部。不过仅限大客户。

original: Ok Ok...I'll do it.  Just point that thing somewhere else.   ...My name is John Adlam, son of Joseph Adlam, and brother of Richard Adlam.
translation: 好，好…我会说的。你能不能把那个东西指向别处啊。…我的名字是约翰·阿德拉姆，约瑟夫·阿德拉姆的儿子，理查德·阿德拉姆的哥哥。

original: Two days ago I was caught stealing from the groups' claim.
Today, with the consent of my father, I am to be shot and killed on the cliffs of the old cathedral by the hands of my brother, Richard.
translation: 今天，在我父亲的许可之下，我将会在大教堂那里的悬崖上被枪决，而执行枪决的人是我的弟弟，理查德。

original: With my execution, my punishment is exacted and the Adlam name will be avenged.
translation: 我被枪决以后，我将受到应有的惩罚，而且阿德拉姆家也会被正名。

original: Let my punishment be a reminder to those who may be tempted to do as I did.
translation: 就让对我的惩罚警告后人不要步我后尘。

original: Desmond... That bag of bones and bile will pay dearly for his trespasses!
translation: 德斯蒙德…对于他的冒犯，那袋子骨头和胆汁将会是很好的回敬。

original: Were it not for his interference, I would still have a body. Still, its absence has only honed my brilliance, so perhaps I owe him my thanks.
translation: 要不是因为他的干扰，我还不至于丢掉我的身体。不过没了身体的我却因此获得了卓越的才华，也许我应该感谢他呢。

original: An appreciation I'll show in the form of a quick and messy death! HA HA HA!
translation: 快速而又肮脏的死亡就是我的感激！哈哈哈！

original: Nice work -- as if sneaking into a compound of morons is any kind of work. So why haven't you tracked down their leader and grilled him for info?
translation: 干得好 — 就好像是偷偷潜入到一群傻子中间一样，又不是什么大不了的。所以说，你为什么没有捉住他然后拷问他？

original: Don't waste your time reporting back. Go find him and figure out what he wants with this place, you moron!
translation: 不要浪费时间汇报。去找他，看看他到底要用这个地方做什么，你这个傻子！

original: And? You didn't go track him down and grill him for information?
translation: 然后呢？你没有捉住他然后拷问他？

original: I'm not your daddy. Don't waste your time checking in! Go find him and figure out what he wants with this place, you moron!
translation: 我可不是你老爸。不要浪费时间！去找他，看看他到底要用这个地方做什么，你这个傻子！

original: What's the difference between you and me, kid? What makes a gifted killer like yourself into a rock-hard bastard like me?
translation: 你跟我之间有什么不同呢，孩子？是什么让一个有着杀人天赋的你跟我这样铁石心肠的混蛋混在一起的呢？

original: The answer is training, you ignorant fuck! I've got a hundred years of experience on you, and don't you forget it.
translation: 答案就是训练，你这个无知的笨蛋！我比你的经验要多上百年，可不要忘记这一点。

original: Stick by me, and you'll get a master's class in doing what has to be done.
translation: 跟着我好好干，包你会成为这一行当里的翘楚。

original: My story? Tell you what, kid. My story's a lot like a Deathclaw's tongue.
translation: 我的事？告诉你吧，孩子。我的故事简直有死亡爪的舌头那么长。

original: It's long, messy, and you don't want to get too personal with it. Understand?
translation: 故事很长，很混乱，并且你也不会想要涉入太深的，明白了吗？

original: Suffice it to say, I have business in Point Lookout. If you help, you will be repaid for your efforts. That's all you want to fucking know.
translation: 我只想说，我在望海崖有事要做。如果你肯帮忙的话，你将会得到报酬。这他妈的就是你想要知道的事情。

original: Don't play at what you misunderstand, troglodyte. Get out.
translation: 别什么事都不懂装懂，穴居人。滚出去。

original: We are nothing alike.  More so than you could ever comprehend. Go now, and never return.
translation: 我们完全不同。你完全无法理解。走吧，别再回来了。

original: Forgive my indiscretion. Still, with her death I see no reason for you to keep hold of that book. For all you know, the same fate may befall you.
translation: 原谅我的草率。不过，既然她死了，你就更没理由留着那书了。你应该知道，同样的命运也可能降临在你身上。

original: Can't say that I did, but that's all the more reason you should give the book to me.
translation: 不能说是我干的，但你更应该把书给我。

original: Swampfolk fetishes or totems. They probably mark territorial lines, or maybe are involved with rituals of some kind.
translation: 沼泽居民的神像或图腾。可能是用来标记地盘，或者参与某种仪式。

original: I've read about a lot of primitive beliefs that use similar symbols. Vodou magic, Santería, Obeah. Fascinating, if somewhat disturbing.
translation: 我读到过大量用到类似符号的原始信仰。巫毒术，桑泰利亚教派，奥比巫术。很迷人，也很可怕。

original: Though the underlying beliefs seem quite dark, I'm not sure they're anything more than an empty set of traditions to the swampfolk.
translation: 虽然背后的信仰似乎相当黑暗，但我不确定它们对沼泽居民来说是否只是一套空洞的传统。

original: That's an ironic choice of words, actually.
That Cathedral was once a sanctuary of the Faith, true.
translation: 那座大教堂原本是信仰的圣殿，真的。

original: Those who inhabit it now, however, are not of the Faith and won't suffer my presence. So no, child - that Cathedral is no place for me.
translation: 现在住在里面的人，并无信仰，也不能忍受我的出现。所以不，孩子，大教堂不是我该去的地方。

original: No, not exactly. I'd be happy to tell you more about my beliefs, if you're interested.
translation: 不，不太确切。我很乐意告诉你更多我的信仰，如果你感兴趣的话。

original: The feeling is mutual, child. I'd enjoy sharing my belief in the Faith, if you'll listen.
translation: 感受是相互的，孩子。我很高兴与你分享我坚定地信念，如果你要听的话。

original: When great men rise, they will clash. It's inevitable. Calvert and I are both men of great power.
translation: 当伟人崛起时，他们就会碰撞。这不可避免。卡尔弗特和我都是能力强大的人。

original: But today, our rivalry ends. Now let's go!
translation: 但今天，我会终结这种对峙。开始吧！

original: You must decide! Do it now!
Then you shall die along with him!

translation: 太棒了！干掉他！干掉德斯蒙德！

original: You cannot! The doors are locked! You will remain here until you destroy Desmond!
translation: 走不掉的！门已经锁了！德斯蒙德死之前前，你都无法离开！

original: This is a rivalry that has lasted for centuries! You cannot possibly understand with your tiny meaty brain!
translation: 这场斗争已经持续了几个世纪！你那小肉脑袋不可能理解！

original: Creatures of great power must collide! It is inevitable!
translation: 伟大力量必会碰撞！不可避免！

original: Destroy Desmond! Help me to end this, and I will give you a reward beyond your imagination!
translation: 干掉德斯蒙德！帮我这个忙，我会给你意想不到的惊喜！

original: One beyond your imagination! Beyond reckoning! The most amazing gift a living creature can be granted!
translation: 超乎你的想象！你绝不会失望的！作为一个活人，这是最不可思议的礼物！

original: You would have been wise to listen to him!
You are permitted to talk while you DIE!
translation: 有什么话等下地狱再说吧！
卡尔弗特教授从不说笑！

original: I have a very special gift you for, my friend...
translation: 我有一个非常特别的礼物送给你，我的朋友…

original: Well, I would have expected nothing less from you. And now, I have a very special gift:
translation: 我没想到你会这么无能。现在，我有份特别的礼物：

original: Indeed, I shall! In fact, I have a very special gift for you, my friend...
translation: 没错，我会的！其实，我有份特别的礼物给你，朋友…

original: There's not much to tell. What do you want to know?
translation: 没什么好说的。你想知道什么？

original: Sure thing. Are you here to buy something?
translation: 当然。你是来买东西的吗？

original: I found some of it. Some was here when I got here. I get some from them smugglers.
translation: 我找到了一些。来的时候就有一些。我还从私掠者那里弄到一些。

original: And every once in a while, that weirdo with the boat comes up here and trades a few good things.
translation: 并且每隔一段时间，那个开船的古怪家伙就会来这里一次并交易一些好东西。

original: Oh, you're thinking... no, no. It's not a family thing. I took the name of the store when I found this place a couple years ago.
translation: 哦，你是不是以为…不，不。这不是什么家族产业。几年前，我找到这个地方，并且将店归在我的名下。

original: Truth is, I don't even remember much before that. Woke up here with a headache a couple years ago with the shop already set up.
translation: 事实上，我不太记得在那之前发生的事情。几年前，当我带着头痛醒来的时候，这家商店就已经建好了。

original: People came in, and started trading. I didn't complain. It just became a job.
translation: 人们来到这里，买卖东西。我没什么可抱怨的。因为这已经变成了我的工作。

original: The swamp folk, mostly. I guess they don't bother me none because I was born here.
translation: 一般来说都是些沼泽居民。他们打搅我是因为我生在这里。

original: They mostly trade meat and fruit. Never any cash or goods.
translation: 一般他们都用肉或者水果来交易。从来不用现金或者货物。

original: Them mercs are good for some trade in real hardware, so if'n you need ammo or anything like that, I can help you out.
translation: 佣兵对这方面的交易很在行，所以，如果你需要弹药或者其它类似的东西的话，我是可以帮你的。

original: No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
translation: 不，不。一点也不！我这里很少有从大老远来的客人。

original: My usual customers, well. I usually smell 'em before I see 'em.
translation: 我的客人。一般来说他们到我这里之前，我先嗅到他们的味道。

original: No, no. Not at all! I'm just not used to people all the way out here.
translation: 不，不。一点也不！我这里很少有从大老远来的客人。

original: My usual customers, well. I usually smell 'em before I see 'em.
translation: 我的客人。一般来说他们到我这里之前，我先嗅到他们的味道。

original: Sure as a swamp folk's head is squishy.
translation: 真像个沼泽居民脑袋一样粘糊糊的。

original: I ain't met the gun I couldn't fix.
Of course. I learned many tricks from my father.
translation: 当然。我从父亲那儿学了很多技术。

original: Certainly. Madam Panada is quite handy with a wrench.
translation: 当然了。帕娜达女士很会使扳手。

original: I got all sorts of stuff. Take a look.
translation: 我这里什么都有。看看我的货吧。

original: I knew that's why you came to me...
translation: 我知道你为什么来找我…

original: All of Madam Panada's wares are top quality.
translation: 帕娜达女士的商品可都是最优质的。

original: And what is it you would like to purchase?
Shouldn't tease somebody come down with Orange Fever, sweetie.
translation: 亲爱的，你不该戏弄一个得了橘热病的人。

original: Well, I'll be. Here, let me give you something for your trouble.
translation: 嗯，不会吧。来，我给你点补偿吧。

original: Tell you what - have a bit. This is left over from an old batch, but should be a swig or two there. More'n enough to loosen you up, I wager!
translation: 告诉你—来一点。这是一批老货里剩的，可能够喝一两口。足够让你放松了，我打赌。

original: I'm sure you're good for it, but I require cash.
translation: 我知道你行，但是我想要现金。

original: I hope you'll reconsider. Simply not the same without you.
translation: 我希望你重新考虑。你绝对是不二人选。

original: Gristle and gore await! Proceed inside and use the button, as before.
translation: 软骨和血块在等待着你！进到里面来，并且按下那个按钮，就像以前一样。

original: Your enthusiasm is flattering, but I'll need time to round up more fodder. Could I trouble you to return in a day or two?
translation: 你的热情让我受宠若惊，但我还需要时间来聚集更多的人。能麻烦你过一两天再来吗？

original: Why, certainly! You're already registered, but I'll need five hundred caps to enter this particular safari. You understand.
translation: 为什么，当然了！你已经注册了，但是你还需要再交500个瓶盖来加入到这个旅行当中。你是明白的。

original: I've found that price keeps the riff-raff out. You aren't riff-raff, now, are you?
translation: 我发现这个价位能把不入流的人拒之门外。你不是这种人，不是吗？

original: Your loss, I'm afraid. Come back if you reconsider.
translation: 你输了。如果你打算再次尝试的话就来找我。

original: Only the finest bit of sport you've ever enjoyed!
translation: 绝对是你从未体验过的最棒的运动！

original: Once we review the rules and see to a nominal thousand caps registration fee, of course.
translation: 当然是在我们学习规则，并支付了象征性的一千瓶盖注册费之后。

original: Damn right! Now, why can't the rest of the world figure that one out?
translation: 太他妈对了，其他人怎么就想不到呢？

original: So that leaves me with a boat, a load of Punga, and a wicked scar. Damn if I haven't earned that adventure I came out looking for.
translation: 我都得到了些什么？一艘船，一批膨葛，和一道诡异的伤疤。要是出来没碰上这通冒险，我真他妈要后悔死。

original: Think I'll take over running this ship. I can travel as I like, and always head back to the Wasteland to see mom. Not a bad way to live, huh?
translation: 现在就由我来接管这艘船吧。想去哪就去哪，还可以常回废土看看妈妈。不错的主意，你说呢？

original: Of course, you can always ride for free!
translation: 当然，随时欢迎你来，完全免费！

original: First off, I'm claiming this boat. I put Tobar down, so it's mine, them's the rules of the ocean.
translation: 首先，我要占有这艘船。我扳倒了托巴尔，所以船归我了，这就是大海的规则。

original: So that leaves me with a boat, a load of Punga, and a wicked scar. Damn if I haven't earned that adventure I came out looking for.
translation: 我都得到了些什么？一艘船，一批膨葛，和一道诡异的伤疤。要是出来没碰上这通冒险，我真他妈要后悔死。

original: Think I'll take over running this ship. I can travel as I like, and always head back to the Wasteland to see mom. Not a bad way to live, huh?
translation: 现在就由我来接管这艘船吧。想去哪就去哪，还可以常回废土看看妈妈。不错的主意，你说呢？

original: Of course, you can always ride for free!
translation: 当然，随时欢迎你来，完全免费！

original: Yeah, looks like it. When the Tribals would send someone to the swamp, he'd be waiting around to nab them when the Punga seeds gassed them.
translation: 恩，至少看来是如此。他一直蹲守在沼泽，一旦部落的人被膨葛种子熏倒，就会落入他的手中。

original: He'd do his amateur surgery for the Tribals and let us wander back, all in exchange for Punga Fruit to trade. Sweet little deal he had going on.
translation: 他以业余水平给部落的人进行手术，让我们晃悠回来，只为换来可以交易的膨葛水果。他的小买卖还真可爱。

original: Anyway, I figured you'd want a shot at some revenge, so I put him under citizen's arrest, sorta.
translation: 总之，我发现你试图进行报复，所以我将他交予于市民进行关押。

original: I consider it payment for what he did to my poor, sliced-up brain. I was going to do the same to him, but I figured you'd want the honor.
translation: 他对我的大脑所做的一些，我要让他付出代价。我要以其人之道还治其人之身，但看来你也很乐意这么干。

original: Seems that when the Tribals would send someone to the swamp, he'd be waiting around to nab them when the Punga seeds gassed them.
translation: 似乎他一直守在沼泽，一旦部落派的人被膨葛种子熏倒，就会落入他的手中。

original: He'd do his amateur surgery for the Tribals and let us wander back, all in exchange for Punga Fruit to trade. Sweet little deal he had going on.
translation: 他以业余水平给部落的人进行手术，让我们晃悠回来，只为换来可以交易的膨葛水果。他的小买卖还真可爱。

original: Sounds pretty wacko, right? Well, I wouldn't have believed me either, until I snuck a peek in Tobar's engine room.
translation: 听上去很疯狂吧？唔，如果不是我溜进了托巴尔的引擎室，我也不会相信。

original: From the look of it, he kept every bit of gray matter he cut out, and he had quite a collection! You can take a look, if your stomach's up to it.
translation: 看上去，他保留了切下的所有灰质，竟如此之多！你可以看看，希望不会给你的胃带来太大负担。

original: And while you're in there, feel free to give Tobar my love. Preferably with the sharp end of a hot knife.
translation: 还有，你进去时，尽情对托巴尔献上我的爱意。锐利的刀锋是个不错的主意。

original: Yeah, he seemed nice enough, didn't he? I wouldn't have figured it out if I hadn't snuck into his engine room while waiting for you.
translation: 是的，他看上去挺不错，不是吗？要不是等你的时候溜进引擎室，我也还被蒙在鼓里。

original: From the look of it, he kept every bit of gray matter he cut out, and he had quite a collection! You can take a look, if your stomach's up to it.
translation: 看上去，他保留了切下的所有灰质，竟如此之多！你可以看看，希望不会给你的胃带来太大负担。

original: And while you're in there, feel free to give Tobar my love. Preferably with the sharp end of a hot knife.
translation: 还有，你进去时，尽情对托巴尔献上我的爱意。锐利的刀锋是个不错的主意。

original: You're a lucky one, and it probably didn't do any permanent damage. Scar'll heal up on its own, and you'll be good as new.
translation: 你很幸运，受伤并不严重。伤口会慢慢愈合，而你也会慢慢好起来的。

original: Of course, you'll still be missing a chunk of brain, but it looks like you didn't need that bit anyway.
translation: 当然，你的大脑还是会缺一块，但看起来缺的那块你也用不上。

original: Now, hold still and I'll see if I can't help you look like your old self again.
translation: 现在呢，不要动，让我看看我能否帮你恢复到原样。

original: It's all a little fuzzy for me, but I've got a hunch. I'm gonna go do some snooping, see what I can figure out.
translation: 这一切都令我很困惑，但我有种预感。我会去打探一下，看能找到些什么。

original: Meet me by the riverboat in a day or so, and maybe I'll have something for you.
translation: 大约一天后在船那碰头，也许我能搞到一些有用的东西。

original: Maybe. We are both simple. But simple is not the same as stupid.
translation: 也许吧。我们都很单纯。但是单纯不等于傻。

original: It feels good to work with dirt, doesn't it? Some people call it work, but they don't understand.
translation: 跟土打交道的感觉可是相当好的，不是吗？有些人说那叫工作，实际上他们根本不理解。

original: Take my shovel. It has seen much use, and much dirt. Maybe it will help you?
translation: 拿上我的铲子。已经使用过很多次了，上面还有不少泥土。也许能帮上你的忙？

original: But be careful not to cut yourself with it. It can make you sick.
translation: 小心点，不要被它割伤。不然你会因此得病的。

original: I do not know if this is a secret, but I have always used this shovel. It has seen much work, and much dirt.
translation: 我不知道这算不算秘诀，但我一直用这把铲子。它见证了许多工作和泥土。

original: If it helps, have it. But be careful not to cut yourself. It can make you sick.
translation: 如果它能帮上忙，你就把它拿去。但小心别割到自己，它会让你得病的。

original: We'll, okay. But if you change your mind, you can always hang out here. I won't mind.
translation: 好的。但是如果你改变主意的话，你还可以回来，这里永远都欢迎你。我不会介意的。

original: You're welcome. So, um, what do you want to do now? You wanna play a game? Like hide or seek, or tag or something?
translation: 你太客气了。嗯，你打算做什么呢？你想玩捉迷藏么，还是其他游戏?

original: Just get out of here, okay, mister? Don't make me hurt you!
translation: 赶紧离开这里，可以吗，先生？不要逼我伤害你！

original: Just get out of here, okay, lady? Don't make me hurt you!
translation: 赶紧离开这里，可以吗，女士？不要逼我伤害你！

original: Whatever. You're a dumb head. I didn't want your help anyway.
translation: 那就算了。你是个笨蛋。再说了，我也不想让你帮忙。

original: I used to have Kenny-Bear around, but he fell down the big shaft back there. It's too scary for me to go get him. Maybe you can, though?
translation: 我以前有肯尼熊，但是他掉到那个通风管道里面去了。我太害怕了，不敢下去找。也许你可以帮我？

original: Well... I guess you can stay here when you need to. And you can leave your stuff, I won't mess with it.
translation: 嗯…我想你可以留在这里，如果你想的话。你也可以把你的东西保存在这里，我不会动你的东西的。

original: So, do you like games? Wanna play hide and seek, or tag or something?
translation: 那么，你喜欢玩游戏吗？想要玩捉迷藏游戏，或者其他游戏？

original: Fine. I didn't want to play with you anyway.
translation: 算了。我本来也没打算跟你玩。

original: Wait here and count to 10. Slowly! Then see if you can find me. Okay? No cheating! Close your eyes and count to ten. Go!
translation: 你就在这里，数到十。要慢点数啊！然后看看能不能找到我，好吗？不许作弊！闭上你的眼睛然后开始数。开始！

original: What do you wanna play? Hide and seek? Or tag?
translation: 你想玩什么，捉迷藏？还是什么?

original: Okay. Fine. I guess you can hang out here. You can keep your stuff here too, I won't mess with it.
translation: 可以。好吧。我想你可以留在这里。你也可以把东西保存在这里，我不会动你的东西的。

original: So what do you want to do first? Play hide and seek, or tag?
translation: 所以，你打算做什么呢？玩捉迷藏游戏，或者其他游戏？

original: Hmm. I dunno, mister. You didn't try to kill me, and you seem pretty nice for a grownup. But still... How do I know I can trust you?
translation: 嗯。我不，先生。你没有杀我，作为成年人你还蛮好的。但…我怎么知道我能相信你？

original: Hmm. I dunno, lady. You didn't try to kill me, and you seem pretty nice for a grownup. But still... How do I know I can trust you?
translation: 嗯。我不，女士。你没有杀我，作为成年人你还蛮好的。但…我怎么知道我能相信你？

original: I'm grown up enough already. And I'm the only thing I can be - me.
translation: 我已经长大了。我已经成为了我唯一能成为的人 - 我自己。

original: I got bored locked up in the basement all the time. So, I started taking things apart and putting them back together again.
translation: 我在地下室里的生活实在是无聊。所以，我就开始学着把东西拆开然后再组装起来。

original: Things aren't so strange when you can see all the stuff that makes them. You know? See something's insides? That's where the real thing is.
translation: 你知道吗，如果你明白其中的构造，你就不会觉得东西很奇怪了。看见里面的东西了吗？那就是东西的实质所在。

original: Listen up, mister. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine. And if you're going to be mean, then you aren't welcome.
translation: 听着，先生。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。如果你不规矩点，你就不再受到欢迎。

original: Listen up, lady. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine. And if you're going to be mean, then you aren't welcome.
translation: 听着，女士。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。如果你不规矩点，你就不再受到欢迎。

original: Yeah well, bullets work on everybody. Try me, mister. I dare you.
translation: 是啊，嗯，子弹对谁都有效。向我试试啊，先生。如果你敢的话。

original: Yeah well, bullets work on everybody. Try me, lady. I dare you.
translation: 是啊，嗯，子弹对谁都有效。向我试试啊，女士。如果你敢的话。

original: I'm glad you think so. Conversation is but one of the virtues that separates us from cretins like those swampfolk.
translation: 我很高兴你这么想。交谈只是我们区别于那些沼泽白痴居民的优点之一。

original: Swampfolk who, I should mention, absconded with a book, a precious family heirloom. I wanted to ask you, friend; will you get it back?
translation: 我想说的是，某位沼泽居民，携书潜逃，那是珍贵的传家宝。我想问你，朋友，你能把它找回来吗？

original: Ha! Spoken like a true roughneck. That's good. I could use a person of mettle like yourself. You see, a family heirloom of mine has been stolen.
translation: 哈！说得真像个狠角色。棒极了。我就需要你这样有勇气的人。你看，我的传家宝被偷了。

original: This heirloom - a book - has been stolen by those swampfolk cretins. Smash some heads, bring it back, get paid. What do you say?
translation: 这传家宝，一本书，被那些沼泽白痴给偷走了。帮我教训教训他们，再把书拿回来，我就付给你报酬。你说怎么样？

original: Cash, plain and simple. Return with the book and I'll pay you a thousand caps. No questions asked.
translation: 现金，简单明了。带着书回来，我就付你一千盖子。不多废话。

original: Come on, now. No giving up just yet.
translation: 得了吧。不要这么快就放弃。

original: I thought as much. Listen to me very carefully, child. You mustn't bring it to him.
translation: 我想也是。仔细听着，孩子。你不能把它带给他。

original: That book is known as the Krivbeknih, and it's a thing of evil purpose.
translation: 那书叫做《黯日圣经》，是本邪恶之物。

original: Please, you don't understand what it is you're sent to fetch. That book, the Krivbeknih, is a thing of evil.
translation: 拜托，你不知道你被派去取的是什么。那本书，黯日圣经，非常邪恶。

original: Yes, the Krivbeknih. The Blackhall family has a long, evil history with the book.
translation: 是的，黯日圣经。布莱克霍尔家族与这书有着悠久而邪恶的渊源。

original: It was lost to them long ago, but it's found a way back to Point Lookout, and Obadiah seeks to reclaim it.
translation: 它很久以前就被他们遗失了，但它又回到了望海崖，奥巴迪亚想要夺回它。

original: I can't promise you money, but I have some medical supplies I can share. Please; it would be a good thing you do.
translation: 我不能许诺给你金钱，但我有一些医疗用品可以与你分享。拜托，这将是一件善事。

original: Obadiah's no better than the heathens he's asked you to steal it from. He believes he can use it to control them, and God knows what else.
translation: 奥巴迪亚要求你去偷回它，这没比异教徒好多少。他相信他能用它控制他们，天知道还有什么用处。

original: There's a way to destroy that damned thing. I intend to do just that.
translation: 有个办法毁掉那该死的东西。我正要那么做。

original: I ask no more. You can find me at my tent on the beach, south of Blackhall. God bless your path, child.
translation: 我别无所求了。你可以到海滩的帐篷里找我，就在布莱克霍尔南边。愿上帝保佑你，孩子。

original: I will not be dismissed by you!
That book has been lost to the Blackhalls for generations, and I intend to make sure it stays lost.
translation: 布莱克霍尔家族遗失那本书已经好几代，我一定要让它继续遗失下去。

original: Ah, Marcella. A religious fanatic in her own right. Don't believe anything the woman says; her mind is as addled as those inbred swampfolk.
translation: 啊，玛塞拉。那个一意孤行的宗教狂徒。别相信那个女人的任何话，她脑子跟那些近亲繁殖的沼泽居民一样有毛病。

original: Yes, yes, of course. Here's your errand fee. Now, give it to me!
translation: 好，好，当然。这是你的跑腿费。现在，把它给我！

original: Surely you're not considering giving it to Marcella? Come now, the woman can't rub two caps together. Give it to me and be paid.
translation: 你不会想把它给玛塞拉吧？得了吧，那女人连两盖子都凑不出。给我吧，然后拿钱。

original: There's no reason in your keeping that book - my book! Talk to me again when you've come to your senses.
translation: 你没理由留着那本书——我的书！想清楚了再来找我。

original: They attacked while I slept.  I.. I don't expect to survive.  I only pray that you haven't taken that book to Obadiah. You must take up my mission.
translation: 他们趁我睡觉时发动袭击。我…我不奢望活下来。我只祈祷你没把那本书带去奥巴迪亚。你必须接受我的使命。

original: There is... one way to utterly destroy the Krivbeknih, but you must take a pilgrimage, far north of Point Lookout, in the Capital Wasteland.
translation: 有……个办法能彻底销毁黯日圣经，但你必须去朝圣，望海崖遥远的北方，首都废土。

original: Seek a place called Dunwich. Within is an obelisk, itself a wicked thing.  It'll consume the book - you need only press the book to its surface.
translation: 寻找一个叫敦威治的地方，里面有一座方尖碑，本身就是邪恶之物。它将吞噬这本书——你只需将书按在它的表面。

original: May God shed his blessings upon you, child. Make haste for Dunwich.
translation: 愿上帝保佑你，孩子。快去敦威治。

original: My God, I am sorry for all my sins with all my heart. In choosing to do wrong and failing to do good, I have sinned against You whom I should...
translation: 天啊，我真心为我的罪孽悔过。我选择了行恶而非为善，我犯下了罪孽…

original: Ready or not, here I come!
translation: 准备好了吗，我这就来啦！

original: Ah come on... what's a matter? You tired?
Fine. I was tired of whuppin' you anyhow.
Okay, I'll give you a head start. Go!
translation: 好吧，我会领先你的。开始！

original: Tag! You're it! You'll never catch me!
translation: 捉住了！该你了！你永远都捉不到我的！

original: I don't blame you! I wouldn't go down there myself, if I didn't have the option of running back to my ship!
translation: 我不怪你！要是我没办法逃回我的船上，我也不会一个人到那儿去！

original: Just don't come crying to me when a Mirelurk is chewing on your guts!
translation: 泥沼蟹将你掏心挖腹时，别来找我哭诉！
你永远都不会找到我的。

original: This is the best hiding spot ever!
translation: 这里是最好的藏身地点！

original: I bet you walk right past me!
translation: 我敢打赌你刚才从我身边经过！

original: You're pretty good at this game.
translation: 你玩这个游戏还挺在行的。

original: Hmm... did you turn invisible or something?
translation: 嗯…你是不是隐形了还是怎么？

original: Dammit! Trapped! I knew he'd try this!
translation: 该死！是陷阱！我就知道他会这么干！
顺着这条路就能找到他了！

original: Congratulations, my boy! You're going to pull through, and everything will be right as rain.
translation: 恭喜，我的孩子！你会很快恢复的，一切都会好起来的。

original: Congratulations, my dear! You're going to pull through, and everything will be right as rain.
translation: 恭喜，我亲爱的！你会很快恢复的，一切都会好起来的。

original: Been having a rough time, haven't you? Let daddy patch everything up for you.
translation: 吃了不少苦头吧，不是吗？让爸爸来修补一下吧。

original: You're doing well. Quite well, indeed! Most initiates never make it this far, you know.
translation: 你做得很好。确实很好！大多数新人都不能走到这一步。

original: What a messy, messy mind you've got in here. I'll see if I can't tidy it up for you.
translation: 你的脑子真乱啊，乱七八糟的。我看看能不能帮你收拾一下。

original: You might experience just the slightest hint of unease. But I'm sure that wherever you are, you're not feeling a thing.
translation: 你可能会感到一丝不安。但我相信，无论你在哪里，都不会有任何感觉。

original: I've never even been to Point Lookout, so I wouldn't know. She just said she was going to go find her fortune there. She could be anyplace!
translation: 我甚至都没去过望海崖，所以我也不知道。她只是说她要去那里找她的财富。她可能去任何地方！

original: But I do remember her talking about that Punga Fruit, and how valuable it'd be to grow here. Maybe she'll be someplace it grows?
translation: 但是我记得她曾经提起过膨葛，以及那东西有多值钱什么的。也许她会在某个长着那个植物的地方吧？

original: The audio password for my box is "Nevermore".
translation: 我的盒子的声控密码是“Nevermore”。
现在是说再见的时候了。

original: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
translation: 密码: 正确！          声音识别: 不符合！     拒绝进入 - 用户声音不符。

original: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
translation: 密码: 正确！          声音识别: 不符合！     拒绝进入 - 用户声音不符。

original: I don't suppose there's any harm indulging you. What interests you?
translation: 我想对你说说也无妨。你对什么感兴趣？

original: Yes, a task for which I think you'll be superlatively qualified. Do you accept?
translation: 没错，我认为你能胜任这项任务。你接受吗？

original: Don't be daft. You agreed to retrieve my book.  With more haste than this, I would have thought.
translation: 别犯傻了，你答应帮我拿回书。我还以为会比现在更匆忙呢。

original: You need to head for the ritual site east of the boardwalk, and expect a fight.
translation: 你得去木栈道东边的仪式之地，可能会有一场战斗。

original: Hundreds of years, and still standing strong. You're within a fine example of Victorian architecture, my friend.
translation: 数百年至今，依然屹立不倒。这栋建筑，堪称维多利亚式的典范，朋友。

original: Just as much as it's named after us, I suppose. We took the Blackhall name when we arrived on these shores, generations before the Great War.
translation: 我的家族世代都居住在这里。布莱克霍尔庄园这名号，早在大战发生前数百年，我们刚抵达这海岸的时候，便沿用至今。

original: We do well to remember history, particularly in this dark time.
translation: 我们铭记历史，特别是在黑暗时代。

original: I'm relatively new here myself, but I'll share what I can.
translation: 我也算是新来这里，但我会告诉你我所知的。

original: Hostile, in a word. I try to observe, but the swampfolk are dangerously aggressive to any outsiders. Lucky for us, they tend to keep to the swamp.
translation: 可以说是充满敌意。我试着观察，但沼泽居民对外来者的攻击性很强。幸好他们都躲在沼泽里。

original: I come from the Abbey of the Road. I'm what you might call a missionary. I travel the Wastes, spreading the Faith and doing good where I can.
translation: 我从大路修道院来。我就是你所谓的传教士。我周游荒原，传播信仰，助人行善。

original: Right, I'm from the Abbey of the Road. I'm afraid its location is secret, however.
translation: 对，我来自大路修道院。不过恐怕它的位置是个秘密。

original: Sort of - the tents were collapsed when I found them. I was able to put them back together. This one smells the least like a wet Brahmin.
translation: 算是吧—我发现帐篷的时候都已经塌了。我把它们重新搭了起来。这顶闻着最没有潮湿的双头牛味。

original: I restored a terminal in one of the other tents. From that it would seem these tents were originally put here before the War by medical workers.
translation: 我修好了一台其他帐篷里的终端。由此看来，这些帐篷是战前由医务人员搭建的。

original: Would you like me to recite some scripture, or did you just want to know more about the Faith?
translation: 你想听我念一段经文呢，还是说让我给你讲关于信仰的话题?

original: I was raised at the Abbey of the Road where I was educated until I could receive my Rites of Mission. That's when I first left the Abbey.
translation: 我在大路修道院长大并接受教育，直到我能接受传教仪式。那是我第一次离开修道院。

original: We try to improve the state of the Wasteland by doing good where we can and by spreading the word of the Bible.
translation: 我们一直尝试着通过在废土尽可能多地做好事，或者散播上帝的福音来证明。

original: We also recover and restore religious relics that we can find, but that's a secondary goal.
translation: 我们也会去帮助信仰崩溃的人重新建立信念，但那不过是次要目标而已。

original: Scripture - the world as told in the Bible. Would you like to hear a verse?
translation: 经文 - 在圣经中所述之言。你想不想听呢？

original: In a moment, in the twinkling of an eye, at the last trumpet: for the trumpet shall sound and the dead shall rise again incorruptible.
translation: 很快的，就在眨眼之间，就在那最后的小号吹响之时:小号将会再次响起，死去的人将会再次站起来，而非腐烂掉。

original: In Him was life, and the life was the light of men. And the light shineth in the darkness, and the darkness did not comprehend it.
translation: 对于他来说，生命就是一切，生命就是人类之光。光会照亮黑暗，黑暗不会包容它。

original: I have told you this so that you might have peace in me. In the world you will have trouble, but take courage, I have conquered the world.
translation: 我已经告诉你了，所以你不需要对我如此。在这个世界里，你将会遇上麻烦，但是请鼓起勇气，我已经征服了这个世界。

original: No, not exactly. People have clung to many beliefs since the Great War, and some have their foundations in the Faith.
translation: 不，不完全是。在大战之后，人们就开始坚持相信很多东西，这其中有很多信仰都有它们的理论根据。

original: The Bible was around long before the bombs fell, as was my Faith. To us, the War was a great tragedy, but not the True Apocalypse.
translation: 在核弹落下之前，圣经，作为我的信仰，一直都处于统治地位。对我们而言，那场战争是一个巨大的悲剧，但并不是什么世界末日。

original: Oh, of course, my child. Something else, then?
translation: 哦，当然，我的孩子。还需要些什么？

original: I'm afraid I don't have a copy of the scripture with me, but I can share a few passages.  Here's one of my favorites.
translation: 我恐怕我没有经文的拷贝，不过我可以分享你几段。这是我比较中意的一段。

original: I tell you the truth, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life and will not be condemned;
translation: 我实话告诉你，无论谁听见我的话并且相信他会带给我永恒的生命，都不会受到责难。

original: he has crossed over from death to life.
Of course!  "I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end. I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely."
translation: 当然！“我是阿尔法和欧米伽，是起始，亦是终结。我要将生命水的泉源白白赐给口渴的人。”

original: So lovely. Selflessness like that is a rare commodity these days. I can see why that particular passage inspired her.
translation: 真美啊。如今，像这样的无私精神已不多见了。我明白为什么这段话会鼓舞她了。

original: As in, slack off? Thanks, but I've got stuff to do, big man.
translation: 例如，放松？多谢，但是我海有事情要做，大人物。

original: I appreciate the advice, but I'm fine, okay?
translation: 我很感激你的建议，但是我没事，明白？

original: I'm not your child, old man.
translation: 我不是你的孩子，老家伙。

original: You're not the boss of me.
Please, don't say that! Just, if you're going to Point Lookout, and you find a girl named Nadine, please give her this note.
translation: 求求你，不要这么说！只是，如果你要去望海崖，并且找到一个叫娜丁的女孩子的话，请把这个纸条给她。

original: She stowed away on that boat, and I haven't heard from her ever since. I'll do anything if it'll help find her.
translation: 自从她离开船以后，我就再也没听过关于她的消息。我会尽我一切力量帮助你找到她。

original: All you have to do is come back to me and buy another ticket! Just be careful not to get stranded short on caps, huh?
translation: 你需要做的就是回来找我并且再买张船票！注意点，别弄得捉襟见肘了，好吗？

original: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
translation: 拿到票后，你只需进入客舱，在简易床上安顿下来。我们马上就到！

original: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
translation: 抱歉，但我不接待团体旅行。如果你想去望海崖看看，就得把你朋友留在这儿。

original: All you have to do is come back to me and buy another ticket! Just be careful not to get stranded short on caps, huh?
translation: 你需要做的就是回来找我并且再买张船票！注意点，别弄得捉襟见肘了，好吗？

original: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
translation: 拿到票后，你只需进入客舱，在简易床上安顿下来。我们马上就到！

original: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
translation: 拿到票后，你只需进入客舱，在简易床上安顿下来。我们马上就到！

original: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
translation: 抱歉，但我不接待团体旅行。如果你想去望海崖看看，就得把你朋友留在这儿。

original: Once you've got a ticket, just head into the cabin and settle in on the cot. We'll be there in no time!
translation: 拿到票后，你只需进入客舱，在简易床上安顿下来。我们马上就到！

original: Now that we're rid of Calvert, I'll be heading north to pursue my next rival.
translation: 我们现在已经解决了卡尔弗特，我会到北方继续追踪我的下一个猎物。

original: There are only a few of us left now. The great game goes on.
translation: 现在我们中只有少数几个人仍然在世。但是这伟大的游戏从未停止。

original: Sort of a... what's a word you'd understand... microcosm? Yeah. It's a microcosm for the old world.
translation: 这是一种…怎么说你才能明白呢……缩影？嗯。这是对旧世界的缩影。

original: I'm pulling all the data that I can from Calvert's computers. Everything the little bastard gathered is here.
translation: 我把卡尔弗特电脑上所有的数据都下载下来。那个混蛋收集的所有东西都在这里。

original: And then, when I'm done, I'll leave this place to sink into the sea.
translation: 搞定后我就离开，把这里的一切都沉进海底。

original: Murder? Really, what would your father say? I thought he raised you better than that.
translation: 谋杀？说真的，你父亲会怎么说？我以为他把你管教得比这好。

original: You had an awful lot to say about him when you were unconscious. And from the sound of it, he'd be very, very disappointed in what you've become.
translation: 你失去知觉时说了一大堆关于他的话。听你这么说，他会对你的所作所为非常非常失望的。

original: Sounds like he didn't spank you enough as a kid. Maybe I can make up for his lost time!
translation: 听上去他小时候打你屁股不够多啊。或许我能帮他弥补。

original: Why do we do anything? You travel the world, kill people, take trophies that interest you, and move on. I'm much the same.
translation: 我们为什么要做任何事？你环游世界，杀人，猎取你感兴趣的战利品，然后再继续向前。我也差不多。

original: The only difference is that my trophies are somewhat more medical in nature. Oh, and to be honest, I probably kill fewer people than you do.
translation: 唯一不同的是，我的战利品更偏向医学性。哦，老实说，我杀的人可能比你少。

original: But I suppose it's time that came to an end, one way or another.
translation: 但我想，不管怎样，这一切都该结束了。
